[03] 723-4^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^adāsiṃ kolasampāpakaṃ, kañjikaṃ teladhūpita^eb^nti badaramodakakasāve catuguṇodakasamodite pākena catutthabhāgāvasiṭṭhaṃ yāguṃ pacitvā taṃ tikaṭukājamodahiṅgujīrakalasuṇādīhi kaṭukabhaṇḍehi abhisaṅkharitvā sudhūpitaṃ katvā lāmañjagandhaṃ gāhāpetvā pasannacittena bhagavato patte ākiritvā satthāraṃ uddisitvā adāsiṃ, therassa hatthe patiṭṭhapesinti dasseti. tenāha --

[03] evaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno tāya devatāya attanā samupacitasucaritakamme āvikate saparivārāya tassā dhammaṃ desetvā manussalokaṃ āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi. bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desesi. sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^abhikkantena^eb^ ^a^M0.0171^ea^ ^a^V0.0156^ea^ ^b^vaṇṇenā^eb^ti vihāravimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena visākhā mahāupāsikā aññatarasmiṃ ussavadivase uyyāne vicaraṇatthaṃ sahāyikāhi parijanena ca ussāhitā sunhātānulittā subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā mahālatāpasādhanaṃ piḷandhitvā pañcamattehi sahāyikāsatehi parivāritā mahantena issariyena mahatā paricchedena gehato nikkhamma uyyānaṃ uddissa gacchantī cintesi ``bāladārikāya viya kiṃ me moghakīḷitena, handāhaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ manobhāvanīye ca ayye vandissāmi, dhammañca sossāmī''ti vihāraṃ gantvā ekamante ṭhatvā mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ omuñcitvā taṃ dāsiyā hatthe datvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. tassā bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi.

[03] sā dhammaṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā manobhāvanīye ca bhikkhū vanditvā vihārato nikkhamitvā thokaṃ gantvā dāsiṃ āha ``handa je ābharaṇaṃ piḷandhissāmī''ti. sā taṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā bandhitvā vihāre ṭhapetvā tahaṃ tahaṃ vicaritvā gamanakāle vissaritvā gatattā ``vissaritaṃ mayā, tiṭṭha ayye āharissāmī''ti nivattitukāmā ahosi. visākhā ``sace je vihāre ṭhapetvā vissaritaṃ, tassa vihārasseva atthāya taṃ pariccajissāmī''ti vihāraṃ ^a^P0.0188^ea^ gantvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā attano adhippāyaṃ pavedentī ``vihāraṃ, bhante, kāressāmi, adhivāsetu me bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāyā''ti āha. adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.

[03] sā taṃ piḷandhanaṃ satasahassādhikanavakoṭiagghanakaṃ vissajjetvā āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena navakammādhiṭṭhāyakena suvibhattabhittithambhatulāgopānasikaṇṇikadvārabāhavātapāna sopānādigehāvayavaṃ manoharaṃ suvikappitakaṭṭhakammaramaṇīyaṃ suparikammakatasudhākammaṃ manuññaṃ suviracitamālākammalatākammādicittakammavicittaṃ supariniṭṭhitamaṇikuṭṭima sadisabhūmitalaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ pañca gabbhasatāni, uparibhūmiyaṃ pañca gabbhasatānīti gabbhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ buddhassa bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ^a^M0.0172^ea^ ca vasanānucchavikaṃ mahantaṃ pāsādaṃ tassa parivārapāsādasahassañca tesaṃ parivārabhāvena kuṭimaṇḍapacaṅkamanādīni ca kārentī navahi māsehi vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpesi. pariniṭṭhite ca vihāre navaheva hiraññakoṭīhi vihāramahaṃ kārentī pañcamattehi sahāyikāsatehi saddhiṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā tassa sampattiṃ disvā somanassajātā ^a^V0.0157^ea^ sahāyikā āha ``imaṃ evarūpaṃ pāsādaṃ kārentiyā yaṃ mayā puññaṃ pasutaṃ, taṃ anumodatha, pattidānaṃ vo dammī''ti. ``aho sādhu aho sādhū''ti pasannacittā sabbāpi anumodiṃsu.

[03] tattha aññatarā upāsikā visesato taṃ pattidānaṃ manasākāsi. sā na cirasseva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu nibbatti. tassā puññānubhāvena anekakūṭāgārapākārauyyānapokkharaṇiādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ soḷasayojanāyāmavitthārabbedhaṃ attano pabhāya yojanasataṃ pharantaṃ ākāsacāriṃ mahantaṃ vimānaṃ pāturahosi. sā gacchantīpi ^a^P0.0189^ea^ accharāsahassaparivārā saha vimānena gacchati. visākhā pana mahāupāsikā vipulapariccāgatāya saddhāsampattiyā ca nimmānaratīsu nibbattitvā sunimmitadevarājassa aggamahesibhāvaṃ sampāpuṇi. athāyasmā anuruddho devacārikaṃ caranto taṃ visākhāya sahāyikaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavane uppannaṃ disvā --
[22] obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā..
[22] tesaṃ suyyati nigghoso, tūriye pañcaṅgike yathā..
[22] tesaṃ suyyati nigghoso, tūriye pañcaṅgike yathā..
[22] vāti gandho disā sabbā, rukkho mañjūsako yathā..
[25] imāhi gāthāhi pucchi. sāpi tassa evaṃ byākāsi --
[21] ``sāvatthiyaṃ mayhaṃ sakhī bhadante, saṅghassa kāresi mahāvihāraṃ.
[22] tatthappasannā ahamānumodiṃ, disvā agārañca piyañca metaṃ..
[22] samantato soḷasayojanāni, vehāyasaṃ gacchati iddhiyā mama..
[22] yopi maṃ supine passe, sopi vitto siyā naro..
[22] mama kamme hi nibbattaṃ, alaṃ puññāni kātave''ti..

[03] 736^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0174^ea^ ^b^sāvatthiyaṃ mayhaṃ sakhī bhadante, saṅghassa kāresi mahāvihāra^eb^nti bhante anuruddha ^a^V0.0159^ea^, sāvatthiyā samīpe pācīnapasse mayhaṃ mama sakkhī sahāyikā visākhā mahāupāsikā āgatāgataṃ cātuddisaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ uddissa navahiraññakoṭipariccāgena pubbārāmaṃ nāma mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāresi. ^b^tatthappasannā ahamānumodi^eb^nti tasmiṃ vihāre katapariyosite saṅghassa niyyādiyamāne tāya kate pattidāne ``aho ṭhāne vata pariccāgo kato''ti pasannā ratanattaye kammaphale ca sañjātapasādā ahaṃ anumodiṃ. vatthuvasena tassā anumodanāya uḷārabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``disvā agārañca piyañca meta''^eb^nti āha. sahassagabbhaṃ ativiya ramaṇīyaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ tañca agāraṃ mahantaṃ pāsādaṃ piyañca me buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa tādisaṃ mahantaṃ dhanapariccāgaṃ disvā anumodinti yojanā.

[03] 737^b^.^eb^ ^b^tāyeva me suddhanumodanāyā^eb^ti yathāvuttāya deyyadhammapariccāgābhāvena suddhāya kevalāya anumodanāyeva. ^b^laddhaṃ vimānabbhutadassaneyya^eb^nti ^a^P0.0191^ea^ mayhaṃ pubbe īdisassa abhūtapubbatāya abbhutaṃ samantabhaddakabhāvena ativiya surūpatāya ca dassaneyyaṃ imaṃ vimānaṃ laddhaṃ adhigataṃ. evaṃ tassa vimānassa abhirūpataṃ dassetvā idāni pamāṇamahattaṃ pabhāvamahattaṃ upabhogavatthumahattañca dassetuṃ ^b^``samantato soḷasayojanānī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^iddhiyā mamā^eb^ti mama puññiddhiyā.

[03] 740^b^.^eb^ ^b^nānāpadumasañchannā^eb^ti satapattasahassapattādibhedehi nānāvidhehi rattapadumehi rattakamalehi ca sañchāditā. ^b^puṇḍarīkasamotatā^eb^ti nānāvidhehi setakamalehi samantato avatatā, nānārukkhā aropimā surabhī sampavāyantīti yojanā.

[03] 743^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbaso^eb^ ^a^M0.0175^ea^ ^b^pabha^eb^nti samantato obhāsamānaṃ. ^b^kamme hī^eb^ti kammanimittaṃ. ^b^hī^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. cetanānaṃ vā aparāparuppattiyā bahubhāvato ``kammehī''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^ala^eb^nti yuttaṃ. ^b^kātave^eb^ti kātuṃ.
[03] idāni thero visākhāya nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetukāmo imaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] tassā gatiṃ brūhi kuhiṃ uppannā sā''ti..

[03] 744^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yā ceva sā dānamadāsi nārī^eb^ti yassa dānassa anumodanāya tvaṃ īdisaṃ sampattiṃ paṭilabhi, taṃ dānaṃ yā ceva sā nārī adāsīti visākhaṃ mahāupāsikaṃ sandhāya vadati. tāya eva devatāya tassā sampattiṃ kathāpetukāmo āha ``tassā gatiṃ brūhi kuhiṃ ^a^P0.0192^ea^ uppannā sā''ti. ^b^tassā gati^eb^nti tāya nibbattadevagatiṃ.
[21] ``yā sā ahu mayhaṃ sakhī bhadante, saṅghassa kāresi mahāvihāraṃ.
[22] viññātadhammā sā adāsi dānaṃ, uppannā nimmānaratīsu devesu..

[03] 746^b^.^eb^ ^b^sunimmitassā^eb^ti sunimmitassa devarājassa. ^b^acintiyo kammavipāka tassā^eb^ti vibhattilopaṃ katvā niddeso, tassā mama sakhiyā nibbānaratīsu ^a^M0.0176^ea^ nibbattāya kammavipāko puññakammassa vipākabhūtā dibbasampatti acintiyā appameyyāti attho. ^b^anaññathā^eb^ti aviparītaṃ yathāsabhāvato. kathaṃ panāyaṃ tassā sampattiṃ aññāsīti? subhaddā viya bhaddāya, visākhāpi devadhītā imissā santikaṃ agamāsi.
[03] idāni devadhītā theraṃ aññesampi dānasamādapane niyojentī imāhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi --
[22] dhammañca suṇātha pasannamānasā, sudullabho laddho manussalābho..
[22] saṅghassa ^a^P0.0193^ea^ dānāni dadātha vittā, mahapphalā yattha bhavanti dakkhiṇā..
[21] ``ye puggalā aṭṭha sataṃ pasatthā, cattāri etāni yugāni honti.
[22] te dakkhiṇeyyā sugatassa sāvakā, etesu dinnāni mahapphalāni..
[21] ``cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phale ṭhitā.
[22] karotaṃ opadhikaṃ puññaṃ, saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ..
[21] ``eso hi saṅgho vipulo mahaggato, esappameyyo udadhīva sāgaro.
[22] ete hi seṭṭhā naravīrasāvakā, pabhaṅkarā dhammamudīrayanti..
[21] ``tesaṃ ^a^M0.0177^ea^ sudinnaṃ suhutaṃ suyiṭṭhaṃ, ye saṅghamuddissa dadanti dānaṃ.
[22] sā dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā patiṭṭhitā, mahapphalā lokavidūna vaṇṇitā..
[22] vineyya maccheramalaṃ samūlaṃ, aninditā saggamupenti ṭhāna''nti..

[03] 747^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tenahaññepī^eb^ti tenahi aññepi. ^b^tenā^eb^ti ca tena kāraṇena, ^b^hī^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ``samādapethā''ti vatvā samādapanākāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saṅghassa dānāni dadāthā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vajjitaṃ manussabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``sudullabho laddho manussalābho''^eb^ti. tattha aṭṭha akkhaṇā nāma tayo apāyā arūpā asaññasattā paccantadeso indriyānaṃ vekallaṃ niyatamicchādiṭṭhikatā apātubhāvo buddhassāti.

[03] 748^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0162^ea^ ^b^magga^eb^nti yaṃ khettavisese kataṃ dānaṃ, taṃ ekantena ^a^P0.0194^ea^ sugatisampāpanato sugatigāmimaggaṃ apāyamaggato jagghamaggādito ca ativiya seṭṭhabhāvena maggādhipanti katvā. dānampi hi saddhāhiriyo viya ``devalokagāmimaggo''ti vuccati. yathāha --
[21] ``saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dānaṃ, dhammā ete sappurisānuyātā.
[22] etañhi maggaṃ diviyaṃ vadanti, etena hi gacchati devaloka''nti..(a0 ni0 8.32; kathā0 480).

[03] ``maggādhipatī''ti vā pāṭho, tassa ariyamaggena sadevakassa lokassa adhipatibhūto satthāti attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^saṅghassa dānāni dadāthā^eb^tiādinā punapi dakkhiṇeyyesu dānasaṃvibhāge niyojentī āha.

[03] 749^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M0.0178^ea^ taṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ ariyasaṅghaṃ sarūpato dassentī ^b^``ye puggalā aṭṭha sataṃ pasatthā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^ye^eb^ti aniyamitaniddeso. ^b^puggalā^eb^ti sattā. ^b^aṭṭhā^eb^ti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo. te hi cattāro ca paṭipannā cattāro ca phale ṭhitāti aṭṭha honti. ^b^sataṃ pasatthā^eb^ti sappurisehi buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi aññehi ca devamanussehi passatthā. kasmā? sahajātasīlādiguṇayogato. tesañhi campakabakulakusumādīnaṃ viya sahajātavaṇṇagandhādayo sahajātasīlasamādhiādayo guṇā, tena te vaṇṇagandhādisampannāni viya pupphāni devamanussānaṃ sataṃ piyā manāpā pāsaṃsiyā ca honti. tena vuttaṃ ``ye puggalā aṭṭha sataṃ pasatthā''ti. te pana saṅkhepato sotāpattimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugaṃ, evaṃ yāva arahattamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yuganti cattāri yugāni honti. tenāha ^b^``cattāri etāni yugāni honti te dakkhiṇeyyā''^eb^ti. ^b^te^eb^ti pubbe aniyamato uddiṭṭhānaṃ niyametvā dassanaṃ. te hi sabbepi kammaṃ kammaphalañca saddahitvā dātabbadeyyadhammasaṅkhātaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti dakkhiṇeyyā guṇavisesayogena dānassa mahapphalabhāvasādhanato. ^b^sugatassa sāvakā^eb^ti sammāsambuddhassa ^a^P0.0195^ea^ dhammasavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya taṃ dhammaṃ suṇantīti sāvakā. ^b^etesu dinnāni mahapphalānī^eb^ti etesu sugatassa sāvakesu appakānipi dānāni dinnāni paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā mahapphalāni honti. tenāha bhagavā ``yāvatā, bhikkhave, saṅghā vā gaṇā vā, tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī''tiādi (a0 ni0 4.34; 5.32; itivu0 90).

[03] idha pana āyasmā anuruddho attanā devatāya ca vuttamatthaṃ manussalokaṃ āgantvā bhagavato ārocesi. bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi. sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^abhikkantena^eb^ ^a^M0.0179^ea^ ^b^vaṇṇenā^eb^ti caturitthivimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ viharante āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayena devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gato. so tattha paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitesu catūsu vimānesu catasso devadhītaro paccekaṃ accharāsahassaparivārā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavantiyo disvā tāhi pubbe katakammaṃ pucchanto --
[25] imāhi gāthāhi paṭipāṭiyā pucchi. tāpi tassa pucchānantaraṃ paṭipāṭiyā byākariṃsu. taṃ dassetuṃ --

[03] tā kira kassapassa bhagavato kāle esikānāmake raṭṭhe paṇṇakate nāma nagare kulagehe nibbattā vayappattā tasmiṃyeva nagare patikulaṃ gatā samaggavāsaṃ vasanti. tāsu ekā aññataraṃ piṇḍacārikaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā pasannacittā ^a^P0.0196^ea^ indīvarakalāpaṃ adāsi, aparā aññassa nīluppalahatthakaṃ adāsi, aparā padumahatthakaṃ adāsi, aparā sumanamakuḷāni adāsi. tā aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattiṃsu, tāsaṃ accharāsahassaṃ parivāro ahosi. tā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cutā tasseva kammassa ^a^V0.0164^ea^ vipākāvasesena aparāparaṃ tattheva saṃsarantiyo imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tattheva uppannā vuttanayena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena pucchitā. tāsu ekā attanā kataṃ pubbakammaṃ therassa kathentī --
[04] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --
[40] 767^b^.^eb^ ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --
[40] 774^b^.^eb^ ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --
[40] 781^b^.^eb^ ``tena ^a^M0.0181^ea^ ^a^V0.0165^ea^ metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --

[03] 759^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^indīvarānaṃ hatthaka^eb^nti uddālakapupphahatthaṃ vātaghātakapupphakalāpaṃ. ^b^esikāna^eb^nti esikāraṭṭhassa. ^b^uṇṇatasmiṃ nagaravare^eb^ti uṇṇate bhūmipadese niviṭṭhe meghodaraṃ lihantehi viya accuggatehi pāsādakūṭāgārādīhi uṇṇate uttamanagare. ^b^paṇṇakate^eb^ti evaṃnāmake nagare.

[03] 773^b^.^eb^ ^b^odātamūlaka^eb^nti setamūlaṃ, bhisamūlānaṃ dhavalatāya vuttaṃ, padumakalāpaṃ sandhāya vadati. tenāha ``haritapatta''ntiādi. tattha ^b^haritapatta^eb^nti nīlapattaṃ. avijahitamakuḷapattassa hi padumassa bāhirapattāni haritavaṇṇāni eva honti. ^b^udakasmiṃ sare jāta^eb^nti sare udakamhi jātaṃ, saroruhanti attho.

[03] evaṃ tāhi attanā katakamme kathite thero tāsaṃ anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā saccāni pakāsesi. saccapariyosāne sā sabbāpi sahaparivārā sotāpannā ahesuṃ. thero taṃ pavattiṃ manussalokaṃ āgantvā bhagavato ārocesi. bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi. sā dhammadesanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.

[03] ^b^dibbaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0182^ea^ ^a^P0.0198^ea^ ^b^te ambavanaṃ ramma^eb^nti ambavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarā upāsikā āvāsadānassa mahapphalataṃ mahānisaṃsatañca ^a^V0.0166^ea^ sutvā chandajātā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā evamāha ``ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āvāsaṃ kāretukāmā, icchāmi tādisaṃ okāsaṃ, ācikkhatū''ti. bhagavā bhikkhū āṇāpesi, bhikkhū tassā okāsaṃ dassesuṃ. sā tattha ramaṇīyaṃ āvāsaṃ kāretvā tassa samantato ambarukkhe ropesi. so āvāso samantato ambapantīhi parikkhitto chāyūdakasampanno muttājālasadisavālukākiṇṇapaṇḍarabhūmibhāgo ativiya manoharo ahosi. sā taṃ vihāraṃ nānāvaṇṇehi vatthehi pupphadāmagandhadāmādīhi ca devavimānaṃ viya alaṅkaritvā telapadīpaṃ āropetvā ambarukkhe ca ahatehi vatthehi veṭhetvā saṅghassa niyyādesi.

[03] sā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti, tassā mahantaṃ vimānaṃ pāturahosi ambavanaparikkhittaṃ. sā tattha accharāgaṇaparivāritā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavati. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno upagantvā imāhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[40] 785^b^.^eb^ ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[22] niyyādesiṃ taṃ saṅghassa, pasannā sehi pāṇibhi..
[21] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --

[03] 783^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^mahallako^eb^ti mahanto āyāmavitthārehi ubbedhena ca vipulo, uḷāratamoti attho. ^b^accharāgaṇaghosito^eb^ti taṃ pamodituṃ saṅgītivasena ceva piyasallāpavasena ca accharāsaṅghena samugghosito.

[03] 784^b^.^eb^ ^b^padīpo cettha jalatī^eb^ti sūriyarasmisamujjalakiraṇavitāno ratanappadīpo ca ettha etasmiṃ pāsāde abhijalati. ^b^dussaphalehī^eb^ti dussāni phalāni etesanti dussaphalā. tehi samuggiriyamānadibbavatthehīti attho.
[03] 789^b^.^eb^ ^b^kārente niṭṭhite mahe^eb^ti katapariyositassa vihārassa mahe pūjāya karīyamānāya ca. ^b^katvā dussamaye phale^eb^ti dusseyeva tesaṃ ambānaṃ phalaṃ katvā.
[03] 790^b^.^eb^ ^b^gaṇuttama^eb^nti gaṇānaṃ uttamaṃ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṃ. ^b^niyyādesi^eb^nti sampaṭicchāpesiṃ, adāsinti attho. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^pītavatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0184^ea^ ^a^P0.0200^ea^ ^b^pītadhaje^eb^ti pītavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavati parinibbute raññā ajātasattunā attanā paṭiladdhā bhagavato sarīradhātuyo gahetvā thūpe ca mahe ca kate rājagahavāsinī ^a^V0.0168^ea^ aññatarā upāsikā pātova katasarīrapaṭijagganā ``satthu thūpaṃ pūjessāmī''ti yathāladdhāni cattāri kosātakīpupphāni gahetvā saddhāvegena samussāhitamānasā maggaparissayaṃ anupadhāretvāva thūpābhimukhī gacchati. atha naṃ taruṇavacchā gāvī abhidhāvantī vegena āpatitvā siṅgena paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. sā tāvadeva tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattantī sakkassa devarañño uyyānakīḷāya gacchantassa parivārabhūtānaṃ aḍḍhatiyānaṃ nāṭakakoṭīnaṃ majjhe attano sarīrapabhāya tā sabbā abhibhavantī saha rathena pāturahosi. taṃ disvā sakko devarājā vimhitacitto acchariyabbhutajāto ``kīdisena nu kho oḷārikena kammunā ayaṃ edisiṃ sumahatiṃ deviddhimupāgatā''ti taṃ imāhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[22] tassā cattāri pupphāni, thūpaṃ abhihariṃ ahaṃ..
[22] nāssa maggaṃ avekkhissaṃ, na taggamanasā satī..
[22] tañcāhaṃ abhisañceyyaṃ, bhiyyo nūna ito siyā..

[03] 795-6^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^pītacandanalittaṅge^eb^ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇena candanena anulittasarīre. ^b^pītapāsādasayane^eb^ti sabbasovaṇṇamayena pāsādena suvaṇṇaparikkhittehi sayanehi ca samannāgate. evaṃ sabbattha heṭṭhā upari ca pītasaddena suvaṇṇameva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03] 798^b^.^eb^ ^b^latatthī^eb^ti latā atthi. ^b^bhante^eb^ti sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ gāravena ālapati. ^b^anabhicchitā^eb^ti na abhikaṅkhitā.

[03] 799^b^.^eb^ ^b^sarīra^eb^nti sarīrabhūtaṃ dhātuṃ. avayave cāyaṃ samudāyavohāro yathā ``paṭo ḍaḍḍho, samuddo diṭṭho''ti ca. ^b^assā^eb^ti gorūpassa. ^b^magga^eb^nti āgamanamaggaṃ. ^b^na avekkhissa^eb^nti na olokayiṃ. kasmā? ^b^na taggamanasā satī^eb^ti, tassaṃ gāviyaṃ gatamanā ṭhapitamanā na hontī, aññadatthu bhagavato thūpagatamanā eva samānāti attho. ``tadaṅgamanasā satī''ti ca pāṭho, tadaṅge tassa bhagavato dhātuyā aṅge mano etissāti tadaṅgamanasā. evaṃbhūtā ahaṃ tadā tassā maggaṃ nāvekkhissanti dasseti.

[03] 800^b^.^eb^ ^b^thūpaṃ apattamānasa^eb^nti thūpaṃ cetiyaṃ asampattājjhāsayaṃ, manasi bhavoti hi mānaso, ajjhāsayo manoratho. ``thūpaṃ upagantvā pupphehi pūjessāmī''ti uppannamanorathassa asampuṇṇatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. thūpaṃ cetiyaṃ pana pupphehi pūjanacittaṃ siddhameva, yena sā devaloke uppanna. ^b^tañcāhaṃ abhisañceyya^eb^nti ^a^P0.0202^ea^ tañce ahaṃ abhisañcineyyaṃ, pupphapūjanena hi puññaṃ ahaṃ thūpaṃ abhigantvā yathādhippāyaṃ pūjanena sammadeva cineyyaṃ upacineyyanti attho. ^b^bhiyyo nūna ito siyā^eb^ti ito yathāladdhasampattitopi bhiyyo upari uttaritarā sampatti siyāti maññeti attho.
[03] 801^b^.^eb^ ^b^maghavā^eb^ ^a^M0.0186^ea^ ^b^devakuñjarā^eb^ti ālapanaṃ. tattha ^b^devakuñjarā^eb^ti sabbabalaparakkamādivisesehi devesu kuñjarasadiso. ^b^sahabya^eb^nti sahabhāvaṃ.
[25] idaṃ ^a^V0.0170^ea^ dhammasaṅgāhakavacanaṃ. tato sakko mātalipamukhassa devagaṇassa imāhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi --
[22] appakampi kataṃ deyyaṃ, puññaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ..
[22] tathāgate vā sambuddhe, atha vā tassa sāvake..
[21] ``tiṭṭhante nibbute cāpi, same citte samaṃ phalaṃ.
[22] yattha kāraṃ karitvāna, saggaṃ gacchanti dāyakā''ti..
[03] 802^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^pasādento^eb^ti pasanne karonto, ratanattaye saddhaṃ uppādentoti attho.

[03] 803^b^.^eb^ ^b^citta^eb^nti vicittaṃ acinteyyaṃ. ^b^kammaphala^eb^nti deyyadhammassa anuḷārattepi khettasampattiyā ca cittasampattiyā ca uḷārassa puññakammassa phalaṃ passāti yojanā. ^b^appakampi kataṃ deyyaṃ, puññaṃ hoti mahapphala^eb^nti ettha ^b^kata^eb^nti kāravasena sakkāravasena ^a^P0.0203^ea^ āyatane viniyuttaṃ. ^b^deyya^eb^nti dātabbavatthuṃ. ^b^puñña^eb^nti tathāpavattaṃ puññakammaṃ.
[03] 804^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M0.0187^ea^ yattha appakampi kataṃ puññaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti, taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento ^b^``natthi citte pasannamhī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[03] 805-6^b^.^eb^ ^b^amhepī^eb^ti mayampi. ^b^mahemase^eb^ti mahāmase pūjāmase. ^b^cetopaṇidhihetu hī^eb^ti attano cittassa sammadeva ṭhapananimittaṃ, attasammāpaṇidhānenāti attho. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``na ^a^V0.0171^ea^ taṃ mātāpitā kayirā, aññe vāpi ca ñātakā.
[22] sammā paṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare''ti.. (dha0 pa0 43).

[03] evañca pana vatvā sakko devānamindo uyyānakīḷāya ussāhaṃ paṭippassambhetvā tatova paṭinivattitvā attanā abhiṇhaṃ pūjaneyyaṭṭhānabhūte cūḷāmaṇicetiye sattāhaṃ pūjaṃ akāsi. atha aparena samayena devacārikaṃ gatassa āyasmato nāradattherassa taṃ pavattiṃ gāthāheva kathesi, thero dhammasaṅgāhakānaṃ ārocesi, te tathā naṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesunti.

[03] ^b^obhāsayitvā pathaviṃ sadevaka^eb^nti ucchuvimānaṃ. taṃ heṭṭhā ucchuvimānena pāḷito ca aṭṭhuppattito ca sadisameva. kevalaṃ tattha sassu suṇisaṃ pīṭhakena paharitvā māresi, idha pana leḍḍunāti ayameva viseso. vatthuno pana bhinnattā ubhayampi visuṃyeva saṅgahaṃ āruḷhanti veditabbaṃ.
[22] siriyā ca vaṇṇena yasena tejasā, brahmāva deve tidase sahindake..
[22] alaṅkate uttamavatthadhārinī, kā tvaṃ subhe devate vandase mamaṃ..
[21] ``kiṃ tvaṃ pure kammamakāsi attanā, manussabhūtā purimāya jātiyā.
[27] dānaṃ suciṇṇaṃ atha sīlasaññamaṃ, kenupapannā sugatiṃ yasassinī.
[25] āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero pucchi. tato devatā imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi --
[21] ``idāni ^a^V0.0172^ea^ bhante imameva gāmaṃ, piṇḍāya amhākaṃ gharaṃ upāgami.
[22] tato te ucchussa adāsiṃ khaṇḍikaṃ, pasannacittā atulāya pītiyā..
[21] ``sassu ca pacchā anuyuñjate mamaṃ, kahaṃ nu ucchuṃ vadhuke avākiri.
[22] na chaḍḍitaṃ no pana khāditaṃ mayā, santassa bhikkhussa sayaṃ adāsahaṃ..
[21] ```tuyhaṃ nvidaṃ issariyaṃ atho mama', itissā sassu paribhāsate mamaṃ.
[22] leḍḍuṃ gahetvā pahāraṃ adāsi me, tato cutā kālakatāmhi devatā..
[21] ``tadeva kammaṃ kusalaṃ kataṃ mayā, sukhañca kammaṃ anubhomi attanā.
[22] devehi saddhiṃ paricārayāmahaṃ, modāmahaṃ kāmaguṇehi pañcahi..
[21] ``tadeva ^a^M0.0189^ea^ kammaṃ kusalaṃ kataṃ mayā, sukhañca kammaṃ anubhomi attanā.
[22] devindaguttā tidasehi rakkhitā, samappitā kāmaguṇehi pañcahi..
[22] devehi saddhiṃ paricārayāmahaṃ, modāmahaṃ kāmaguṇehi pañcahi..
[22] devindaguttā tidasehi rakkhitā, sahassanettoriva nandane vane..
[21] ``tuvañca bhante anukampakaṃ viduṃ, upecca vandiṃ kusalañca pucchisaṃ.
[22] tato te ucchussa adāsiṃ khaṇḍikaṃ, pasannacittā atulāya pītiyā''ti..

[03] ^b^abhikkantena^eb^ ^a^V0.0173^ea^ ^b^vaṇṇenā^eb^ti vandanavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena samayena sambahulā bhikkhū aññatarasmiṃ gāmakāvāse vassaṃ vasitvā vutthavassā pavāretvā senāsanaṃ paṭisāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṃ uddissa bhagavantaṃ dassanatthāya gacchantā aññatarassa gāmassa majjhena atikkamanti. tattha aññatarā itthī te bhikkhū disvā pasannacittā sañjātagāravabahumānā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ paggayha yāva dassanūpacārā pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā olokentī aṭṭhāsi ^a^M0.0190^ea^. sā aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu nibbatti. atha naṃ tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavantiṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --
[22] pādāni ^a^P0.0206^ea^ vanditvā manaṃ pasādayiṃ, vittā cahaṃ añjalikaṃ akāsiṃ..
[04] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --

[03] 823^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^samaṇe^eb^ti samitapāpe. ^b^sīlavante^eb^ti sīlaguṇayutte. ^b^manaṃ pasādayi^eb^nti ``sādhurūpā vatime ayyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino''ti tesaṃ guṇe ārabbha cittaṃ pasādesiṃ. ^b^vittā cahaṃ añjalikaṃ akāsi^eb^nti tuṭṭhā somanassajātā ahaṃ vandiṃ. pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pasādavikasitāni akkhīni ummīletvā dassanamattampi imesaṃ sattānaṃ bahūpakāraṃ, pageva vandanāti. tenāha ^b^``tena metādiso vaṇṇo''^eb^tiādi. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^abhikkantena^eb^ ^a^V0.0174^ea^ ^b^vaṇṇenā^eb^ti rajjumālāvimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena gayāgāmake aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa dhītā tasmiṃyeva gāme ekassa brāhmaṇakumārassa dinnā patikulaṃ gatā, tasmiṃ gehe issariyaṃ vattentī tiṭṭhati. sā ^a^M0.0191^ea^ tasmiṃ gehe dāsiyā dhītaraṃ disvā na sahati. diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya kodhena taṭataṭāyamānā akkosati paribhāsati, khaṭakañcassā deti. yadā pana sā vayappattiyā kiccasamatthā jātā, tadā naṃ jaṇṇukapparamuṭṭhīhi paharateva yathā taṃ purimajātīsu baddhāghātā.

[03] sā kira dāsī kassapadasabalassa kāle tassā sāminī ahosi, itarā dāsī. sā taṃ leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi muṭṭhiādīhi ^a^P0.0207^ea^ ca abhiṇhaṃ abhihanati. sā tena nibbinnā yathābalaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā ``anāgate ahaṃ sāminī hutvā imissā upari issariyaṃ vatteyya''nti patthanaṃ ṭhapesi. atha sā dāsī tato cutā aparāparaṃ saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vuttanayena gayāgāmake brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā patikulaṃ gatā, itarāpi tassā dāsī ahosi. evaṃ baddhāghātatāya sā taṃ viheṭheti.

[03] evaṃ viheṭhentī akāraṇeneva kesesu gahetvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca suhataṃ hani. sā nhāpitasālaṃ gantvā khuramuṇḍaṃ kāretvā agamāsi. sāminī ``kiṃ je duṭṭhadāsi muṇḍanamattena tava vippamokkho''ti rajjuṃ sīse bandhitvā tattha naṃ gahetvā oṇametvā ghāteti, tassā tañca rajjuṃ apanetuṃ na deti. tato paṭṭhāya dāsiyā ``rajjumālā''ti nāmaṃ ahosi.

[03] athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento rajjumālāya sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ, tassā ca brāhmaṇiyā saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānaṃ disvā araññaṃ pavisitvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vissajjento. rajjumālāpi kho divase divase tāya tathā viheṭhiyamānā ``kiṃ me iminā dujjīvitenā''ti nibbinnarūpā jīvite maritukāmā ghaṭaṃ gahetvā udakatitthaṃ gacchantī viya gehato nikkhantā anukkamena vanaṃ pavisitvā bhagavato nisinnarukkhassa avidūre aññatarassa rukkhassa sākhāya rajjuṃ bandhitvā pāsaṃ katvā ubbandhitukāmā ito cito ca olokentī addasa bhagavantaṃ tattha nisinnaṃ pāsādikaṃ pasādanīyaṃ uttamadamathasamathamanuppattaṃ chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo ^a^V0.0175^ea^ vissajjentaṃ. disvā buddhagāravena ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayā ^a^M0.0192^ea^ ``kiṃ nu kho bhagavā mādisānampi ^a^P0.0208^ea^ dhammaṃ deseti, yamahaṃ sutvā ito dujjīvitato mucceyya''nti cintesi.

[03] atha bhagavā tassā cittācāraṃ oloketvā ``rajjumāle''ti āha. sā taṃ sutvā amatena viya abhisittā pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭṭhā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. tassā bhagavā anupubbikathānupubbakaṃ catusaccakathaṃ kathesi, sā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. satthā ``vaṭṭati ettako rajjumālāya anuggaho, idānesā kenaci appadhaṃsiyā jātā''ti araññato nikkhamitvā gāmassa avidūre aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi. rajjumālāpi attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ abhabbatāya khantimettānuddayasampannatāya ca ``brāhmaṇī maṃ hanatu vā viheṭhetu vā yaṃ vā taṃ vā karotū''ti ghaṭena udakaṃ gahetvā gehaṃ agamāsi. sāmiko gehadvāre ṭhito taṃ disvā ``tvaṃ ajja udakatitthaṃ gatā cirāyitvā āgatā, mukhavaṇṇo ca te ativiya vippasanno, tvañca aññena ākārena upaṭṭhāsi, kiṃ eta''nti pucchi. sā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi.

[03] brāhmaṇo tassā vacanaṃ sutvā tussitvā gehaṃ gantvā rajjumālāya upari ``tayā na kiñci kātabba''nti suṇisāya vatvā tuṭṭhamānaso sīghataraṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā sādarena katapaṭisanthāro satthāraṃ nimantetvā attano gehaṃ ānetvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisitvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, suṇisāpissa upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. gayāgāmavāsinopi brāhmaṇagahapatikā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā appekacce abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, appekacce sammodanīyaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.

[03] satthā rajjumālāya tassā ca brāhmaṇiyā purimajātīsu katakammaṃ vitthārato kathetvā sampattaparisāya anurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi ^a^P0.0209^ea^. taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇī ca mahājano ca tattha sannipatito saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahi. satthā āsanā uṭṭhahitvā sāvatthimeva agamāsi. brāhmaṇo rajjumālaṃ dhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. tassa suṇisā rajjumālaṃ piyacakkhūhi olokentī yāvajīvaṃ manāpeneva sinehena parihari. rajjumālā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu nibbatti, accharāsahassañcassā parivāro ^a^M0.0193^ea^ ahosi. sā saṭṭhisakaṭabhārappamāṇehi dibbābharaṇehi paṭimaṇḍitattabhāvā accharāsahassaparivuttā nandanavanādīsu mahatiṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamānā pamuditamanā vicarati. athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno devacārikaṃ gato taṃ mahantena dibbānubhāvena mahatiyā deviddhiyā vijjotamānaṃ disvā tāya katakammaṃ imāhi gāthāhi pucchi.
[22] hatthe pāde ca viggayha, naccasi suppavādite..
[22] tesaṃ suyyati nigghoso, tūriye pañcaṅgike yathā..
[22] tesaṃ suyyati nigghoso, tūriye pañcaṅgike yathā..
[22] vāti gandho disā sabbā, rukkho mañjūsako yathā..

[03] 826^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^hatthe pāde ca viggayhā^eb^ti hatthe ca pāde ca vividhehi ākārehi gahetvā, pupphamuṭṭhipupphañjaliādibhedassa sākhābhinayassa dassanavasena vividhehi ākārehi hatthe, ca, samapādādīnampi ṭhānavisesānaṃ dassanavasena vividhehi ākārehi pāde ca upādiyitvāti attho. ca-saddena ^a^P0.0210^ea^ sākhābhinayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^naccasī^eb^ti naṭasi. ^b^yā tva^eb^nti yā vuttanayavasena naccaṃ karosīti attho. ^b^suppavādite^eb^ti sundare pavajjane sati tava naccassa anurūpavasena vīṇāvaṃsamudiṅgatāḷādike vādiyamāne, pañcaṅgike tūriye paggayhamāneti attho. sesaṃ heṭṭhāvimāne vuttanayameva.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0194^ea^ therena pucchitā sā devatā attano purimajātiādiṃ imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi --
[22] tato disā vilokesiṃ, `ko nu kho vanamassito'..
[22] `ko nu kho vanamassito, manusso udāhu devatā'..
[22] disvā mano me pasīdi, nāyaṃ yādisakīdiso..
[22] hito sabbassa lokassa, buddho ayaṃ bhavissati..
[22] āḷambo gaggaro bhīmo, sādhuvādī ca saṃsayo..
[21] ``pokkharo ca suphasso ca, viṇāmokkhā ca nāriyo.
[22] nandā ceva sunandā ca, soṇadinnā sucimhitā..
[22] sukhaṃ akatapuññānaṃ, idha natthi parattha ca..
[22] yattha kāraṃ karitvāna, sagge modanti dāyakā''ti..

[03] 833^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^dāsī ahaṃ pure āsi^eb^nti pure purimajātiyaṃ ahaṃ antojātā dāsī ahosiṃ. tattha kassāti āha ^b^``gayāyaṃ brāhmaṇassaha''^eb^nti, gayānāmake gāme aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa. ^b^ha^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^appapuññā^eb^ti mandabhāgyā apuññā. ^b^alakkhikā^eb^ti nissirikā kālakaṇṇī. ^b^rajjumālāti maṃ vidu^eb^nti, kese gahetvā ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanadukkhena muṇḍake kate punapi tadatthameva sīse daḷhaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitarajjukuṇḍalakavasena ``rajjumālā''ti maṃ manussā jāniṃsu.
[03] 834^b^.^eb^ ^b^vadhāna^eb^nti tāḷanānaṃ. ^b^tajjanāyā^eb^ti bhayasaṃtajjanena. ^b^uggatā^eb^ti uggatāya domanassuppattiyā. ^b^udahāriyā^eb^ti udakahārikā, udakaṃ āharantī viya hutvāti adhippāyo.
[03] 835^b^.^eb^ ^b^vipathe^eb^ti apathe, maggato apakkamitvāti attho. ^b^kvattho^eb^ti ko attho. soyeva vā pāṭho.

[03] 836^b^.^eb^ ^b^daḷhaṃ pāsaṃ karitvānā^eb^ti bandhanapāsaṃ thiraṃ acchijjanakaṃ katvā. ^b^āsumbhitvāna pādape^eb^ti viṭape lagganavasena pādape rukkhe khipitvā. ^b^tato disā vilokesiṃ, ko nu kho vanamassito^eb^ti imaṃ vanaṃ pavisanavasena assito nu kho koci atthi, yato me maraṇantarāyo siyāti adhippāyo.

[03] 837^b^.^eb^ ^b^sambuddha^eb^ntiādi ^a^M0.0197^ea^ tadā tassā tādise nicchaye asatipi sabhāvavasena vuttaṃ. tassattho ^a^V0.0180^ea^ -- sayameva sammadeva ca sabbassāpi bujjhitabbassa buddhattā ^b^sambuddhaṃ,^eb^ mahākaruṇāyogena hīnādibhedabhinnassa sabbassāpi lokassa ekantahitattā ^b^sabbalokahitaṃ,^eb^ ubhayalokaṃ ^a^P0.0213^ea^ munanato ^b^muniṃ,^eb^ nisajjāvasena kilesābhisaṅkhārehi ṭhānā cāvanābhāvena ca ^b^nisinnaṃ,^eb^ ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca ^b^jhāyantaṃ,^eb^ bodhimūleyeva bhayahetūnaṃ samucchinnattā kutocipi bhayābhāvato ^b^akutobhaya^eb^nti veditabbaṃ.
[03] 838^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṃvego^eb^ nāma sahottappaṃ ñāṇaṃ, so tassā bhagavato dassanena uppajji. tenāha ^b^``tassā me ahu saṃvego''^eb^ti.

[03] 839^b^.^eb^ ^b^pāsādika^eb^nti pasādāvahaṃ, dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāsītianubyañjanabyāmappabhāketumālālaṅkatāya samantapāsādikāya attano sarīrasobhāsampattiyā rūpakāyadassanabyāvaṭassa janassa sādhubhāvato pasādasaṃvaḍḍhananti attho. ^b^pasādanīya^eb^nti dasabala-catuvesārajjachāsādhāraṇañāṇa-aṭṭhārasāveṇika-buddhadhammapabhutiaparimāṇaguṇasamannāgatāya dhammakāyasampattiyā sarikkhakajanassa pasīditabbayuttaṃ, pāsādikanti attho. ^b^vanā^eb^ti kilesavanato apakkamitvā. ^b^nibbanamāgata^eb^nti nittaṇhabhāvaṃ nibbānameva upagataṃ adhigataṃ. ^b^yādisakīdiso^eb^ti yo vā so vā, pacurajanoti attho.

[03] 840-41^b^.^eb^ manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ aggamaggagopanāya gopitattā ^b^guttindriyo^eb^. aggaphalajjhānābhiratiyā ^b^jhānarato^eb^. tato eva bahibhūtehi rūpādiārammaṇehi apakkamitvā visayajjhatte nibbāne ca ogāḷhacittatāya ^b^abahiggatamānaso^eb^. micchāgāhamocanabhayena vipallāsavantehi micchādiṭṭhikehi bhāyitabbato tesañca bhayajananato ^b^bhayabheravo^eb^. payogāsayavipannehi anupagamanīyato ca kenacipi anāsādanīyato ca ^b^durāsado. dullabhāya^eb^nti dullabho ayaṃ. ^b^dassanāyā^eb^ti daṭṭhumpi. ^b^pupphaṃ odumbaraṃ yathā^eb^ti yathā nāma udumbare bhavaṃ pupphaṃ dullabhadassanaṃ, kadācideva bhaveyya, na vā bhaveyya, evaṃ īdisassa uttamapuggalassāti attho.

[03] 842^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M0.0198^ea^ ^b^tathāgato mudūhi vācāhi^eb^ saṇhāya vācāya ^b^``rajjumāle''ti^eb^ ^a^P0.0214^ea^ ^b^maṃ ālapitvā^eb^ āmantetvā ^b^saraṇaṃ gaccha tathāgata^eb^nti ``tathā āgato''tiādinā ^b^tathāgataṃ^eb^ sammāsambuddhaṃ ^b^saraṇaṃ gacchā^eb^ti ^b^maṃ avoca^eb^ abhāsīti yojanā.

[03] 843-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^tāha^eb^nti taṃ ahaṃ. ^b^gira^eb^nti vācaṃ. ^b^nela^eb^nti niddosaṃ. ^b^atthavati^eb^nti atthayuttaṃ sātthaṃ ^a^V0.0181^ea^, ekantahitaṃ vā. vacīsoceyyatāya ^b^suciṃ^eb^. akakkhaḷatāya ^b^saṇhaṃ^eb^. veneyyānaṃ mudubhāvakarattā ^b^mudu^eb^. savanīyabhāvena ^b^vagguṃ. sabbasokāpanūdana^eb^nti ñātibyasanādivasena uppajjanakassa sabbassāpi sokassa vinodanaṃ giraṃ sutvāna pasannacittā ahosinti sambandho. sabbametaṃ dānakathaṃ ādiṃ katvā ussakkitvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ vibhāvanavasena pavattitaṃ bhagavato anupubbikathaṃ sandhāya vadati. tenevāha ^b^``kallacittañca maṃ ñatvā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^kallacitta^eb^nti kammaniyacittaṃ, heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammakkhamacittaṃ, bhāvanākammassa yoggacittanti attho. tenevāha ^b^``pasannaṃ suddhamānasa''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^``pasanna''^eb^nti iminā assaddhiyāpagamamāha, ^b^``suddhamānasa''^eb^nti iminā kāmacchandādiapagamanena muducittataṃ udaggacittatañca dasseti. ^b^anusāsī^eb^ti ovadi, sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya saha upāyena pavattinivattiyo upadisīti attho. tenevāha ^b^``idaṃ dukkha''^eb^ntiādi. anusāsitākāradassanañhetaṃ.

[03] 845^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^idaṃ dukkhanti maṃvocā^eb^ti idaṃ taṇhāvajjaṃ tebhūmakaṃ dhammajātaṃ bādhakasabhāvattā kucchikaṃ ^a^P0.0215^ea^ hutvā tucchasabhāvattā tathattā ca dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti mayhaṃ abhāsi. ^b^ayaṃ dukkhassa sambhavo^eb^ti ayaṃ āmataṇhādibhedā taṇhā yathāvuttassa dukkhassa sambhavo pabhavo uppatti hetu samudayo ariyasaccanti. ^b^dukkhanirodho^eb^ti dukkhassa santibhāvo asaṅkhatadhātu nirodho ariyasaccanti. antadvayassa parivajjanato ^b^añjaso^eb^ nibbānagāminipaṭipadābhāvato ^b^amatogadho^eb^ maggo ariyasaccanti maṃ avocāti sambandho.

[03] 846^b^.^eb^ ^b^kusalassā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0199^ea^ ovādadāne veneyyadamane chekassa, appamādapaṭipattiyā vā matthakappattiyā anavajjassa. ^b^ovādamhi ahaṃ ṭhitā^eb^ti yathāvutte ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ sikkhāttayapāripūriyā saccapaṭivedhena ahaṃ patiṭṭhitā. tenāha ^b^``ajjhagā amataṃ santiṃ, nibbānaṃ padamaccuta''^eb^nti, idaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhānassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. yā niccatāya maraṇābhāvato ^b^amataṃ,^eb^ sabbadukkhavūpasamatāya ^b^santiṃ,^eb^ adhigatānaṃ acavanahetutāya ^b^accutaṃ nibbānaṃ padaṃ ajjhagā^eb^ adhigañchi, sā ekaṃsena satthu ovāde patiṭṭhitā nāmāti.

[03] 847^b^.^eb^ ^b^avaṭṭhitāpemā^eb^ti daḷhabhattī ratanattaye niccalapasādasinehā. kasmā? yasmā ^b^dassane avikampinī,^eb^ ``sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho''ti etasmiṃ sammādassane acalā kenaci acālanīyā. kena panetaṃ avikampananti āha ^b^``mūlajātāya^eb^ ^a^V0.0182^ea^ ^b^saddhāyā''^eb^ti. ayaṃ ``itipi so bhagavā araha''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.74; saṃ0 ni0 5.997; a0 ni0 9.27) sammāsambuddhe, ``svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammā'tiādinā tassa dhamme, ``suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho''tiādinā tassa saṅghe ca saccābhisamayasaṅkhātena ^a^P0.0216^ea^ mūlena jātamūlā saddhā, tāya ahaṃ avikampinīti dasseti. tato eva ^b^dhītā buddhassa orasā^eb^ti sammāsambuddhassa ure vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya orasaputtī.

[03] 848^b^.^eb^ ^b^sāhaṃ ramāmī^eb^ti sā ahaṃ tadā ariyāya jātiyā idāni devūpapattiyā āgatā maggaratiyā phalaratiyā ca ramāmi, kāmaguṇaratiyā ^b^kīḷāmi,^eb^ ubhayenāpi ^b^modāmi^eb^. attānuvādabhayādīnaṃ apagatattā ^b^akutobhayā. madhumaddava^eb^nti madhusaṅkhātaṃ maddavakaraṃ, naccanagāyanakālesu sarīrassa sarassa ca mudubhāvāvahaṃ gandhapānaṃ sandhāya vadati.``madhumādava''ntipi paṭhanti, ādavaṃ yāvadavaṃ yāvadeva davatthaṃ madhuraṃ pivāmīti attho.

[03] 849^b^.^eb^ ^b^puññakkhettānamākarā^eb^ti sadevakassa lokassa puññakkhettabhūtānaṃ ariyānaṃ maggaphalaṭṭhānaṃ ariyasaṅghassa ākarā uppattiṭṭhānaṃ tathāgatā. ^b^yathā^eb^ti yasmiṃ puññakkhette. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] athāyasmā ^a^M0.0200^ea^ mahāmoggallāno attanā ca devatāya ca pavattitaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ manussalokaṃ āgantvā bhagavato ārocesi. bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi. sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.

[03] mahārathavagge ^a^M0.0201^ea^ ^a^V0.0183^ea^ ^b^ko me vandati pādānī^eb^ti maṇḍūkadevaputtavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā ^a^P0.0217^ea^ campāyaṃ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre. so paccūsavelāyaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya veneyyabandhave satte volokento addasa ``ajja mayi sāyanhasamaye dhammaṃ desente eko maṇḍūko mama sare nimittaṃ gaṇhanto parūpakkamena maritvā devaloke nibbattitvā mahatā devaparivārena mahājanassa passantasseva āgamissati, tattha bahūnaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī''ti disvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ campānagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā, bhikkhūnaṃ sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā katabhattakicco vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhikkhūsu vattaṃ dassetvā, attano attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gatesu gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattisukhena divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā, sāyanhasamaye catūsu parisāsu sannipatitāsu surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena pokkharaṇitīre dhammasabhāmaṇḍapaṃ pavisitvā alaṅkatavarabuddhāsane nisinno manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto achambhītakesarasīho viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmassaraṃ nicchārento acinteyyena buddhānubhāvena anupamāya buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desetuṃ ārabhi.

[03] tasmiñca khaṇe eko maṇḍūko pokkharaṇito āgantvā ``dhammo eso vuccatī''ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṃ gaṇhanto parisapariyante nipajji. atheko vacchapālo taṃ padesaṃ āgato satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ parisañca paramena upasamena dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā taggatamānaso daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto maṇḍūkaṃ anoloketvā tassa sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi. so dhammasaññāya pasannacitto tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbattitvā ^a^V0.0184^ea^ suttappabuddho ^a^M0.0202^ea^ viya tattha accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ attānaṃ disvā ``kuto nu kho idha ahaṃ nibbatto''ti āvajjento purimajātiṃ disvā ``ahampi nāma idha uppajjiṃ, īdisañca ^a^P0.0218^ea^ sampattiṃ paṭilabhiṃ, kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ akāsi''nti upadhārento aññaṃ na addasa aññatra bhagavato sare nimittaggāhā. so tāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā vimānato otaritvā, mahājanassa passantasseva mahatā parivārena mahantena dibbānubhāvena upasaṅkamitvā, bhagavato pāde sirasā vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ bhagavā jānantova mahājanassa kammaphalaṃ buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātuṃ --
[21] ``ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ.

[25] pucchi. tattha ^b^ko^eb^ti devanāgayakkhamanussādīsu ko, katamoti attho. ^b^me^eb^ti mama. ^b^pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti imāya īdisāya deviddhiyā. ^b^yasasā^eb^ti iminā īdisena parivārena paricchedena ca. ^b^jala^eb^nti vijjotamāno. ^b^abhikkantenā^eb^ti ativiya kantena kamanīyena sundarena. ^b^vaṇṇenā^eb^ti chavivaṇṇena, sarīravaṇṇanibhāyāti attho.
[03] atha devaputto attano purimajātiādiṃ āvi karonto imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi --
[22] ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me..
[21] ``ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama.
[22] pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare''ti..

[03] 858^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^pure^eb^ti purimajātiyaṃ. ^b^udake^eb^ti idaṃ tadā attano uppattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ. ^b^udake maṇḍūko^eb^ti etena uddhumāyikādikassa thale ^a^M0.0203^ea^ maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti. gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viyāti gocaro, ghāsesanaṭṭhānaṃ. vāri udakaṃ gocaro etassāti ^a^V0.0185^ea^ ^b^vārigocaro^eb^ ^a^P0.0219^ea^. udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti ``vārigocaro''ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^tava dhammaṃ suṇantassā^eb^ti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa tava dhammaṃ ``dhammo eso vuccatī''ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa, anādare cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^avadhī vacchapālako^eb^ti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbhitvā tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresi.

[03] 859^b^.^eb^ ^b^muhuttaṃ cittapasādassā^eb^ti tava dhamme muhuttamattaṃ uppannassa cittapasādassa hetubhūtassa ^b^iddhi^eb^nti samiddhiṃ, dibbavibhūtinti attho. ^b^yasa^eb^nti parivāraṃ. ^b^ānubhāva^eb^nti kāmavaṇṇitādidibbānubhāvaṃ. ^b^vaṇṇa^eb^nti sarīravaṇṇasampattiṃ. ^b^juti^eb^nti dvādasayojanāni pharaṇasamatthaṃ pabhāvisesaṃ.

[03] 860^b^.^eb^ ^b^ye^eb^ti ye sattā. ca-saddo byatireke. ^b^te^eb^ti tava. ^b^dīghamaddhāna^eb^nti bahuvelaṃ. ^b^assosu^eb^nti suṇiṃsu. ^b^gotamā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati. ^b^acalaṭṭhāna^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ayañhettha attho -- gotama bhagavā ahaṃ viya ittarameva kālaṃ asuṇitvā ye pana katapuññā ciraṃ kālaṃ tava dhammaṃ assosuṃ sotuṃ labhiṃsu, te dīgharattaṃ saṃsārabyasanābhibhūtā ime sattā yattha gantvā na soceyyuṃ, taṃ asokaṃ sassatabhāvena acalaṃ santipadaṃ pattā eva, na tesaṃ tassa pattiyā antarāyoti.

[03] athassa bhagavā sampattaparisāya ca upanissayasampattiṃ oloketvā vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi. desanāpariyosāne so devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. devaputto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā saha parivārena devalokameva gatoti.

[03] ^b^uṭṭhehi^eb^ ^a^M0.0204^ea^ ^a^P0.0220^ea^ ^b^revate supāpadhamme^eb^ti revatīvimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye. tena samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ saddhāsampannassa kulassa putto nandiyo nāma upāsako ahosi saddhāsampanno dāyako dānapati saṅghupaṭṭhāko. athassa mātāpitaro ^a^V0.0186^ea^ sammukhagehato mātuladhītaraṃ revatiṃ nāma kaññaṃ ānetukāmā ahesuṃ. sā pana assaddhā adānasīlā, nandiyo taṃ na icchi. tassa mātā revatiṃ āha ``amma, tvaṃ imaṃ gehaṃ āgantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritena gomayena upalimpitvā āsanāni paññāpehi, ādhārake ṭhapehi, bhikkhūnaṃ āgatakāle vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdāpetvā dhamakaraṇena pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā bhuttakāle pattāni dhovāhi, evaṃ me puttassa ārādhikā bhavissasī''ti. sā tathā akāsi. atha naṃ ``ovādakkhamā jātā''ti puttassa ārocetvā tena ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchite divasaṃ ṭhapetvā āvāhaṃ kariṃsu.

[03] atha naṃ nandiyo āha ``sace bhikkhusaṅghaṃ mātāpitaro ca me upaṭṭhahissasi, evaṃ imasmiṃ gehe vasituṃ labhissasi, appamattā hohī''ti. sā ``sādhū''ti paṭissuṇitvā kiñci kālaṃ saddhā viya hutvā bhattāraṃ anavattentī dve putte vijāyi. nandiyassa mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. gehe sabbissariyaṃ tassā eva ahosi. nandiyopi mahādānapati hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi, kapaṇaddhikādīnampi gehadvāre pākavattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. isipatanamahāvihāre catūhi gabbhehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ catusālaṃ kāretvā mañcapīṭhādīni attharāpetvā ^a^P0.0221^ea^ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tathāgatassa hatthe dakkhiṇodakaṃ pātetvā niyyādesi, saha dakkhiṇodakadānena tāvatiṃsabhavane āyāmato ca vitthārato ca samantā dvādasayojaniko yojanasatubbedho sattaratanamayo accharāgaṇasahassasaṅghuṭṭho dibbapāsādo uggañchi.

[03] athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno devacārikaṃ caranto taṃ pāsādaṃ disvā attānaṃ vandituṃ āgate devaputte pucchi ``kassāyaṃ pāsādo''ti? ``imassa ^a^M0.0205^ea^, bhante, pāsādassa sāmiko manussaloke bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyo nāma kuṭumbiyaputto saṅghassa isipatanamahāvihāre catusālaṃ kāresi, tassāyaṃ nibbatto pāsādo''ti āhaṃsu. pāsāde nibbattadevaccharāyopi theraṃ vanditvā ``bhante, mayaṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyassa nāma upāsakassa paricārikā bhavituṃ idha nibbattā, tassa evaṃ vadetha ``tuyhaṃ paricārikā bhavituṃ nibbattā, devatāyo tayi cirāyante ukkaṇṭhitā, devalokasampatti nāma mattikābhājanaṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇabhājanassa gahaṇaṃ viya atimanāpa'nti vatvā idhāgamanatthāya tassa vadethā''ti āhaṃsu. thero ``sādhū''ti paṭissuṇitvā sahasā devalokato āgantvā catuparisamajjhe bhagavantaṃ pucchi ``nibbattati nu kho, bhante, katapuññānaṃ manussaloke ṭhitānaṃyeva dibbasampattī''ti? ``nanu te, moggallāna, nandiyassa devaloke nibbattā dibbasampatti sāmaṃ diṭṭhā, kasmā maṃ pucchasī''ti? ``evaṃ, bhante, nibbattatī''ti ^a^V0.0187^ea^. athassa satthā ``yathā ciraṃ vippavasitvā āgataṃ purisaṃ mittabandhavā abhinandanti sampaṭicchanti, evaṃ katapuññaṃ puggalaṃ ito paralokaṃ gataṃ sakāni puññāni sampattihatthehi sampaṭicchanti paṭiggaṇhantī''ti dassento --
[22] puññāni paṭiggaṇhanti, piyaṃ ñātīva āgata''nti.. -- gāthā abhāsi.

[03] nandiyo ^a^P0.0222^ea^ taṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya dānāni deti, puññāni karoti, so vaṇijjāya gacchanto revatiṃ āha ``bhadde, mayā paṭṭhapitaṃ saṅghassa dānaṃ anāthānaṃ pākavattañca tvaṃ appamattā pavatteyyāsī''ti. sā ``sādhū''ti paṭissuṇi. so pavāsagatopi yattha yattha vāsaṃ kappeti, tattha tattha bhikkhūnaṃ anāthānañca yathāvibhavaṃ dānaṃ detiyeva. tassa anukampāya khīṇāsavā dūratopi āgantvā dānaṃ sampaṭicchanti. revatī pana tasmiṃ gate katipāhameva dānaṃ pavattetvā anāthānaṃ bhattaṃ upacchindi, bhikkhūnampi bhattaṃ kaṇājakaṃ bilaṅgadutiyaṃ adāsi ^a^M0.0206^ea^. bhikkhūnaṃ bhuttaṭṭhāne attanā bhuttāvasesāni sitthāni macchamaṃsakhaṇḍamissakāni calakaṭṭhikāni ca pakiritvā manussānaṃ dasseti ``passatha samaṇānaṃ kammaṃ, saddhādeyyaṃ nāma evaṃ chaḍḍentī''ti.

[03] atha nandiyo vohārakasiddhi yathālābho āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā revatiṃ gehato nīharitvā gehaṃ pāvisi. dutiyadivase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā niccabhattaṃ anāthabhattañca sammadeva pavattesi, attano sahāyehi upanītaṃ revatiṃ ghāsacchādanaparamatāya ṭhapesi. so aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane attano vimāneyeva nibbatti. revatī pana sabbaṃ dānaṃ pacchinditvā ``imesaṃ vasena mayhaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyī''ti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ akkosantī paribhāsantī vicarati. atha vessavaṇo dve yakkhe āṇāpesi ``gacchatha, bhaṇe, bārāṇasinagare ugghosatha ``ito sattame divase revatī jīvantīyeva niraye pakkhipīyatī'ti''. taṃ sutvā mahājano saṃvegajāto bhītatasito ahosi.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0188^ea^ revatī pana pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā dvāraṃ thaketvā nisīdi. sattame divase tassā pāpakammasañcoditena vessavaṇena raññā āṇattā jalitakapilakesamassukā cipiṭavirūpanāsikā pariṇatadāṭhā lohitakkhā sajaladharasamānavaṇṇā ^a^P0.0223^ea^ ativiya bhayānakarūpā dve yakkhā upagantvā ``uṭṭhehi, revate, supāpadhamme''tiādīni vadantā nānābāhāsu gahetvā ``mahājano passatū''ti sakalanagare vīthito vīthiṃ paribbhamāpetvā ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā nandiyassa vimānaṃ sampattiñcassā dassetvā taṃ vilapantiṃyeva ussadanirayasamīpaṃ pāpesuṃ. taṃ yamapurisā ussadaniraye khipiṃsu. tenāha --
[22] nessāma taṃ yattha thunanti duggatā, samappitā nerayikā dukhenā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0207^ea^ ^b^uṭṭhehī^eb^ti uṭṭhaha, na dānesa pāsādo taṃ nirayabhayato rakkhituṃ sakkoti, tasmā sīghaṃ uṭṭhahitvā āgacchāhīti attho. ^b^revate^eb^ti taṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^supāpadhamme^eb^tiādinā uṭṭhānassa kāraṇaṃ vadati. yasmā tvaṃ ariyānaṃ akkosanaparibhāsanādinā suṭṭu lāmakapāpadhammā, yasmā ca apārutaṃ dvāraṃ nirayassa tava pavesanatthaṃ, tasmā uṭṭhehīti. ^b^adānasīle^eb^ti kassaci kiñci na dānasīle kadariye maccharinī, idampi uṭṭhānasseva kāraṇavacanaṃ. yasmā dānasīlānaṃ amaccharīnaṃ tava sāmikasadisānaṃ sugatiyaṃ nivāso, tādisānaṃ pana adānasīlānaṃ maccharīnaṃ niraye nivāso, tasmā uṭṭhehi, muhuttamattampi tava idha ṭhātuṃ na dassāmīti adhippāyo. ^b^yattha thunanti duggatā^eb^ti dukkhagatattā duggatā. ^b^nerayikā^eb^ti nirayadukkhena samappitā samaṅgībhūtā yasmiṃ niraye thunanti, yāva pāpakammaṃ na byanti hoti, tāva nikkhamituṃ alabhantā ^a^P0.0224^ea^ nitthunanti, tattha taṃ nessāma nayissāma khipissāmāti yojanā.
[21] ``icceva vatvāna yamassa dūtā, te dve yakkhā lohitakkhā brahantā.
[22] paccekabāhāsu gahetvā revataṃ, pakkāmayuṃ devagaṇassa santike''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^icceva vatvānā^eb^ti iti eva ``uṭṭhehī''tiādinā vatvā, vacanasamanantaramevāti attho. ^b^yamassa dūtā^eb^ti appaṭisedhaniyatassa yamassa rañño dūtasadisā. vessavaṇena hi te pesitā ^a^V0.0189^ea^. tathā hi te tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ nayiṃsu. keci ``na yamassa dūtā''ti na-kāraṃ ``yamassā''ti padena sambandhitvā ``vessavaṇassa dūtā''ti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. na hi na yamadūtatāya vessavaṇassa dūtāti sijjhati. yajanti tattha baliṃ upaharantīti ^b^yakkhā. lohitakkhā^eb^ti rattanayanā. yakkhānañhi nettāni atilohitāni honti. ^b^brahantā^eb^ti mahantā. ^b^paccekabāhāsū^eb^ti eko ekabāhāyaṃ, itaro itarabāhāyanti paccekaṃ bāhāsu. ^b^revata^eb^nti revatiṃ. revatātipi tassā nāmameva. tathā hi ``revate''ti ^a^M0.0208^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^pakkāmayu^eb^nti pakkāmesuṃ, upanesunti attho. ^b^devagaṇassā^eb^ti tāvatiṃsabhavane devasaṅghassa.
[03] evaṃ tehi yakkhehi tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā nandiyavimānassa avidūre ṭhapitā revatī taṃ sūriyamaṇḍalasadisaṃ ativiya pabhassaraṃ disvā --
[22] taṃ dissati suriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, ko modati saggapatto vimāne''ti.. --
[21] ``bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyo nāmāsi, upāsako amaccharī dānapati vadaññū.
[22] taṃ dissati sūriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, so modati saggapatto vimāne''ti.. --
[03] 868^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^candanasāralittā^eb^ti sārabhūtena candanagandhena anulittasarīrā. ^b^ubhato vimāna^eb^nti vimānaṃ ubhato anto ceva bahi ca saṅgītādīhi upecca sobhayanti.
[22] bhattu vimāne ramissāmi dānahaṃ, na patthaye nirayaṃ dassanāyā''ti.. --

[25] āha. tattha ^b^agārinī^eb^ti gehasāminī. ``bhariyā sagāminī''tipi paṭhanti, bhariyā sahagāminīti attho. ^b^sabbakulassa issarā bhattū^eb^ti mama bhattu nandiyassa sabbakuṭumbikassa issarā sāminī ahosiṃ, tasmā idānipi vimāne issarā bhavissāmīti āha. ^b^vimāne ramissāmi^eb^ ^a^P0.0226^ea^ ^b^dānaha^eb^nti evaṃ palobhetumeva hi taṃ te tattha nesuṃ. ^b^na patthaye nirayaṃ dassanāyā^eb^ti yaṃ pana nirayaṃ maṃ tumhe netukāmā, taṃ nirayaṃ dassanāyapi na patthaye, kuto pavisitunti vadati.
[03] evaṃ vadantimeva ``tvaṃ taṃ patthehi vā mā vā, kiṃ tava patthanāyā''ti nirayasamīpaṃ netvā --
[21] ``eso te nirayo supāpadhamme, puññaṃ tayā akataṃ jīvaloke.
[22] na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyata''nti.. --

[25] gāthamāhaṃsu. tassattho -- ^b^eso^eb^ tava ^b^nirayo,^eb^ tayā dīgharattaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavitabbaṭṭhānabhūto. kasmā? ^b^puññaṃ tayā akataṃ jīvaloke,^eb^ yasmā manussaloke appamattakampi tayā puññaṃ nāma na kataṃ, evaṃ akatapuñño pana tādiso satto ^b^maccharī^eb^ attano sampattinigūhanalakkhaṇena maccharena samannāgato, paresaṃ rosuppādanena ^b^rosako,^eb^ lobhādīhi pāpadhammehi samaṅgībhāvato ^b^pāpadhammo saggūpagānaṃ^eb^ devānaṃ ^b^sahabyataṃ^eb^ sahabhāvaṃ ^b^na labhatī^eb^ti yojanā.
[03] evaṃ pana vatvā te dve yakkhā tatthevantaradhāyiṃsu. taṃsadise pana dve nirayapāle saṃsavake nāma gūthaniraye pakkhipituṃ ākaḍḍhante passitvā --
[25] tasmiṃ ^a^P0.0227^ea^ kathite tattha attano nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ pucchantī --
[21] ``kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ.
[22] kena saṃsavako laddho, gambhīro sataporiso''ti.. -- āha.
[22] musāvādena vañcesi, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ tayā''ti.. --
[25] tassā taṃ kammaṃ kathetvā puna te --
[25] āhaṃsu. tattha ^b^saṃsavako nāmā^eb^ti niccakālaṃ gūthamuttādiasucissa saṃsavanato paggharaṇato saṃsavako nāma.
[03] na kevalaṃ tuyhaṃ idha saṃsavakalābho eva, atha kho ettha anekāni vassasahassāni paccitvā uttiṇṇāya hatthacchedādilābhopīti dassetuṃ --
[21] ``hatthepi chindanti athopi pāde, kaṇṇepi chindanti athopi nāsaṃ.
[22] athopi kākoḷagaṇā samecca, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamāna''nti.. --

[25] tattha laddhabbakāraṇaṃ āhaṃsu. tattha ^b^kākoḷagaṇā^eb^ti kākasaṅghā. te kirassā tigāvutappamāṇe sarīre anekasatāni anekasahassāni patitvā tālakkhandhaparimāṇehi sunisitaggehi ayomayehi ^a^V0.0192^ea^ mukhatuṇḍehi vijjhitvā vijjhitvā khādanti, maṃsaṃ gahitagahitaṭṭhāne kammabalena ^a^M0.0211^ea^ pūrateva. tenāha ``kākoḷagaṇā samecca, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamāna''nti.
[03] puna sā manussalokaṃ paccānayanāya yācanādivasena taṃ taṃ vippalapi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``sādhu ^a^P0.0228^ea^ kho maṃ paṭinetha, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ.
[22] yaṃ katvā sukhitā honti, na ca pacchānutappare''ti..
[21] ``ko devalokato manussalokaṃ, gantvāna puṭṭho me evaṃ vadeyya.
[22] na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyataṃ..
[21] ``sāhaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ.
[22] na ca dāne pamajjissaṃ, sāmaṃ diṭṭhamidaṃ mayā''ti..
[22] vitathena ca sāmikaṃ vañcayitvā, paccāmahaṃ niraye ghorarūpe''ti.. --
[25] osānagāthamāha. tattha ^a^P0.0229^ea^ ^b^``ahaṃ pure maccharinī''^eb^ti gāthā niraye nibbattāya vuttā, itarā anibbattāya evāti veditabbā. sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.

[03] bhikkhū revatiyā yakkhehi gahetvā nītabhāvaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ. taṃ sutvā bhagavā ādito paṭṭhāya imaṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā upari vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi, desanāpariyosāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. kāmañcetaṃ revatīpaṭibaddhāya kathāya yebhuyyabhāvato ``revatīvimāna''nti voharīyati, yasmā pana revatī vimānadevatā na hoti, nandiyassa pana devaputtassa vimānādisampattipaṭisaṃyuttañcetaṃ, tasmā purisavimānesveva saṅgahaṃ āropitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^yo vadataṃ pavaro manujesū^eb^ti chattamāṇavakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena setabyāyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa kicchāladdho putto chatto nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo ahosi. so vayappatto pitarā pesito ukkaṭṭhaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa santike medhāvitāya analasatāya ca na cireneva mante vijjāṭṭhānāni ca uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṃ patto. so ācariyaṃ abhivādetvā ``mayā ^a^V0.0194^ea^ tumhākaṃ santike sippaṃ ^a^M0.0213^ea^ sikkhitaṃ, kiṃ vo garudakkhiṇaṃ demī''ti āha. ācariyo ``garudakkhiṇā nāma antevāsikassa vibhavānurūpā, kahāpaṇasahassamānehī''ti āha. chattamāṇavo ācariyaṃ abhivādetvā setabyaṃ gantvā mātāpitaro vanditvā tehi abhinandiyamāno katapaṭisanthāro tamatthaṃ pitu ārocetvā ``detha me dātabbayuttakaṃ, ajjeva datvā āgamissāmī''ti āha. taṃ mātāpitaro ^a^P0.0230^ea^ ``tāta, ajja vikālo, sve gamissasī''ti vatvā kahāpaṇe nīharitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhāpetvā ṭhapesuṃ. corā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā chattamāṇavakassa gamanamagge aññatarasmiṃ vanagahane nilīnā acchiṃsu ``māṇavaṃ māretvā kahāpaṇe gaṇhissāmā''ti.

[03] bhagavā paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento chattamāṇavakassa saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānaṃ, corehi māritassa devaloke nibbattiṃ, tato saha vimānena āgatassa tattha sannipatitaparisāya ca dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā paṭhamatarameva gantvā māṇavakassa gamanamagge aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi. māṇavo ācariyadhanaṃ gahetvā setabyato ukkaṭṭhābhimukho gacchanto antarāmagge bhagavantaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhāsi. ``kuhiṃ gamissasī''ti bhagavatā vutto ``ukkaṭṭhaṃ, bho gotama, gamissāmi mayhaṃ ācariyassa pokkharasātissa garudakkhiṇaṃ dātu''nti āha. atha bhagavā ``jānāsi pana tvaṃ, māṇava, tīṇi saraṇāni, pañca sīlānī''ti vatvā tena ``nāhaṃ jānāmi, kimatthiyāni panetāni kīdisāni cā''ti vutte ``idamīdisa''nti saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādānassa ca phalānisaṃsaṃ vibhāvetvā ``uggaṇhāhi tāva, māṇavaka, saraṇagamanavidhi''nti vatvā ``sādhu uggaṇhissāmi, kathetha bhante bhagavā''ti tena yācito tassa ruciyā anurūpaṃ gāthābandhavasena saraṇagamanavidhiṃ dassento --
[21] ``yo vadataṃ pavaro manujesu, sakyamunī bhagavā katakicco.
[21] ``yattha ca dinna mahapphalamāhu, catūsu sucīsu purisayugesu.
[22] aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī''ti.. --

[03] 886^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti aniyamitavacanaṃ, tassa ``ta''nti iminā niyamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^vadata^eb^nti vadantānaṃ. ^b^pavaro^eb^ti seṭṭho, kathikānaṃ uttamo vādīvaroti attho. ^b^manujesū^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso yathā ``satthā devamanussāna''nti. bhagavā pana devamanussānampi brahmānampi sabbesampi sattānaṃ pavaroyeva, bhagavato ca carimabhave manussesu uppannatāya vuttaṃ ``manujesū''ti. tenevāha ^b^``sakyamunī''^eb^ti. sakyakulappasutatāya sakyo, kāyamoneyyādīhi samannāgatato anavasesassa ca ñeyyassa munanato muni cāti ^b^sakyamuni^eb^. bhāgyavantatādīhi catūhi kāraṇehi ^b^bhagavā^eb^. catūhi maggehi kātabbassa pariññādipabhedassa soḷasavidhassa kiccassa katattā nipphāditattā ^b^katakicco^eb^. pāraṃ sakkāyassa paratīraṃ nibbānaṃ gato sayambhuñāṇena adhigatoti ^b^pāragato^eb^. asadisena kāyabalena, anaññasādhāraṇena ñāṇabalena, catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyena ca samannāgatattā ^b^balavīriyasamaṅgī^eb^. sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā ca gaditattā ^b^sugato^eb^. taṃ sugataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ^b^saraṇatthaṃ^eb^ saraṇāya parāyaṇāya apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhaparittāṇāya ^b^upehi^eb^ upagaccha, ajja paṭṭhāya ahitanivattanena hitasaṃvaḍḍhanena ``ayaṃ me bhagavā saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ gati paṭisaraṇa''nti bhaja seva, evaṃ jānāhi vā bujjhassūti attho.

[03] 887^b^.^eb^ ^b^rāgavirāga^eb^nti ^a^P0.0232^ea^ ariyamaggamāha. tena hi ariyā anādikālabhāvitampi rāgaṃ virajjenti. ^b^anejamasoka^eb^nti ariyaphalaṃ. tañhi ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya avasiṭṭhānañca sokanimittānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso paṭippassambhanato ^a^M0.0215^ea^ ``anejaṃ asoka''nti ca vuccati. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti sabhāvadhammaṃ. sabhāvato gahetabbadhammo hesa yadidaṃ maggaphalanibbānāni, na pariyattidhammo viya paññattidhammavasena. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti vā paramatthadhammaṃ, nibbānanti attho. samecca sambhuyya paccayehi kataṃ saṅkhataṃ, na saṅkhatanti ^b^asaṅkhataṃ^eb^. tadeva nibbānaṃ. natthi ettha kiñcipi paṭikūlanti ^b^appaṭikūlaṃ^eb^. savanavelāyaṃ upaparikkhaṇavelāyaṃ paṭipajjanavelāyanti sabbadāpi iṭṭhamevāti ^b^madhuraṃ^eb^. sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayāya paṭibhānasampadāya pavattitattā suppavattibhāvato nipuṇabhāvato ca ^b^paguṇaṃ^eb^. vibhajitabbassa atthassa khandhādivasena kusalādivasena uddesādivasena ca suṭṭhu vibhajanato ^b^suvibhattaṃ^eb^. tīhipi padehi pariyattidhammameva vadati. teneva hissa āpāthakāle viya vimaddanakālepi kathentassa viya suṇantassāpi sammukhībhāvato ubhatopaccakkhatāya dassanatthaṃ ^b^``ima''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti yathāvapaṭipajjante apāyadukkhapātato dhāraṇatthena dhammaṃ, idaṃ catubbidhassāpi dhammassa sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. pariyattidhammopi ^a^V0.0196^ea^ hi saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānamattāyapi yathāvapaṭipattiyā apāyadukkhapātato dhāreti eva. imassa ca atthassa idameva vimānaṃ sādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. sādhāraṇabhāvena yathāvuttadhammassa paccakkhaṃ katvā dassento puna ^b^``ima''^eb^nti āha.

[03] 888^b^.^eb^ ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ ariyasaṅghe. ^b^dinna^eb^nti pariccattaṃ annādideyyadhammaṃ. ^b^dinna mahapphala^eb^nti gāthāsukhatthaṃ ^a^P0.0233^ea^ anunāsikalopo kato. accantameva kilesāsucito visujjhanena ^b^sucīsu^eb^ ``sotāpanno sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno''tiādinā (a0 ni0 8.60) vuttesu ^b^catūsu purisayugesu. aṭṭhā^eb^ti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu yugaḷe akatvā visuṃ visuṃ gahaṇena aṭṭha puggalā. gāthāsukhatthameva cettha ^b^``puggala dhammadasā''^eb^ti rassaṃ katvā niddeso. ^b^dhammadasā^eb^ti catusaccadhammassa nibbānadhammassa ca paccakkhato dassanakā. diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvena ^b^saṅghaṃ^eb^.

[03] evaṃ bhagavatā tīhi gāthāhi saraṇaguṇasandassanena saddhiṃ saraṇagamanavidhimhi vutte māṇavo taṃtaṃsaraṇaguṇānussaraṇamukhena saraṇagamanavidhino attano hadaye ṭhapitabhāvaṃ vibhāvento tassā tassā gāthāya ^a^M0.0216^ea^ anantaraṃ ``yo vadataṃ pavaro''tiādinā taṃ taṃ gāthaṃ paccanubhāsi. evaṃ paccanubhāsitvā ṭhitassa pañca sikkhāpadāni sarūpato phalānisaṃsato ca vibhāvetvā tesaṃ samādānavidhiṃ kathesi. so tampi suṭṭhu upadhāretvā pasannamānaso ``handāhaṃ bhagavā gamissāmī''ti vatvā ratanattayaguṇaṃ anussaranto taṃyeva maggaṃ paṭipajji. bhagavāpi ``alaṃ imassa ettakaṃ kusalaṃ devalokūpapattiyā''ti jetavanameva agamāsi.

[03] māṇavassa pana pasannacittassa ratanattayaguṇaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena ``saraṇaṃ upemī''ti pavattacittuppādatāya saraṇesu ca, bhagavatā vuttanayena pañcannaṃ sīlānaṃ adhiṭṭhānena sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitassa teneva nayena ratanattayaguṇe anussarantasseva gacchantassa corā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsu. so te agaṇetvā ratanattayaguṇe anussarantoyeva gacchati. tañceko coro gumbantaraṃ upanissāya ṭhito visapītena sarena sahasāva vijjhitvā ^a^P0.0234^ea^ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā kahāpaṇabhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā attano sahāyehi saddhiṃ pakkāmi. māṇavo pana kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne suttappabuddho viya accharāsahassaparivuto saṭṭhisakaṭabhārālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitattabhāvo nibbatti, tassa vimānassa ābhā sātirekāni vīsatiyojanāni pharitvā tiṭṭhati.

[03] atha māṇavaṃ kālakataṃ disvā setabyagāmavāsino manussā setabyaṃ gantvā tassa mātāpitūnaṃ ^a^V0.0197^ea^ ukkaṭṭhagāmavāsino ca ukkaṭṭhaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa kathesuṃ. taṃ sutvā tassa mātāpitaro ñātimittā brāhmaṇo ca pokkharasāti saparivārā assumukhā rodamānā taṃ padesaṃ agamaṃsu, yebhuyyena setabyavāsino ca ukkaṭṭhavāsino ca icchānaṅgalavāsino ca sannipatiṃsu, mahāsamāgamo ahosi. atha māṇavassa mātāpitaro maggassa avidūre citakaṃ sajjetvā sarīrakiccaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.

[03] atha bhagavā cintesi ``mayi gate chattamāṇavo maṃ vandituṃ āgamissati, āgatañca taṃ katakammaṃ kathāpento kammaphalaṃ paccakkhaṃ kāretvā dhammaṃ desessāmi, evaṃ mahājanassa dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī''ti cintetvā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ taṃ padesaṃ upagantvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle ^a^M0.0217^ea^ nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjento. atha chattamāṇavadevaputtopi attano sampattiṃ paccavekkhitvā, tassā kāraṇaṃ upadhārento saraṇagamanañca sīlasamādānañca disvā, vimhayajāto bhagavati sañjātapasādabahumāno ``idānevāhaṃ gantvā bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca vandissāmi, ratanattayaguṇe ca mahājanassa pākaṭe karissāmī''ti kataññutaṃ nissāya sakalaṃ taṃ araññapadesaṃ ekālokaṃ karonto, saha vimānena āgantvā vimānato oruyha mahatā parivārena saddhiṃ dissamānarūpo upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato ^a^P0.0235^ea^ pādesu sirasā nipatanto abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. taṃ disvā mahājano ``ko nu kho ayaṃ devo vā brahmā vā''ti acchariyabbhutajāto upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ parivāresi. bhagavā tena katapuññakammaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ --
[21] ``na tathā tapati nabhe sūriyo, cando ca na bhāsati na phusso.
[22] yathā atulamidaṃ mahappabhāsaṃ, ko nu tvaṃ tidivā mahiṃ upāgā..
[22] rattimapi yathā divaṃ karoti, parisuddhaṃ vimalaṃ subhaṃ vimānaṃ..
[22] yathā ^a^P0.0236^ea^ ca te adhigatamidaṃ vimānaṃ, tadanupadaṃ avacāsi iggha puṭṭho''ti.. --

[03] 886^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tapatī^eb^ti dippati. ^b^nabhe^eb^ti ākāse. ^b^phusso^eb^ti phussatārakā. ^b^atula^eb^nti anupamaṃ, appamāṇaṃ vā. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā idaṃ tava vimānaṃ anupamaṃ appamāṇaṃ pabhassarabhāvena tato eva mahappabhāsaṃ ākāse dippati, na tathā tārakarūpāni dippanti, na cando, tāni tāva tiṭṭhantu, nāpi sūriyo dippati, evaṃbhūto ko nu tvaṃ devalokato imaṃ bhūmipadesaṃ upagato, taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā imassa mahājanassa kathehīti.

[03] 890^b^.^eb^ ^b^chindatī^eb^ti vicchindati, pavattituṃ adento paṭihanatīti attho. ^b^raṃsī^eb^ti rasmiyo. ^b^pabhaṅkarassā^eb^ti sūriyassa. tassa ca vimānassa pabhā samantato pañcavīsati yojanāni pharitvā tiṭṭhati. tenāha ^b^``sādhikavīsatiyojanāni ābhā''^eb^ti. ^b^rattimapi yathā divaṃ karotī^eb^ti attano pabhāya andhakāraṃ vidhamantaṃ rattibhāgampi divasabhāgaṃ viya karoti. parisamantato anto ceva bahi ca suddhatāya ^b^parisuddhaṃ^eb^. sabbaso malābhāvena ^b^vimalaṃ^eb^. sundaratāya ^b^subhaṃ^eb^.

[03] 891^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahupadumavicitrapuṇḍarīka^eb^nti bahuvidharattakamalañceva vicittavaṇṇasetakamalañca. setakamalaṃ padumaṃ, rattakamalaṃ puṇḍarīkanti vadanti. ^b^vokiṇṇaṃ kusumehī^eb^ti aññehi ca nānāvidhehi pupphehi samokiṇṇaṃ. ^b^nekacitta^eb^nti ^a^M0.0219^ea^ mālākammalatākammādinānāvidhavicittaṃ. ^b^arajavirajahemajālachanna^eb^nti sayaṃ apagatarajaṃ virajena niddosena kañcanajālena chāditaṃ.

[03] 892^b^.^eb^ ^b^rattambarapītavāsasāhī^eb^ti rattavatthāhi ceva pītavatthāhi ca. ekā hi rattaṃ dibbavatthaṃ nivāsetvā pītaṃ uttariyaṃ karoti, aparā pītaṃ nivāsetvā rattaṃ uttariyaṃ karoti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``rattambarapītavāsasāhī''ti ^a^P0.0237^ea^. ^b^agarupiyaṅgucandanussadāhī^eb^ti agarugandhena piyaṅgumālāhi candanagandhehi ca ussadāhi, ussannadibbāgarugandhādikāhīti attho. ^b^kañcanatanusannibhattacāhī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0199^ea^ kanakasadisasukhumacchavīhi. ^b^paripūra^eb^nti tahaṃ tahaṃ vicarantīhi saṅgītipasutāhi ca paripuṇṇaṃ.

[03] 893^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahuketthā^eb^ti bahukā ettha. ^b^anekavaṇṇā^eb^ti nānārūpā. ^b^kusamavibhūsitābharaṇā^eb^ti visesato surabhivāyanatthaṃ dibbakusumehi alaṅkatadibbābharaṇā. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ vimāne. ^b^sumanā^eb^ti sundaramanā pamuditacittā. ^b^anilapamuñcitā pavanti surabhi^eb^nti anilena pamuñcitagandhānaṃ pupphānaṃ vāyunā vimuttapattapuṭaṃ viya vibandhatāya vikasitatāya ca sugandhaṃ pavāyanti. ``anilapadhūpitā''tipi paṭhanti, vātena mandaṃ āvuyhamānā hemamayapupphāti attho. kanakacīrakādīhi veṇiādīsu otatatāya ^b^tapaniyavitatā^eb^. yebhuyyena kañcanābharaṇehi acchāditasarīratāya ^b^suvaṇṇachannā. naranāriyo^eb^ti devaputtā devadhītaro ca bahukā ettha tava vimāneti dasseti.
[03] 894^b^.^eb^ ^b^iṅghā^eb^ti codanatthe nipāto ^b^puṭṭho^eb^ti pucchito imassa mahājanassa kammaphalapaccakkhabhāvāyāti adhippāyo.
[22] tava ratanavarassa dhammaṃ sutvā, karissāmīti ca bravittha chatto..
[22] noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ..
[27] na hi pāṇesu asaññataṃ avaṇṇayiṃsu sappaññā.
[22] noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ..
[22] noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ..
[21] ``mā ^a^V0.0200^ea^ ca parajanassa rakkhitāyo, parabhariyā agamā anariyametaṃ.
[22] noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ..
[21] ``mā ca vitathaṃ aññathā abhāṇi, na hi musāvādaṃ avaṇṇayiṃsu sappaññā.
[22] noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ..
[21] ``yena ca purisassa apeti saññā, taṃ majjaṃ parivajjayassu sabbaṃ.
[22] noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ..
[21] ``svāhaṃ idha pañca sikkhā karitvā, paṭipajjitvā tathāgatassa dhamme.
[22] dvepathamagamāsiṃ coramajjhe, te maṃ tattha vadhiṃsu bhogahetu..
[21] ``ettakamidaṃ ^a^M0.0221^ea^ anussarāmi kusalaṃ, tato paraṃ na me vijjati aññaṃ.
[22] tena ^a^P0.0239^ea^ sucaritena kammunāhaṃ, uppanno tidivesu kāmakāmī..
[22] jalamiva yasasā samekkhamānā, bahukāmaṃ pihayanti hīnakammā..
[21] ``passa katipayāya desanāya, sugatiñcamhi gato sukhañca patto.
[22] ye ca te satataṃ suṇanti dhammaṃ, maññe te amataṃ phusanti khemaṃ..
[21] ``appampi kataṃ mahāvipākaṃ, vipulaṃ hoti tathāgatassa dhamme.
[22] passa katapuññatāya chatto, obhāseti pathaviṃ yathāpi sūriyo..
[21] ``kimidaṃ kusalaṃ kimācarema, icceke hi samecca mantayanti.
[22] te mayaṃ punareva laddha mānusattaṃ, paṭipannā viharemu sīlavanto..
[21] ``bahukāro anukampako ca satthā, iti me sati agamā divā divassa.
[22] svāhaṃ upagatomhi saccanāmaṃ, anukampassu punapi suṇemha dhammaṃ..
[21] ``ye ^a^V0.0201^ea^ cidha pajahanti kāmarāgaṃ, bhavarāgānusayañca pahāya mohaṃ.
[22] na ca te puna mupenti gabbhaseyyaṃ, parinibbānagatā hi sītibhūtā''ti..

[03] 895^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0222^ea^ ^b^sayamidha pathe samecca māṇavenā^eb^ti idha imasmiṃ pathe mahāmagge sayameva upagatena māṇavena brāhmaṇakumārena samecca samāgantvā. diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi sattānaṃ yathārahamanusāsanato ^b^satthā^eb^ bhagavā, tvaṃ yaṃ māṇavaṃ yathādhammaṃ ^a^P0.0240^ea^ ^b^anusāsi anukampamāno^eb^ anuggaṇhanto, ^b^tava ratanavarassa^eb^ aggaratanassa sammāsambuddhassa, taṃ ^b^dhammaṃ sutvā iti^eb^ evaṃ ^b^karissāmi^eb^ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmīti, so ^b^chatto^eb^ chattanāmako māṇavo ^b^bravittha^eb^ kathesīti padayojanā.

[03] 896^b^.^eb^ evaṃ yathāpucchitaṃ kammaṃ kāraṇato dassetvā idāni taṃ sarūpato vibhāgato ca dassento satthārā samādapitabhāvaṃ attanā ca tattha pacchā patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``jinavarapavara''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante^eb^ti bhante bhagavā ``saraṇagamanaṃ jānāsī''ti tayā vutto ``no''ti na ``jānāmī''ti paṭhamaṃ avocaṃ ahaṃ. ^b^pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsi^eb^nti pacchā tayā vuttaṃ kathaṃ parivattento tava vacanaṃ tatheva akāsiṃ paṭipajjiṃ, tīṇipi saraṇāni upagacchinti attho.

[03] 897^b^.^eb^ ^b^vividha^eb^nti uccāvacaṃ, appasāvajjaṃ mahāsāvajjañcāti attho. ^b^mā carassū^eb^ti mā akāsi. ^b^asuci^eb^nti kilesāsucimissatāya na suciṃ. ^b^pāṇesu asaññata^eb^nti pāṇaghātato avirataṃ. ^b^na hi avaṇṇayiṃsū^eb^ti na hi vaṇṇayanti. paccūppannakālatthe hi idaṃ atītakālavacanaṃ. atha vā ``avaṇṇayiṃsū''ti ekadesena sakalassa kālassa upalakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā yathā na vaṇṇayiṃsu atītamaddhānaṃ, evaṃ etarahipi na vaṇṇayanti, anāgatepi na vaṇṇayissantīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 898-900^b^.^eb^ ^b^parajanassa rakkhita^eb^nti parapariggahitavatthu. tenāha ``adinna''nti. ^b^mā agamā^eb^ti mā ajjhācari. ^b^vitatha^eb^nti atathaṃ, musāti attho. ^b^aññathā^eb^ti aññathāva, vitathasaññī evaṃ vitathanti jānanto evaṃ mā bhaṇīti attho.

[03] 901^b^.^eb^ ^b^yenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0223^ea^ ^a^P0.0241^ea^ yena majjena, pītenāti adhippāyo. ^b^apetī^eb^ti vigacchati. ^b^saññā^eb^ti dhammasaññā, lokasaññā eva vā. ^b^sabba^eb^nti anavasesaṃ, bījato paṭṭhāyāti attho.

[03] 902^b^.^eb^ ^b^svāha^eb^nti ^a^V0.0202^ea^ so tadā chattamāṇavabhūto ahaṃ. ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ maggapadese, imasmiṃ vā tava sāsane. tenāha ^b^``tathāgatassa dhamme''^eb^ti. ^b^pañca sikkhā^eb^ti pañca sīlāni. ^b^karitvā^eb^ti ādiyitvā, adhiṭṭhāyāti attho. ^b^dvepatha^eb^nti dvinnaṃ gāmasīmānaṃ vemajjhabhūtaṃ pathaṃ, sīmantarikapathanti attho. ^b^te^eb^ti te corā. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti sīmantarikamagge. ^b^bhogahetū^eb^ti āmisakiñcikkhanimittaṃ.
[03] 903^b^.^eb^ ^b^tato^eb^ti yathāvuttakusalato ^b^paraṃ^eb^ upari ^b^aññaṃ kusalaṃ na vijjati^eb^ na upalabbhati, yamahaṃ anussareyyanti attho. ^b^kāmakāmī^eb^ti yathicchitakāmaguṇasamaṅgī.

[03] 904^b^.^eb^ ^b^khaṇamuhuttasaññamassā^eb^ti khaṇamuhuttamattaṃ pavattasīlassa. ^b^anudhammappaṭipattiyā^eb^ti yathādhigatassa phalassa anurūpadhammaṃ paṭipajjamānassa bhagavā passa, tuyhaṃ ovādadhammassa vā anurūpāya dhammapaṭipattiyā vuttaniyāmeneva saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādānassa cāti attho. ^b^jalamiva yasasā^eb^ti iddhiyā parivārasampattiyā ca jalantaṃ viya. ^b^samekkhamānā^eb^ti passantā. ^b^bahukā^eb^ti bahavo. ^b^pihayantī^eb^ti ``kathaṃ nu kho mayaṃ edisā bhaveyyāmā''ti patthenti. ^b^hīnakammā^eb^ti mama sampattito nihīnabhogā.
[03] 905^b^.^eb^ ^b^katipayāyā^eb^ti appikāya. ^b^ye^eb^ti ye bhikkhū ceva upāsakādayo ca. ca-saddo byatireke. ^b^te^eb^ti tava. ^b^satata^eb^nti divase divase.

[03] 906^b^.^eb^ ^b^vipula^eb^nti uḷāraphalaṃ vipulānubhāvaṃ. ^b^tathāgatassa dhamme^eb^ti tathāgatassa sāsane ovāde ṭhatvā katanti yojanā. evaṃ anuddesikavasena vuttamevatthaṃ attuddesikavasena dassento ^b^``passā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^passā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ vadati, attānameva vā aññaṃ viya ca katvā vadati.

[03] 907^b^.^eb^ ^b^kimidaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0224^ea^ ^a^P0.0242^ea^ ^b^kusalaṃ kimācaremā^eb^ti kusalaṃ nāmetaṃ kiṃsabhāvaṃ kīdisaṃ, kathaṃ vā taṃ ācareyyāma. ^b^icceke hi samecca mantayantī^eb^ti evameke samecca samāgantvā pathaviṃ parivattentā viya sineruṃ ukkhipantā viya ca sudukkaraṃ katvā mantayanti vicārenti, mayaṃ pana akiccheneva punapi kusalaṃ ācareyyāmāti adhippāyo. tenevāha ^b^``maya''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] 908^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahukāro^eb^ti bahūpakāro, mahāupakāro vā. ^b^anukampako^eb^ti kāruṇiko. ^b^ma^eb^-kāro ^a^V0.0203^ea^ padasandhikaro. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ, bhagavato attani paṭipannākāraṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^me satī^eb^ti mayi sati vijjamāne, corehi avadhite evāti attho. ^b^divā divassā^eb^ti divasassapi divā, kālassevāti attho. ^b^svāha^eb^nti so chattamāṇavabhūto ahaṃ. ^b^saccanāma^eb^nti ``bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho''tiādināmehi avitathanāmaṃ bhūtatthanāmaṃ. ^b^anukampassū^eb^ti anuggaṇhāhi. ^b^punapī^eb^ti bhiyyopi ^b^suṇemu,^eb^ tava dhammaṃ suṇeyyāmayevāti attho.

[03] evaṃ devaputto sabbametaṃ kataññutābhāve ṭhatvā satthu payirupāsane ca dhammassavane ca atittimeva dīpento vadati. bhagavā devaputtassa ca tattha sannipatitaparisāya ca ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā anupubbikathaṃ kathesi. atha nesaṃ allacittataṃ ñatvā sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanaṃ pakāsesi. desanāpariyosāne devaputto ceva mātāpitaro cassa sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahato ca janakāyassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.

[03] 909^b^.^eb^ paṭhamaphale patiṭṭhito devaputto uparimaggesu attano garucittīkāraṃ, tadadhigamassa ca mahānisaṃsataṃ vibhāvento ^b^``ye cidha pajahanti kāmarāga''^eb^nti pariyosānagāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^ye idha^eb^ imasmiṃ sāsane ṭhitā ^b^pajahanti^eb^ anavasesato samucchindanti ^b^kāmarāgaṃ, na ca te puna upenti^eb^ ^a^P0.0243^ea^ ^b^gabbhaseyyaṃ^eb^ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā. ye ca pana ^b^pahāya mohaṃ^eb^ sabbaso samugghātetvā ^b^bhavarāgānusayañca^eb^ pajahanti, te puna upenti gabbhaseyyanti vattabbameva natthi. kasmā? ^b^parinibbānagatā hi sītibhūtā,^eb^ te hi uttamapurisā anupādisesāya ^a^M0.0225^ea^ nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānaṃ gatā evaṃ idheva sabbavedayitānaṃ sabbapariḷāhānaṃ byantibhāvena sītibhūtā.

[03] iti devaputto attano ariyasotasamāpannabhāvaṃ pavedento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa apacitiṃ dassetvā mātāpitaro āpucchitvā devalokameva gato, satthāpi uṭṭhāyāsanā gato saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. māṇavassa pana mātāpitaro brāhmaṇo pokkharasāti sabbo ca mahājano bhagavantaṃ anugantvā nivatti. bhagavā jetavanaṃ gantvā sannipatitāya parisāya imaṃ vimānaṃ vitthārato kathesi. sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0204^ea^ ^b^maṇithūṇaṃ vimāna^eb^nti kakkaṭakarasadāyakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena aññataro bhikkhu āraddhavipassako kaṇṇasūlena pīḷito akallasarīratāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ nāsakkhi, vejjehi vuttavidhinā bhesajje katepi rogo na vūpasami. so bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi. athassa bhagavā ``kakkaṭakarasabhojanaṃ sappāya''nti ñatvā āha ``gaccha tvaṃ bhikkhu magadhakhette piṇḍāya carāhī''ti.

[03] so bhikkhu ``dīghadassinā addhā kiñci diṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī''ti cintetvā ``sādhu bhante''ti bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pattacīvaramādāya magadhakhettaṃ gantvā ^a^P0.0244^ea^ aññatarassa khettapālassa kuṭiyā dvāre piṇḍāya aṭṭhāsi. so ca khettapālo kakkaṭakarasaṃ sampādetvā bhattañca pacitvā ``thokaṃ vissamitvā bhuñjissāmī''ti nisinno theraṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā kuṭikāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā kakkaṭakarasabhattaṃ adāsi. therassa taṃ bhattaṃ thokaṃ bhuttassayeva kaṇṇasūlaṃ paṭippassambhi, ghaṭasatena nhāto viya ahosi ^a^M0.0226^ea^. so sappāyāhāravasena cittaphāsukaṃ labhitvā vipassanāvasena cittaṃ abhininnāmento apariyositeyeva bhojane anavasesato āsave khepetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāya khettapālaṃ āha ``upāsaka, tava piṇḍapātabhojanena mayhaṃ rogo vūpasanto, kāyacittaṃ kallaṃ jātaṃ, tvampi imassa puññassa phalena vigatakāyacittadukkho bhavissasī''ti vatvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.

[03] khettapālo aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike maṇithambhe kanakavimāne sattasatakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍite veḷuriyamayagabbhe nibbatti, dvāre cassa yathūpacitakammasaṃsūcako muttāsikkāgato suvaṇṇakakkaṭako olambamāno aṭṭhāsi. athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno pubbe vuttanayena tattha gato taṃ disvā imāhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[22] kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā..
[21] ``tatthacchasi ^a^V0.0205^ea^ pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ.
[22] dibbā ^a^P0.0245^ea^ rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā..
[21] ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[21] ``pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ.
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[22] pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phala''nti.. -- vuttaṃ.
[21] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo, tena me idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca me bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[21] ``akkhāmi te bhikkhu mahānubhāva, manussabhūto yamakāsi puññaṃ.
[22] tenamhi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..

[03] 910^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ucca^eb^nti accuggataṃ. ^b^maṇithūṇa^eb^nti padumarāgādimaṇimayathambhaṃ. ^b^samantato^eb^ti catūsupi passesu. ^b^rucakatthatā^eb^ti tassaṃ tassaṃ bhūmiyaṃ suvaṇṇaphalakehi atthatā.

[03] 911^b^.^eb^ ^b^pivasi khādasi cā^eb^ti kālena kālaṃ upayujjamānaṃ gandhapānaṃ sudhābhojanañca sandhāya vadati. ^b^pavadantī^eb^ti pavajjanti. ^b^dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañcā^eb^ti dibbā rasā anappakā pañca kāmaguṇā ettha etasmiṃ tava vimāne saṃvijjantīti attho. ^b^suvaṇṇachannā^eb^ti hemābharaṇavibhūsitā.

[03] 915^b^.^eb^ ^b^satisamuppādakaro^eb^ti ^a^V0.0206^ea^ satuppādakaro, yena puññakammena ayaṃ dibbasampatti mayā laddhā, tattha satuppādassa kārako, ``kakkaṭakarasadānena ayaṃ tayā sampatti ^a^P0.0246^ea^ laddhā''ti evaṃ satuppādaṃ karontoti attho. ^b^niṭṭhito jātarūpassā^eb^ti jātarūpena siddho jātarūpamayo. ekamekasmiṃ passe pañca pañca katvā dasa pādā etassāti ^b^dasapādako dvāre kakkaṭako ṭhito sobhati.^eb^ so eva mama puññakammaṃ tādisānaṃ mahesīnaṃ vibhāveti, na ettha mayā vattabbaṃ atthīti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``tena metādiso vaṇṇo''^eb^tiādi. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0228^ea^ maṇithūṇab^nti dvārapālakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena ca samayena rājagahe aññataro upāsako cattāri niccabhattāni saṅghassa deti. tassa pana gehaṃ pariyante ṭhitaṃ corabhayena yebhuyyena pihitadvārameva hoti. bhikkhū gantvā kadāci dvārassa pihitattā bhattaṃ aladdhāva paṭigacchanti. upāsako bhariyaṃ āha ``kiṃ, bhadde, ayyānaṃ sakkaccaṃ bhikkhā dīyatī''ti? sā āha ``ekesu divasesu ayyā nāgamiṃsū''ti. ``kiṃ kāraṇa''nti? ``dvārassa pihitattā maññe''ti. taṃ sutvā upāsako saṃvegappatto hutvā ekaṃ purisaṃ dvārapālaṃ katvā ṭhapesi ``tvaṃ ajjato paṭṭhāya dvāraṃ rakkhanto nisīda, yadā ca ayyā āgamissanti, tadā te pavesetvā paviṭṭhānaṃ nesaṃ pattapaṭiggahaṇāasanapaññāpanādi sabbaṃ yuttapayuttaṃ jānāhī''ti. so ``sādhū''ti tathā karonto bhikkhūnaṃ santike dhammaṃ sutvā uppannasaddho kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahi, sakkaccaṃ bhikkhū upaṭṭhahi.

[03] aparabhāge niccabhattadāyako upāsako kālaṃ katvā yāmesu nibbatti. dvārapālo pana sakkaccaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā parassa pariccāge veyyāvaccakaraṇena anumodanena ca tāvatiṃsesu uppajji. tassa dvādasayojanikaṃ kanakavimānantiādi sabbaṃ kakkaṭakavimāne vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. pucchāvissajjanagāthā evamāgatā --
[22] kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā..
[21] ``tatthacchasi ^a^V0.0207^ea^ pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ.
[22] dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā..
[40] 920^b^.^eb^ ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo...pe0... vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[22] ettāvatā ṭhassati puññakammo, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūto..

[03] 923^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^dibbaṃ mamaṃ vassasahassamāyū^eb^ti yasmiṃ devanikāye sayaṃ uppanno, tesaṃ tāvatiṃsadevānaṃ āyuppamāṇameva vadati. tesañhi manussānaṃ gaṇanāya vassasataṃ eko rattidivo, tāya rattiyā tiṃsarattiko māso, tena māsena dvādasamāsiko saṃvaccharo, tena saṃvaccharena sahassasaṃvaccharāni āyu, taṃ manussānaṃ gaṇanāya tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni honti. ^b^vācābhigīta^eb^nti vācāya abhigītaṃ, ``āgacchantu ayyā, idaṃ āsanaṃ paññattaṃ, idha nisīdathā''tiādinā, ``kiṃ ayyānaṃ sarīrassa ārogyaṃ, kiṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ phāsuka''ntiādinā paṭisanthāravasena ca vācāya kathitamattaṃ ^a^P0.0248^ea^. ^b^manasā pavattita^eb^nti ``ime ayyā pesalā brahmacārino dhammacārino''tiādinā cittena pavattitaṃ pasādamattaṃ, na pana mama santakaṃ kiñci pariccattaṃ atthīti dasseti. ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti ettakena evaṃ kathanamattena pasādamattenapi. ^b^ṭhassati puññakammo^eb^ti katapuñño nāma hutvā devaloke ṭhassati ciraṃ pavattissati, tiṭṭhanto ca dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgībhūto tasmiṃ devanikāye devānaṃ valañjaniyāmeneva dibbehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūto samannāgato hutvā indriyāni paricārento viharatīti attho. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0230^ea^ ^a^V0.0208^ea^ ^b^maṇithūṇa^eb^nti karaṇīyavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena sāvatthivāsī eko upāsako nhānopakaraṇāni gahetvā aciravatiṃ gantvā nhatvā āgacchanto bhagavantaṃ sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā evamāha ``bhante kena nimantitā''ti. bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi. so kenaci animantitabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha ``adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā bhattaṃ anukampaṃ upādāyā''ti. adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena. so bhagavantaṃ attano gehaṃ netvā buddhārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha bhagavantaṃ nisīdāpetvā paṇītena annapānena santappesi. bhagavā katabhattakicco tassa anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. sesaṃ anantaravimānasadisaṃ. tena vuttaṃ --
[40] 926^b^.^eb^ ``uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimānaṃ...pe0... nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā..
