[40] 928^b^.^eb^ ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo...pe0... vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[40] 933^b^.^eb^ ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0... vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[03] 931^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^paṇḍitenā^eb^ti sappaññena. ^b^vijānatā^eb^ti attano hitāhitaṃ jānantena. ^b^sammaggatesū^eb^ti sammāpaṭipannesu, ^b^buddhesū^eb^ti sammāsambuddhesu.

[03] 932^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthāyā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0231^ea^ hitāya, vuḍḍhiyā vā. ^b^araññā^eb^ti vihārato, jetavanaṃ sandhāya vadati ^a^V0.0209^ea^. ^b^tāvatiṃsūpago^eb^ti tāvatiṃsadevakāyaṃ, tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ vā uppajjanavasena upagato. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[03] sattamavimānaṃ chaṭṭhavimānasadisaṃ. kevalaṃ tattha upāsakena bhagavato āhāro dinno, idha aññatarassa therassa. esaṃ vuttanayameva. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā..
[21] ``tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ.
[22] dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā..
[40] 937^b^.^eb^ ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo...pe0... vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatīti..
[40] 942^b^.^eb^ ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0... vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0210^ea^ ^b^maṇithūṇaṃ vimāna^eb^nti sūcivimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa cīvarakammaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti, attho ca hoti sūciyā. so rājagahe piṇḍāya caranto kammārassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. taṃ disvā kammāro āha ``kena, bhante, attho''ti? ``cīvarakammaṃ kātabbaṃ atthi, sūciyā attho''ti. kammāro pasannamānaso katapariyositā dve sūciyo datvā ``punapi, bhante, sūciyā atthe sati mama ācikkheyyāthā''ti vatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. thero tassa anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. so aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajji. atha āyasmā mahāmoggallāno devacārikaṃ caranto taṃ devaputtaṃ imāhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[21] ``yaṃ dadāti na taṃ hoti, yañceva dajjā tañceva seyyo.

[03] 949^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0233^ea^ ^b^yaṃ dadātī^eb^ti yādisaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dadāti. ^b^na taṃ hotī^eb^ti tassa tādisameva phalaṃ na hoti. atha kho khettasampattiyā ca cittasampattiyā ca tato vipulataraṃ uḷāratarameva phalaṃ hoti. tasmā ^b^yañceva dajjā tañceva seyyo^eb^ti yaṃkiñcideva vijjamānaṃ dajjā dadeyya, tañceva tadeva seyyo, yassa kassaci anavajjassa deyyadhammassa dānameva seyyo, kasmā? mayā hi ^b^sūci dinnā sūcimeva seyyo,^eb^ sūcidānameva mayhaṃ seyyaṃ jātaṃ, yato ayamīdisī sampatti laddhāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0211^ea^ ^b^maṇithūṇa^eb^nti dutiyasūcivimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena rājagahavāsī eko tunnakārako vihārapekkhako hutvā veḷuvanaṃ gato. tattha aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ veḷuvane katasūciyā cīvaraṃ sibbantaṃ disvā sūcigharena saddhiṃ sūciyo adāsi. sesaṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayameva.
[22] vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. -- pucchi.
[22] tassa adāsahaṃ sūciṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi..
[21] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0... vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..

[03] ^b^susukkakhandhaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0234^ea^ ^a^P0.0252^ea^ ^b^abhiruyha nāga^eb^nti nāgavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ upagato. tattha addasa aññataraṃ devaputtaṃ sabbasetaṃ mahantaṃ dibbanāgaṃ abhiruyha mahantena parivārena mahatā dibbānubhāvena ākāsena gacchantaṃ, sabbā disā cando viya sūriyo viya ca obhāsayamānaṃ. disvā yena so devaputto tenupasaṅkami. atha so devaputto ^a^V0.0212^ea^ tato oruyha āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. atha thero --
[21] ``susukkakhandhaṃ abhiruyha nāgaṃ, akācinaṃ dantiṃ baliṃ mahājavaṃ.
[22] abhiruyha gajavaraṃ sukappitaṃ, idhāgamā vehāyasaṃ antalikkhe..
[21] ``nāgassa dantesu duvesu nimmitā, acchodakā paduminiyo suphullā.
[22] padumesu ca tūriyagaṇā pavajjare, imā ca naccanti manoharāyo..
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --

[03] 961^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^susukkakhandha^eb^nti suṭṭhu setakhandhaṃ. kiñcāpi tassa nāgassa cattāro pādā, vatthikosaṃ, mukhappadeso, ubho kaṇṇā, vāladhīti ettakaṃ muñcitvā sabbo kāyo setova, khandhappadesassa pana sātisayaṃ dhavalataratāya ^a^P0.0253^ea^ vuttaṃ ``susukkakhandha''nti. ^b^nāga^eb^nti dibbaṃ hatthināgaṃ. ^b^akācina^eb^nti niddosaṃ ^a^M0.0235^ea^, sabalalavaṅkatilakādichavidosavirahitanti attho. ``ājānīya''ntipi pāḷi, ājānīyalakkhaṇūpetanti attho. ^b^danti^eb^nti vipularuciradantavantaṃ. ^b^bali^eb^nti balavantaṃ mahābalaṃ. ^b^mahājava^eb^nti atijavaṃ sīghagāmiṃ. puna ^b^abhiruyhā^eb^ti ettha anunāsikalopo daṭṭhabbo, abhiruyhaṃ ārohanīyanti vuttaṃ hoti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[03] evaṃ pana therena puṭṭho devaputto attanā katakammaṃ kathento --
[22] vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. -- imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi.

[03] tassattho ^a^V0.0213^ea^ -- ahaṃ pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhassa yojanike kanakathūpe vaṇṭato muccitvā gacchamūle patitāni aṭṭha muttapupphāni labhitvā tāni gahetvā pūjanavasena pasannacitto hutvā abhiropesiṃ pūjesiṃ.

[03] atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhe parinibbute yojanike kanakathūpe ca kārite saparivāro kikī kāsirājā ca nāgarā ca negamā ca jānapadā ca divase divase pupphapūjaṃ karonti. tesu tathā karontesu pupphāni mahagghāni dullabhāni ca ahesuṃ. atheko upāsako mālākāravīthiyaṃ vicaritvā ekamekena kahāpaṇena ekamekampi pupphaṃ alabhanto aṭṭha kahāpaṇāni gahetvā pupphārāmaṃ gantvā mālākāraṃ āha ``imehi aṭṭhahi kahāpaṇehi ^a^P0.0254^ea^ aṭṭha pupphāni dehī''ti. ``natthayyo pupphāni, sammadeva upadhāretvā ocinitvā dinnānī''ti. ``ahaṃ oloketvā gaṇhāmī''ti. ``yadi evaṃ, ārāmaṃ pavisitvā gavesāhī''ti. so pavisitvā gavesanto patitāni aṭṭha pupphāni labhitvā mālākāraṃ āha ``gaṇha, tāta, kahāpaṇānī''ti. ``tava puññena laddhāni, nāhaṃ kahāpaṇāni gaṇhāmī''ti āha. itaro ``nāhaṃ mudhā pupphāni gahetvā bhagavato pūjaṃ karissāmī''ti kahāpaṇāni tassa purato ṭhapetvā pupphāni gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0236^ea^ gantvā pasannacitto pūjaṃ akāsi. so aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajjitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā punapi devaloke, punapi devaloketi evaṃ aparāparaṃ devesuyeva saṃsaranto tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena imasmimpi buddhuppāde tāvatiṃsesuyeva uppajji. taṃ sandhāya heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ``tattha addasa aññataraṃ devaputta''ntiādi.

[03] taṃ panetaṃ pavattiṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno manussalokaṃ āgantvā bhagavato ārocesi. bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi. sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^mahantaṃ nāgaṃ abhiruyhā^eb^ti dutiyanāgavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena rājagahe aññataro upāsako saddho pasanno pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhito uposathadivasesu uposathasīlaṃ samādiyitvā purebhattaṃ attano vibhavānurūpaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dānāni datvā ^a^V0.0214^ea^ sayaṃ bhuñjitvā suddhavatthanivattho suddhuttarāsaṅgo pacchābhattaṃ yebhuyyena aṭṭha pānāni gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyādetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇāti. evaṃ so sakkaccaṃ dānamayaṃ sīlamayañca bahuṃ sucaritaṃ upacinitvā ito cuto tāvatiṃsesu uppajji. tassa puññānubhāvena sabbaseto ^a^P0.0255^ea^ mahanto dibbo hatthināgo pāturahosi. so taṃ abhiruyha mahantena parivārena mahantena dibbānubhāvena kālena kālaṃ uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchati.

[03] athekadivasaṃ kataññutāya codiyamāno aḍḍharattisamaye taṃ dibbanāgaṃ abhiruyha mahatā parivārena ``bhagavantaṃ vandissāmī''ti devalokato āgantvā kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi ^a^M0.0237^ea^. taṃ bhagavato samīpe ṭhito āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavato anuññāya imāhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[22] obhāsento disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā..
[03] tatthā pucchito sopi tassa gāthāhi eva byākāsi.
[22] pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ''..
[22] pāṇātipātā virato ahosiṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayissaṃ..
[21] ``amajjapo no ca musā abhāṇiṃ, sakena dārena ca tuṭṭho ahosiṃ.
[22] annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ..
[03] tattha apubbaṃ natthi, sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ko^eb^ ^a^M0.0238^ea^ ^b^nu dibbena yānenā^eb^ti tatiyanāgavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā ^a^P0.0256^ea^ rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. tena samayena tayo khīṇāsavattherā gāmakāvāse vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu. te vutthavassā pavāretvā ``bhagavantaṃ vandissāmā''ti rājagahaṃ uddissa gacchantā antarāmagge sāyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ gāmake micchādiṭṭhikabrāhmaṇassa ucchukhettasamīpaṃ gantvā ucchupālaṃ pucchiṃsu ``āvuso, sakkā ajja rājagahaṃ pāpuṇitu''nti. ``na sakkā, bhante, ito aḍḍhayojane rājagahaṃ, idheva vasitvā sve gacchathā''ti āha. ``atthettha koci vasanayoggo āvāso''ti? ``natthi, bhante, ahaṃ pana vo vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānissāmī''ti. therā adhivāsesuṃ.

[03] so ucchūsuyeva yathāṭhitesu sākhāmaṇḍapākārena daṇḍakāni bandhitvā ucchupaṇṇehi chādetvā heṭṭhā palālaṃ attharitvā ekassa therassa adāsi, dutiyassa therassa tīhi ucchūhi daṇḍakasaṅkhepena bandhitvā tiṇena chādetvā heṭṭhā ca tiṇasantharaṃ katvā adāsi, itarassa attano kuṭiyaṃ dve tayo daṇḍake sākhāyo ca nīharitvā cīvarena paṭicchādento cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā adāsi. te tattha vasiṃsu. atha vibhātāya rattiyā kālasseva bhattaṃ pacitvā dantakaṭṭhañca mukhodakañca datvā saha ucchurasena bhattaṃ adāsi. tesaṃ bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā gacchantānaṃ ekekaṃ ucchuṃ adāsi ``mayhaṃ bhāgo bhavissatī''ti. so thokaṃ maggaṃ there anugantvā nivattanto attano veyyāvaccañca dānañca ārabbha uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nivatti.

[03] khettasāmiko pana gacchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipathena āgacchanto bhikkhū pucchi ``kuto vo ucchu laddhā''ti? ``ucchupālakena dinnā''ti. taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo kupito anattamano taṭataṭāyamāno kodhābhibhūto tassa piṭṭhito upadhāvitvā muggarena taṃ paharanto ekappahāreneva ^a^P0.0257^ea^ jīvitā ^a^V0.0216^ea^ voropesi. so attanā katapuññakammameva anussaranto kālaṃ katvā sudhammādevasabhāyaṃ nibbatti. tassa puññānubhāvena sabbaseto mahanto dibbavaravāraṇo nibbatti.

[03] ucchupālakassa ^a^M0.0239^ea^ maraṇaṃ sutvā tassa mātāpitaro ceva ñātimittā ca assumukhā rodamānā taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu, sabbe ca gāmavāsino sannipatiṃsu. tatrassa mātāpitaro sarīrakiccaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu. tasmiṃ khaṇe so devaputto taṃ dibbahatthiṃ abhiruhitvā sabbatāḷāvacaraparivuto pañcaṅgikena tūriyena pavajjamānena mahantena parivārena mahatiyā deviddhiyā devalokato āgantvā tāya parisāya dissamānarūpo ākāse aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ tattha paṇḍitajātiko puriso imāhi gāthāhi tena katapuññakammaṃ pucchi --
[22] ajānantā taṃ pucchāma, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya''nti..
[21] ``nāmhi devo na gandhabbo, nāpi sakko purindado.
[22] sudhammā nāma ye devā, tesaṃ aññataro aha''nti..
[22] kiṃ katvā mānuse kammaṃ, sudhammaṃ upapajjatī''ti -- punapi pucchi.
[22] tiṇṇaṃ aññataraṃ datvā, sudhammaṃ upapajjatī''ti.. -- punapi byākāsi.

[03] 976^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tūriyatāḷitanigghoso^eb^ti tāḷitapañcaṅgitadibbatūriyanigghoso attānaṃ uddissa pavajjamānadibbatūriyasaddo ^a^P0.0258^ea^. ^b^antalikkhe mahīyatī^eb^ti ākāse ṭhatvā ākāsaṭṭheneva mahatā parivārena pūjīyati.

[03] 977^b^.^eb^ ^b^devatā^eb^ ^a^M0.0240^ea^ ^a^V0.0217^ea^ ^b^nusī^eb^ti devatā nu asi, kiṃ nu tvaṃ devosīti attho. ^b^gandhabbo^eb^ti gandhabbakāyikadevo asīti attho. ^b^adu sakko purindado^eb^ti udāhu pure dadātīti ``purindado''ti vissuto sakko nusi, atha sakko devarājā asīti attho. ettha ca satipi sakkagandhabbānaṃ devabhāve tesaṃ visuṃ gahitattā gobalibaddhañāyena tadaññadevavācako devasaddo daṭṭhabbo.

[03] 978^b^.^eb^ atha devaputto ``vissajjanaṃ nāma pucchāsabhāgena hotī''ti tehi pucchitaṃ devagandhabbasakkabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā attānaṃ ācikkhanto ``namhi devo na gandhabbo''tiādimāha. tattha ^b^namhi devo^eb^ti tayā āsaṅkito yo koci devo na homi na gandhabbo na sakko, apica kho ^b^sudhammā nāma ye devā, tesaṃ aññataro ahaṃ,^eb^ sudhammā devatā nāma tāvatiṃsadevanikāyasseva aññataradevanikāyo. so kira ucchupālo tesaṃ devānaṃ sampattiṃ sutvā pageva tattha cittaṃ paṇidhāya ṭhitoti keci vadanti.
[03] 979^b^.^eb^ ^b^puthu^eb^nti mahantaṃ, paripuṇṇaṃ katvāti attho. sakkaccakiriyādīpanatthañhetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 980^b^.^eb^ sudhammādevayānaṃ puṭṭho devaputto kakaṇṭakanimittaṃ vadanto viya diṭṭhamattameva gahetvā attanā katapuññaṃ ācikkhanto ^b^``ucchāgāra''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^tiṇṇaṃ aññataraṃ datvā^eb^ti yadipi mayā tīṇi agārāni dinnāni, tīsu pana aññatarenāti ayamatthopi sijjhatīti nayaggāhena devaputto evamāha. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] evaṃ ^a^P0.0259^ea^ so tena pucchi tamatthaṃ vissajjetvā ratanattayaguṇaṃ pakāsento mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ sammodanaṃ katvā devalokameva gato. manussā devaputtassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca sañjātapasādabahumānā bahuṃ dānūpakaraṇaṃ sajjetvā sakaṭānaṃ pūretvā veḷuvanaṃ gantvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā satthu taṃ pavattiṃ ārocayiṃsu. satthā taṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ tatheva vatvā tameva atthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā ^a^M0.0241^ea^ vitthārena dhammaṃ desetvā te saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. te ca patiṭṭhitasaddhā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano gāmaṃ upagantvā ucchupālassa mataṭṭhāne vihāraṃ kārayiṃsūti.

[03] ^b^daḷhadhammā^eb^ ^a^V0.0218^ea^ ^b^nisārassā^eb^ti cūḷarathavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavati parinibbute dhātuvibhāgaṃ katvā tattha tattha satthu thūpesu patiṭṭhāpiyamānesu mahākassapattherappamukhesu dhammaṃ saṅgāyituṃ uccinitvā gahitesu sāvakesu yāva vassūpagamanā veneyyāpekkhāya attano attano parisāya saddhiṃ tattha tattha vasantesu āyasmā mahākaccāyano paccantadese aññatarasmiṃ araññāyatane viharati. tena samayena assakaraṭṭhe potalinagare assakarājā rajjaṃ kāreti, tassa jeṭṭhāya deviyā putto sujāto nāma kumāro soḷasavassuddesiko kaniṭṭhāya deviyā nibandhanena pitarā raṭṭhato pabbājito araññaṃ pavisitvā vanacarake nissāya araññe vasati. so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā sīlamatte patiṭṭhito puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā ^a^P0.0260^ea^ tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā aparāparaṃ sugatiyaṃyeva paribbhamanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhagavato abhisambodhito tiṃsavasse assakaraṭṭhe assakarañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti, ``sujāto''tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so mahantena parivārena vaḍḍhati.

[03] tassa pana mātari kālakatāya rājā aññaṃ rājadhītaraṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. sāpi aparena samayena puttaṃ vijāyi. tassā rājā puttaṃ disvā pasanno ``bhadde, tayā icchitaṃ varaṃ gaṇhāhī''ti varaṃ adāsi. sā gahitakaṃ katvā ṭhapetvā yadā sujātakumāro soḷasavassuddesiko jāto, tadā rājānaṃ āha ``deva, tumhehi mama puttaṃ disvā tuṭṭhacittehi varo dinno, taṃ idāni dethā''ti. ``gaṇha, devī''ti ^a^M0.0242^ea^. ``mayhaṃ puttassa rajjaṃ dethā''ti. ``nassa, vasali, mama jeṭṭhaputte devakumārasadise sujātakumāre ṭhite kasmā evaṃ vadasī''ti paṭikkhipi. devī punappunaṃ nibandhanaṃ karontī manaṃ alabhitvā ekadivasaṃ āha ``deva, yadi sacce tiṭṭhasi, dehi evā''ti. rājā ``anupadhāretvā mayā imissā varo dinno, ayañca evaṃ vadatī''ti vippaṭisārī hutvā sujātakumāraṃ pakkositvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā assūni pavattesi. kumāro pitaraṃ socamānaṃ disvā domanassappatto assūni pavattetvā ``anujānāhi, deva, ahaṃ aññattha gamissāmī''ti āha. taṃ sutvā raññā ``aññaṃ te nagaraṃ māpessāmi, tattha vaseyyāsī''ti vutte kumāro na icchi. ``mama sahāyānaṃ rājūnaṃ santike pesessāmī''ti ca vutte tampi nānujāni. kevalaṃ ``deva, araññaṃ gamissāmī''ti āha. rājā puttaṃ āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā ``mamaccayena idhāgantvā rajje patiṭṭhahā''ti vatvā vissajjesi.

[03] so ^a^V0.0219^ea^ araññaṃ pavisitvā vanacarake nissāya vasanto ekadivasaṃ migavaṃ gato. tassa samaṇakāle sahāyavaro eko devaputto hitesitāya migarūpena taṃ palobhento dhāvitvā āyasmato mahākaccāyanassa vasanaṭṭhānasamīpaṃ patvā antaradhāyi. so ``imaṃ migaṃ ^a^P0.0261^ea^ idāni gaṇhissāmī''ti upadhāvanto therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā taṃ apassanto bahi paṇṇasālāya theraṃ nisinnaṃ disvā tassa samīpe cāpakoṭiṃ olubbha aṭṭhāsi. thero taṃ oloketvā ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ tassa pavattiṃ ñatvā anuggaṇhanto ajānanto viya saṅgahaṃ karonto --
[22] khattiyo nusi rājañño, adu luddo vanecaro''ti.. --

[25] pucchi. tattha ^b^daḷhadhammā^eb^ti daḷhadhanu. daḷhadhanu nāma dvisahassathāmaṃ vuccati. dvisahassathāmanti ca yassa āropitassa jiyāya baddho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe gahetvā yāva kaṇḍappamāṇā ukkhittassa pathavito muccati. ^b^nisārassā^eb^ti niratisayasārassa visiṭṭhasārassa rukkhassa ^a^M0.0243^ea^ dhanuṃ, sāratararukkhamayaṃ dhanunti attho. ^b^olubbhā^eb^ti sannirumbhitvā. ^b^rājañño^eb^ti rājakumāro. ^b^vanecaro^eb^ti vanacaro.
[22] nāmaṃ me bhikkhu te brūmi, sujāto iti maṃ vidū..
[22] migaṃ tañceva nāddakkhiṃ, tañca disvā ṭhito aha''nti.. --
[25] āha. tattha ^b^assakādhipatissā^eb^ti assakaraṭṭhādhipatino assakarājassa. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti theraṃ ālapati. ^b^mige gavesamāno^eb^ti migasūkarādike gavesanto, migavaṃ carantoti attho.
[03] taṃ sutvā thero tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto --
[22] rājaputta tato pitvā, santhatasmiṃ upāvisā''ti.. -- āha.

[03] 984^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^adurāgata^eb^nti durāgamanavajjitaṃ, mahāpuñña, te idhāgamanaṃ svāgataṃ, na te appakampi durāgamanaṃ atthi tuyhañca mayhañca pītisomanassajananatoti adhippāyo. ``adhunāgata''ntipi pāṭho, idāni āgamananti attho.
[03] 985^b^.^eb^ ^b^santhatasmiṃ upāvisā^eb^ti anantarahitāya bhūmiyā anisīditvā amukasmiṃ tiṇasanthārake nisīdāti.
[03] tato rājakumāro therassa paṭisanthāraṃ sampaṭicchanto āha --
[22] nelā atthavatī vaggu, mantvā atthañca bhāsasi..
[21] ``kā ^a^M0.0244^ea^ te rati vane viharato, isinisabha vadehi puṭṭho.

[03] 986^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^kalyāṇī^eb^ti sundarā sobhanā. ^b^savanīyā^eb^ti sotuṃ yuttā. ^b^nelā^eb^ti niddosā. ^b^atthavatī^eb^ti atthayuttā diṭṭhadhammikādinā hitena upetā. ^b^vaggū^eb^ti madhurā. ^b^mantvā^eb^ti jānitvā paññāya paricchinditvā. ^b^attha^eb^nti atthato anapetaṃ ekantahitāvahaṃ.

[03] 987^b^.^eb^ ^b^isinisabhā^eb^ti isīsu nisabha ājānīyasadisa. ^b^vacanapatha^eb^nti vacanaṃ. vacanameva hi atthādhigamassa upāyabhāvato ``vacanapatha''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^atthadhammapadaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0263^ea^ ^b^samācaremase^eb^ti idha ceva samparāye ca atthāvahaṃ sīlādidhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ paṭipajjāmase.
[03] idāni thero attano sammāpaṭipattiṃ tassa anucchavikaṃ vadanto --
[22] theyyā ca aticārā ca, majjapānā ca ārati..
[22] diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, dhammā ete pasaṃsiyā''ti.. -- āha.

[03] 989^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ārati samacariyā cā^eb^ti yathāvuttā ca pāpadhammato ārati, paṭivirati kāyasamatādisamacariyā ca. ^b^bāhusacca^eb^nti pariyattibāhusaccaṃ. ^b^kataññutā^eb^ti parehi attano katassa upakārassa jānanā. ^b^pāsaṃsā^eb^ti atthakāmehi kulaputtehi pakārato āsaṃsitabbā. ^b^dhammā ete^eb^ti ete yathāvuttā ahiṃsādidhammā. ^b^pasaṃsiyā^eb^ti viññūhi pasaṃsitabbā.

[03] evaṃ thero tassa anucchavikaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ vatvā anāgataṃsañāṇena āyusaṅkhāre olokento ``pañcamāsamattamevā''ti disvā taṃ saṃvejetvā daḷhaṃ tattha sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha --
[03] tato kumāro attano muttiyā upāyaṃ pucchanto āha --
[21] ``katamaṃ svāhaṃ janapadaṃ gantvā, kiṃ kammaṃ kiñca porisaṃ.
[22] kāya vā pana vijjāya, bhaveyyaṃ ajarāmaro''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^katamaṃ svāha^eb^nti katamaṃ su ahaṃ, katamaṃ nūti attho. ^b^kiṃ kammaṃ kiñca porisa^eb^nti katvāti vacanaseso. ^b^porisa^eb^nti purisakiccaṃ.
[03] tato ^a^P0.0264^ea^ thero tassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ imā gāthāyo avoca --
[21] ``na ^a^V0.0222^ea^ vijjate so padeso, kammaṃ vijjā ca porisaṃ.
[21] ``yadi te sutā andhakaveṇḍuputtā, sūrā vīrā vikkantappahārino.
[22] ete caññe ca jātiyā, tepi no ajarāmarā..
[22] ete caññe ca vijjāya, tepi no ajarāmarā..
[03] 992^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0246^ea^ ^b^yattha gantvā^eb^ti yaṃ padesaṃ gantvā kammaṃ vijjaṃ porisañca kāyapayogena itarapayogena ca upagantvā pāpuṇitvā bhaveyya ajarāmaroti attho.

[03] 993^b^.^eb^ heṭṭhimakoṭiyā koṭisatādiparimāṇaṃ saṃharitvā ṭhapitaṃ mahantaṃ dhanaṃ etesanti ^b^mahaddhanā^eb^. kumbhattayādikahāpaṇaparibbayo mahanto bhogo etesanti ^b^mahābhogā. raṭṭhavanto^eb^ti raṭṭhasāmikā, anekayojanaparimāṇaṃ raṭṭhaṃ pasāsantāti adhippāyo. ^b^khattiyā^eb^ti khattiyajātikā. ^b^pahūtadhanadhaññāse^eb^ti mahādhanadhaññasannicayā, attano parisāya ca sattaṭṭhasaṃvaccharapahonakadhanadhaññasannicayā. ^b^tepi no ajarāmarā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0265^ea^ jarāmaraṇadhammā eva, mahaddhanatādīnipi tesaṃ upari nipatantaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ nivattetuṃ na sakkontīti attho.

[03] 994^b^.^eb^ ^b^andhakaveṇḍuputtā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0223^ea^ andhakaveṇḍussa puttāti paññātā. ^b^sūrā^eb^ti sattimanto. ^b^vīrā^eb^ti vīriyavanto. ^b^vikkantappahārino^eb^ti sūravīrabhāveneva paṭisattubalaṃ vikkamma pasayha paharaṇasīlā. ^b^viddhastā^eb^ti vinaṭṭhā. ^b^sassatīsamā^eb^ti kulaparamparāya sassatīhi candasūriyādīhi samānā, tepi acirakālapavattakulanvayāti attho.
[03] 995^b^.^eb^ ^b^jātiyā^eb^ti attano jātiyā, visiṭṭhatarā pana jātipi nesaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ nivattetuṃ na sakkotīti attho.

[03] 996^b^.^eb^ ^b^manta^eb^nti vedaṃ. ^b^chaḷaṅga^eb^nti kappabyākaraṇaniruttisikkhāchandovicitijotisatthasaṅkhātehi chahi aṅgehi chaḷaṅgaṃ. ^b^brahmacintita^eb^nti brahmehi aṭṭhakādīhi cintitaṃ paññācakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ.
[22] nijjhattomhi subhaṭṭhena, tvañca me saraṇaṃ bhavā''ti.. --
[25] āha ^a^M0.0247^ea^. tattha ^b^nijjhattomhī^eb^ti nijjhāpito dhammojasaññāya saññattigato amhi. ^b^subhaṭṭhenā^eb^ti suṭṭhu bhāsitena.
[03] tato ^a^P0.0266^ea^ thero taṃ anusāsanto imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi --
[21] ``mā maṃ tvaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, tameva saraṇaṃ vaja.
[22] tatthāsi purisājañño, so ca kho parinibbuto''ti..
[03] tattha therena nisinnapadesato majjhimadesassa pācīnadisābhāgattā vuttaṃ ^b^``puratthimasmiṃ janapade''^eb^ti.
[03] evaṃ so rājaputto therassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``sace hi buddho tiṭṭheyya, satthā tumhāka mārisa.
[21] ``yato ca kho parinibbuto, satthā tumhāka mārisa.
[22] amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho''ti..

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0248^ea^ pana taṃ saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitaṃ thero evamāha ``rājakumāra, tuyhaṃ idha araññavāsena attho natthi, na ciraṃ tava jīvitaṃ, pañcamāsabbhantare eva kālaṃ karissasi, tasmā tava pitu santikameva gantvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo bhaveyyāsī''ti vatvā attano santike dhātuyo datvā vissajjesi. so gacchanto ``ahaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ vacanena ^a^V0.0225^ea^ ito gamissāmi, tumhehipi mayhaṃ anukampāya ^a^P0.0267^ea^ tattha āgantabba''nti vatvā therassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pitu nagaraṃ gantvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ rañño nivedesi.

[03] taṃ sutvā rājā saparivāro uyyānaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ āliṅgitvā antepuraṃ netvā abhisiñcitukāmo ahosi. kumāro ``deva, mayhaṃ appakaṃ āyu, ito catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena maraṇaṃ bhavissati, kiṃ me rajjena, tumhe nissāya puññameva karissāmī''ti vatvā therassa guṇaṃ ratanattayassa ca ānubhāvaṃ pavedesi. taṃ sutvā rājā saṃvegappatto ratanattaye ca there ca pasannamānaso mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā mahākaccāyanattherassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi. theropi rājānaṃ mahājanañca anuggaṇhanto āgacchi. rājā ca saparivāro dūratova paccuggamanaṃ katvā theraṃ vihāraṃ pavesetvā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanto saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahi. kumāro ca sīlāni samādiyitvā theraṃ bhikkhū ceva sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanto dānāni dadanto dhammaṃ suṇanto catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti. tassa puññānubhāvena sattaratanapaṭimaṇḍito sattayojanappamāṇo ratho uppajji, anekāni cassa accharāsahassāni parivāro ahosi.

[03] rājā kumārassa sarīrasakkāraṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā cetiyassa pūjaṃ akāsi, tattha mahājano sannipati, theropi saparivāro taṃ padesaṃ upagañchi. atha devaputto attanā katakusalakammaṃ oloketvā kataññutāya ``gantvā theraṃ vandissāmi, sāsanaguṇe ca pākaṭe karissāmī''ti cintetvā dibbarathaṃ āruyha mahatā parivārena dissamānarūpo āgantvā rathā oruyha therassa pāde vanditvā ^a^M0.0249^ea^ pitarā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā theraṃ payirupāsamāno añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. taṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[21] ``sahassaraṃsīva yathāmahappabho, disaṃ yathā bhāti nabhe anukkamaṃ.
[22] lekhā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa ca, sobhenti veḷuriyamayā sunimmitā..
[22] yuttā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa ca, sobhanti assā ca ime manojavā..
[22] pucchāmi tāhaṃ yasavanta kovidaṃ, kathaṃ tayā laddho ayaṃ uḷāro''ti..

[03] 1007^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sahassaraṃsī^eb^ti sūriyo. so hi anekasahassaraṃsimantatāya ``sahassaraṃsī''ti vuccati. ^b^yathāmahappabho^eb^ti attano mahattassa anurūpappabho. yathā hi mahattena sūriyamaṇḍalena sadisaṃ jotimaṇḍalaṃ natthi, evaṃ pabhāyapi. tathā hi taṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe tīsu mahādīpesu ālokaṃ pharantaṃ tiṭṭhati. ^b^disaṃ yathā bhāti nabhe anukkama^eb^nti nabhe ākāse yatheva disaṃ anukkamanto gacchanto yathā yena pakārena bhāti dibbati jotati. ^b^tathāpakāro^eb^ti tādisākāro. ^b^tavāya^eb^nti tava ayaṃ.

[03] 1008^b^.^eb^ ^b^suvaṇṇapaṭṭehī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0250^ea^ suvaṇṇamayehi paṭṭehi. ^b^samantamotthaṭo^eb^ samantato chādito. ^b^urassā^eb^ti uro assa, rathassa ^a^P0.0269^ea^ uroti ca īsāmūlaṃ vadati. ^b^lekhā^eb^ti veḷuriyamayā mālākammalatākammādilekhā. tāsaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭesu ca rajatapaṭṭesu ca dissamānattā vuttaṃ ^b^``suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa cā''^eb^ti. ^b^sobhentī^eb^ti rathaṃ sobhayanti.

[03] 1009^b^.^eb^ ^b^sīsa^eb^nti rathakubbarasīsaṃ. ^b^veḷuriyassa nimmita^eb^nti veḷuriyena nimmitaṃ, veḷuriyamaṇimayanti attho. ^b^lohitakāyā^eb^ti lohitakamaṇinā, yena kenaci rattamaṇinā vā. ^b^yuttā^eb^ti yojitā, atha vā ^b^yottā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa cā^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayā ca rūpiyamayā ca yottā, saṅkhalikāti attho.

[03] 1010^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhiṭṭhito^eb^ti attano deviddhiyā sakalamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito. ^b^sahassavāhano^eb^ti sahassayuttavāhano, sahassāajānīyayuttaratho devānamindo yathāti adhippāyo. ^b^yasavantā^eb^ti ālapanaṃ, yasassīti attho. ^b^kovida^eb^nti kusalañāṇavantaṃ, rathārohane vā chekaṃ. ^b^ayaṃ uḷāro^eb^ti ayaṃ uḷāro mahanto yasoti adhippāyo.
[03] evaṃ therena puṭṭho devaputto imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi --
[22] imaṃ sujāta pūjehi, taṃ te atthāya hehiti..
[03] 1012-3^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0251^ea^ ^b^sarīra^eb^ntī sarīradhātuṃ. ^b^hehitī^eb^ti bhavissati. ^b^samuyyuto^eb^ti sammā uyyutto, yuttappayuttoti attho.

[03] evaṃ devaputto therena pucchitamatthaṃ kathetvā theraṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pitaraṃ āpucchitvā rathaṃ ^a^P0.0270^ea^ āruyha devalokameva gato. theropi tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya vitthārena dhammakathaṃ kathesi. sā dhammakathā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosi. atha thero taṃ sabbaṃ attanā ca tena ca kathitaniyāmeneva saṅgītikāle dhammasaṅgāhakānaṃ ārocesi, te ca taṃ tathā saṅgahaṃ āropesunti.

[03] ^b^sahassayuttaṃ hayavāhanaṃ subha^eb^nti mahārathavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayena devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavane gopālassa nāma devaputtassa attano vimānato nikkhamitvā sahassayuttaṃ mahantaṃ dibbarathaṃ abhiruyha mahantena parivārena mahatiyā deviddhiyā uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ gacchantassa avidūre pāturahosi. taṃ disvā devaputto sañjātagāravabahumāno sahasā ^a^V0.0228^ea^ rathato oruyha upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ sirasi paggayha aṭṭhāsi.

[03] tassidaṃ pubbakammaṃ -- so kira vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ suvaṇṇamālāya pūjetvā ``imassa puññassa ānubhāvena mayhaṃ bhave bhave sovaṇṇamayā uracchadamālā nibbattatū''ti katapaṇidhānāya anekakappesu sugatīsuyeva saṃsarantiyā kassapassa bhagavato kāle kikissa kāsirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattāya yathāpaṇidhānaṃ suvaṇṇamālālābhena ``uracchadamālā''ti laddhanāmāya devakaññāsadisāya rājadhītāya ācariyo gopālo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā sasāvakasaṅghassa kassapassa bhagavato asadisadānādīni mahādānāni pavattetvā indriyānaṃ aparipakkabhāvena attānaṃ rājadhītarañca uddissa satthārā desitaṃ ^a^M0.0252^ea^ dhammaṃ ^a^P0.0271^ea^ sutvāpi visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto puthujjanakālakiriyameva katvā yathūpacitapuññānubhāvena tāvatiṃsesu yojanasatike kanakavimāne nibbatti, anekakoṭiaccharāparivāro ahosi, sattaratanamayo cassa sahassayutto suvibhattabhittivicitto siniddhamadhuranigghoso attano pabhāsamudayena avahasanto viya divaṅkaramaṇḍalaṃ dibbo ājaññaratho nibbatti.

[03] so tattha yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā aparāparaṃ devesuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena yathāvuttasampattivibhavo gopālo eva nāma devaputto hutvā tāvatiṃsesuyeva nibbatti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno...pe0... añjaliṃ sirasi paggayha aṭṭhāsī''ti.
[03] evaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā ṭhitaṃ taṃ devaputtaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno imāhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[22] uyyānabhūmiṃ abhito anukkamaṃ, purindado bhūtapatīva vāsavo..
[21] ``sovaṇṇamayā te rathakubbarā ubho, phalehi aṃsehi atīva saṅgatā.
[22] sunandighoso ca subhassaro ca, virocatī cāmarahatthabāhubhi..
[22] imā ca nābhyo satarājicittitā, sateratā vijjurivappabhāsare..
[21] ``anekacittāvatato ^a^P0.0272^ea^ ratho ayaṃ, puthū ca nemī ca sahassaraṃsiko.
[22] tesaṃ saro suyyati vaggurūpo, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyamivappavāditaṃ..
[21] ``sirasmiṃ cittaṃ maṇicandakappitaṃ, sadā visuddhaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ.
[22] suvaṇṇarājīhi atīva saṅgataṃ, veḷuriyarājīva atīva sobhati..
[21] ``ime ca vāḷī maṇicandakappitā, ārohakambū sujavā brahūpamā.
[22] brahā mahantā balino mahājavā, mano tavaññāya tatheva siṃsare..
[21] ``ime ca sabbe sahitā catukkamā, mano tavaññāya tatheva siṃsare.
[22] samaṃ vahantī mudukā anuddhatā, āmodamānā turagānamuttamā..
[21] ``dhunanti vagganti patanti cambare, abbhuddhunantā sukate piḷandhane.
[22] tesaṃ saro suyyati vaggurūpo, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyamivappavāditaṃ..
[21] ``rathassa ghoso apiḷandhanāna ca, khurassa nādo abhihiṃsanāya ca.
[22] ghoso suvaggū samitassa suyyati, gandhabbatūriyāni vicitrasaṃvane..
[22] kule sujātā sutanū sucimhitā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā..
[22] vaṭṭaṅguliyo sumukhā sudassanā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā..
[21] ``aññā suveṇī susu missakesiyo, samaṃ vibhattāhi pabhassarāhi ca.
[22] anubbatā tā tava mānase ratā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā..
[22] anubbatā tā tava mānase ratā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā..
[22] anubbatā tā tava mānase ratā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā..
[21] ``kaṇṭhesu te yāni piḷandhanāni, hatthesu pādesu tatheva sīse.
[22] obhāsayantī dasa sabbaso disā, abbhuddayaṃ sāradikova bhāṇumā..
[21] ``vātassa ^a^M0.0255^ea^ vegena ca sampakampitā, bhujesu mālā apiḷandhanāni ca.
[22] muñcanti ghosaṃ ruciraṃ suciṃ subhaṃ, sabbehi viññūhi sutabbarūpaṃ..
[21] ``uyyānabhūmyā ^a^P0.0274^ea^ ca duvaddhato ṭhitā, rathā ca nāgā tūriyāni ca saro.
[22] tameva devinda pamodayanti, vīṇā yathā pokkharapattabāhubhi..
[21] ``imāsu vīṇāsu bahūsu vaggūsu, manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ.
[22] pavajjamānāsu atīva accharā, bhamanti kaññā padumesu sikkhitā..
[21] ``yadā ca gītāni ca vāditāni ca, naccāni cimāni samenti ekato.
[22] athettha naccanti athettha accharā, obhāsayantī ubhato varitthiyo..
[22] imāsu vīṇāsu bahūsu vaggūsu, manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ..
[21] ``kiṃ ^a^V0.0231^ea^ tvaṃ pure kammamakāsi attanā, manussabhūto purimāya jātiyā.
[22] uposathaṃ kaṃ vā tuvaṃ upāvasi, kaṃ dhammacariyaṃ vatamābhirocayi..
[21] ``nayīdamappassa katassa kammuno, pubbe suciṇṇassa uposathassa vā.
[22] iddhānubhāvo vipulo ayaṃ tava, yaṃ devasaṅghaṃ abhirocase bhusaṃ..
[21] ``dānassa ^a^M0.0256^ea^ te idaṃ phalaṃ, atho sīlassa vā pana.
[22] atho añjalikammassa, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito''ti..

[03] 1015^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sahassayutta^eb^nti sahassena yuttaṃ, sahassaṃ vā yuttaṃ yojitaṃ etasminti sahassayuttaṃ. kassa panetaṃ ^a^P0.0275^ea^ sahassanti? ``hayavāhana''nti anantaraṃ vuccamānattā hayānanti ayamattho viññāyateva. hayā vāhanaṃ etassāti hayavāhanaṃ. keci pana ``sahassayuttahayavāhana''nti anunāsikalopaṃ ekameva samāsapadaṃ katvā vaṇṇenti, etasmiṃ pakkhe hayavāhanaṃ viya vāhananti attho yujjati. hayavāhanasahassayuttaṃ yuttahayavāhanasahassanti hi attho. apare pana ``sahassayuttanti sahassadibbājaññayutta''nti vadanti. ^b^sandana^eb^nti rathaṃ. ^b^nekacitta^eb^nti anekacittaṃ nānāvidhavicittavantaṃ. ^b^uyyānabhūmiṃ abhito^eb^ti uyyānabhūmiyā samīpe. ``abhito''ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā sāmiatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. keci pana ``uyyānabhūmyā''tipi paṭhanti, te saddanayampi anupadhārentā paṭhanti. ^b^anukkama^eb^nti gacchanto purindado bhūtapatīva vāsavo virocasīti sambandho.

[03] 1016^b^.^eb^ ^b^sovaṇṇamayā^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayā. ^b^te^eb^ti tava. ^b^rathakubbarā ubho^eb^ti rathassa ubhosu passesu vedikā. yo hi rathassa sobhanatthañceva upari ṭhitānaṃ guttatthañca ubhosu passesu vedikākārena parikkhepo karīyati, tassa purimabhāge ubhosu passesu yāva rathīsā, tāva hatthehi gahaṇayoggo rathassa avayavaviseso, idha so eva kubbaroti adhippeto. tenevāha ``ubho''ti. aññattha pana rathīsā kubbaroti vuccati. ^b^phalehī^eb^ti rathūpatthambhassa dakkhiṇavāmabhedehi dvīhi phalehi, pariyantāvettha phalāti vuttā. ^b^aṃsehī^eb^ti kubbaraphale patiṭṭhitehi heṭṭhimāṃsehi. ^b^atīva saṅgatā^eb^ti ativiya suṭṭhu saṅgatā suphassitā nibbivarā. idañca sippiviracite kittimarathe labbhamānavisesaṃ tattha āropetvā vuttaṃ. so pana aporisatāya akittimo sayaṃjāto ^a^P0.0276^ea^ kenaci aghaṭitoyeva. ^b^sujātagumbā^eb^ti susaṇṭhitathambhakasamudāyā. ye hi vedikāya nirantaraṃ ṭhitā susaṇṭhitaghaṭakādiavayavavisesavanto ^a^V0.0232^ea^ thambhakasamudāyā, tesaṃ ^a^M0.0257^ea^ vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ ``sujātagumbā''ti. ^b^naravīraniṭṭhitā^eb^ti sippācariyehi niṭṭhāpitasadisā. sippācariyā hi attano sarīrakhedaṃ acintetvā vīriyabalena sippassa suṭṭhu vicāraṇato naresu vīriyavantoti idha ``naravīrā''ti vuttā. ^b^naravīrā^eb^ti vā devaputtassa ālapanaṃ. ^b^niṭṭhitā^eb^ti pariyositā paripuṇṇasobhātisayā. ``naravīranimmitā''ti vā pāṭho, naresu dhitisampannehi nimmitasadisāti attho. evaṃvidhakubbaratāya ayaṃ tava ratho virocati. kiṃ viya? ^b^pannaraseva cando,^eb^ sukkapakkhe pannarasiyaṃ paripuṇṇakāle candimā viya.

[03] 1017^b^.^eb^ ^b^suvaṇṇajālāvatato^eb^ti suvaṇṇajālakehi avatato chādito. ``suvaṇṇajālāvitato''tipi pāṭho, gavacchitoti attho. ^b^bahūhī^eb^ti anekehi. ^b^nānāratanehī^eb^ti padumarāgaphussarāgādinānāvidharatanehi. ^b^sunandighoso^eb^ti suṭṭhu nanditabbaghoso, savanīyamadhuraninnādoti attho. ^b^sunandighoso^eb^ti vā suṭṭhu katanandighoso, naccanādīnaṃ dassanādīsu pavattitasādhukārasaddādivasena katapamodaninnādoti attho, ``kālena kālaṃ āsīvādanavasena suṭṭhu payuttanandighoso''ti ca vadanti. ^b^subhassaro^eb^ti suṭṭhu ativiya obhāsanasabhāvo, tattha vā pavattamānānaṃ devatānaṃ sobhanena gītavāditassarena subhassaro. ^b^cāmarahatthabāhubhī^eb^ti cāmarahatthayuttabāhūhi ito cito ca bījayamāna cāmarakalāpehi devatānaṃ bhujehi, tathābhūtāhi devatāhi vā virocati.

[03] 1018^b^.^eb^ ^b^nābhyo^eb^ti rathacakkānaṃ nābhiyo. ^b^manasābhinimmitā^eb^ti ``ime īdisā hontū''ti cittena nimmitasadisā. ^b^rathassa^eb^ ^a^P0.0277^ea^ ^b^pādantaramajjhabhūsitā^eb^ti rathassa pādānaṃ rathacakkānaṃ antena neminā nānāratanasamujjalena arānaṃ vemajjhena ca maṇḍitā. ^b^satarājicittitā^eb^ti anekavaṇṇāhi anekasatāhi rājīhi lekhāhi cittitā vicittabhāvaṃ gatā. ^b^sateratā vijjurivā^eb^ti sateratasaṅkhātavijjulatā viya pabhāsare vijjotanti.

[03] 1019^b^.^eb^ ^b^anekacittāvatato^eb^ti ^a^M0.0258^ea^ anekehi mālākammādicittehi avatato samokiṇṇo. ``anekacittāvitato''tipi paṭhanti, soyeva attho, gāthāsukhatthaṃ pana dīghakaraṇaṃ. ^b^puthū ca nemī cā^eb^ti puthulanemi ca, eko ca-kāro nipātamattaṃ. ^b^sahassaraṃsiko^eb^ti anekasahassaraṃsiko. ``sahassaraṃsiyo''tipi pāḷi. apare pana ``natā raṃsiyo''ti ca paṭhanti, tattha ^b^natā^eb^ti ajiyadhanudaṇḍako viya oṇatā nemippadesā. ^b^sahassaraṃsiyo^eb^ti sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ viya vipphurantakiraṇajālā. ^b^tesa^eb^nti olambamānakiṅkiṇikajālānaṃ nemippadesānaṃ.

[03] 1020^b^.^eb^ ^b^sirasmi^eb^nti ^a^V0.0233^ea^ sīse, rathassa sīseti attho. siro vā asmiṃ rathe. ^b^citta^eb^nti vicittaṃ. ^b^maṇicandakappita^eb^nti maṇimayamaṇḍalānuviddhaṃ candamaṇḍalasadisena maṇinā anuviddhaṃ. ^b^ruciraṃ pabhassara^eb^nti iminā tassa candamaṇḍalasadisataṃyeva vibhāveti, ^b^sadā visuddha^eb^nti iminā panassa candamaṇḍalatopi visesaṃ dasseti. ^b^suvaṇṇarājīhī^eb^ti antarantarā vaṭṭākārena saṇṭhitāhi suvaṇṇalekhāhi. ^b^saṅgata^eb^nti sahitaṃ. ^b^veḷuriyarājīvā^eb^ti antarantarā suvaṇṇarājīhi khacitamaṇimaṇḍalattā veḷuriyarājīhi viya sobhati. ``veḷuriyarājīhī''ti ca paṭhanti.

[03] 1021^b^.^eb^ ^b^vāḷī^eb^ti vāḷavanto sampannavāḷadhino, asse sandhāya vadati ^a^P0.0278^ea^. ``vājī''ti vā pāṭho. ^b^maṇicandakappitā^eb^ti cāmarolambanaṭṭhānesu maṇimayacandakānuviddhā. ^b^ārohakambū^eb^ti uccā ceva tadanurūpapariṇāhā ca, ārohapariṇāhasampannāti attho. ^b^sujavā^eb^ti sundarajavā javavanto ^b^mahājavā,^eb^ sobhanagatikāti attho. ^b^brahūpamā^eb^ti brahā viya paminitabbā, attano pamāṇato adhikā viya paññāyantāti attho. ^b^brahā^eb^ti vuḍḍhā pavaḍḍhasabbaṅgapaccaṅgā. ^b^mahantā^eb^ti mahānubhāvā mahiddhikā. ^b^balino^eb^ti sarīrabalena ca ussāhabalena ca balavanto. ^b^mahājavā^eb^ti sīghavegā. ^b^mano tavaññāyā^eb^ti tava cittaṃ ñatvā. ^b^tathevā^eb^ti cittānurūpameva. ^b^siṃsare^eb^ti saṃsappare, pavattareti attho.

[03] 1022^b^.^eb^ ^b^ime^eb^ti yathāvuttāsse sandhāyāha. ^b^sabbe^eb^ti sahassamattāpi. ^b^sahitā^eb^ti samānajavatāya samānagamanatāya ca gatiyaṃ sahitā, aññamaññaṃ anūnādhikagamanāti attho. catūhi pādehi kamanti ^a^M0.0259^ea^ gacchantīti ^b^catukkamā. samaṃ vahantī^eb^ti ``sahitā''ti padena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. ^b^mudukā^eb^ti mudusabhāvā, bhadrā ājānīyāti attho. tenāha ^b^``anuddhatā''^eb^ti, uddhatarahitā khobhaṃ akarontāti attho. ^b^āmodamānā^eb^ti pamodamānā, akhaḷuṅkatāya aññamaññaṃ rathikādīnañca tuṭṭhiṃ pavedayantāti attho.

[03] 1023^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhunantī^eb^ti cāmarabhāraṃ kesarabhāraṃ vāladhiñca vidhunanti. ^b^vaggantī^eb^ti kadāci pade padaṃ nikkhipantā vagganena gamanena gacchanti. ^b^patantī^eb^ti kadāci pavattanti, laṅghantīti attho. ``plavantī''ti ca keci paṭhanti, soyevattho. ^b^abbhuddhunantā^eb^ti kammasippinā sukate suṭṭhu ^a^P0.0279^ea^ nimmite khuddakaghaṇṭādiassālaṅkāre abhiuddhunantā adhikaṃ uddhunantā. ^b^tesa^eb^nti tesaṃ piḷandhanānaṃ.

[03] 1024^b^.^eb^ ^b^rathassa ghoso^eb^ti yathāvutto rathanigghoso. ^b^apiḷandhanāna cā^eb^ti a-kāro nipātamattaṃ ^a^V0.0234^ea^. piḷandhanānaṃ ābharaṇānaṃ. apiḷandhananti ca ābharaṇapariyāyoti vā vadanti, rathassānaṃ ābharaṇānañcaghosoti attho. ^b^khurassanādo^eb^ti turaṅgānaṃ khuranipātasaddo. kiñcāpi assā ākāsena gacchanti, madhurassa pana khuranipātasaddassa upaladdhihetubhūtena kammunā tesaṃ khuranikkhepe khuranikkhepe paṭighāto labbhatīti vadanti. ^b^abhihiṃsanāya cā^eb^ti assānaṃ adhikahiṃsanena ca, antarantarā assehi pavattitahesanena cāti attho. ``abhihesanāya cā''ti keci paṭhanti. ^b^samitassā^eb^ti samuditassa dibbajanassa ghoso ca suvaggu sumadhuraṃ suyyati. kiṃ viyāti āha ^b^``gandhabbatūriyāni vicitrasaṃvane''^eb^ti, citralatāvane gandhabbadevaputtānaṃ pañcaṅgikatūriyāni viya. tūriyasannissito hi saddo ``tūriyānī''ti vutto nissayavohārena. ``gandhabbatūriyāna ca vicitrasaṃvane''ti ca pāṭho, ``tūriyānañca''iti anunāsikaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. apare ``gandhabbatūriyāni vicitrapavane''ti paṭhanti.

[03] 1025^b^.^eb^ ^b^rathe ṭhitātā^eb^ti rathe ṭhitā etā. ^b^migamandalocanā^eb^ti migacchāpikānaṃ viya mudusiniddhadiṭṭhinipātā. ^b^āḷārapamhā^eb^ti bahalasaṅgatapakhumā, gopakhumāti attho. ^b^hasitā^eb^ti pahasitā, pahaṃsitamukhāti attho ^a^M0.0260^ea^. ^b^piyaṃvadā^eb^ti piyavādiniyo. ^b^veḷuriyajālāvatatā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0280^ea^ veḷuriyamaṇimayena jālena chāditasarīrā. ^b^tanucchavā^eb^ti sukhumacchaviyo. ^b^sadevā^eb^ti sadā eva sabbakālameva. ^b^gandhabbasūraggapūjitā^eb^ti gandhabbadevatāhi ceva aparāhi ca aggadevatāhi laddhapūjā.

[03] 1026^b^.^eb^ ^b^tā rattarattambarapītavāsasā^eb^ti rajanīyarūpā ca rattapītavatthā ca. ^b^abhirattalocanā^eb^ti visesato rattarājīhi upasobhitanayanā. ^b^kule sujātā^eb^ti sindhavakule sujātā visiṭṭhadevanikāye sambhavā. ^b^sutanū^eb^ti sundarasarīrā. ^b^sucimhitā^eb^ti suddhasitakaraṇā.

[03] 1027^b^.^eb^ ^b^tā kambukeyūradharā^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayakeyūradharā. ^b^sumajjhimā^eb^ti vilaggamajjhā. ^b^ūruthanūpapannā^eb^ti sampannaūruthanā, kadalikkhandhasadisaūru ceva samuggasadisathanā ca. ^b^vaṭṭaṅguliyo^eb^ti anupubbato vaṭṭaṅguliyo. ^b^sumukhā^eb^ti sundaramukhā, pamuditamukhā vā. ^b^sudassanā^eb^ti dassanīyā.

[03] 1028^b^.^eb^ ^b^aññā^eb^ti ekaccā. ^b^suveṇī^eb^ti sundarakesaveṇiyo. ^b^susū^eb^ti daharā. ^b^missakesiyo^eb^ti rattamālādīhi missitakesavaṭṭiyo. kathaṃ? ^b^samaṃ vibhattāhi pabhassarāhi cā^eb^ti, samaṃ aññamaññasadisaṃ nānāvibhattivasena vibhattāhi suvaṇṇacīrādikhacitāhi indanīlamaṇiādayo ^a^V0.0235^ea^ viya pabhassarāhi kesavaṭṭīhi missitakesiyoti yojanā. ^b^anubbatā^eb^ti anukūlakiriyā. ^b^tā^eb^ti accharāyo.

[03] 1031^b^.^eb^ ^b^kaṇṭhesū^eb^tiādinā gīvūpagahatthūpagapādūpagasīsūpagādiābharaṇāni dasseti. ^b^obhāsayantī^eb^ti kaṇṭhesu yāni piḷandhanāni, tehi obhāsayantīti yojanā. evaṃ sesesupi. ^b^abbhuddaya^eb^nti abhiuggacchanto, ``abbhuddasa''ntipi pāṭho, soyevattho. ^b^sāradiko^eb^ti saradakāliko. ^b^bhāṇumā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0281^ea^ sūriyo. so hi abbhādidosavirahena dasapi disā suṭṭhu obhāseti.

[03] 1032^b^.^eb^ ^b^vātassa vegena cā^eb^ti manuññagandhūpahāraṃ saddūpahārañca karontena upaharantena viya vāyantena vātassa vegena rathaturaṅgavegena ca. ^b^muñcantī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0261^ea^ vissajjenti. ^b^rucira^eb^nti pañcaṅgikatūriyāni viya uparūpari rucidāyakaṃ. ^b^suci^eb^nti suddhaṃ asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^subha^eb^nti manuññaṃ. ^b^sabbehi viññūhi sutabbarūpa^eb^nti sabbehipi viññujātikehi gandhabbasamayaññūhi sotabbaṃ savanīyaṃ uttamasabhāvaṃ ghosaṃ muñcantīti yojanā.

[03] 1033^b^.^eb^ ^b^uyyānabhūmyā^eb^ti uyyānabhūmiyaṃ. ^b^duvaddhato^eb^ti dvīhi addhapassehi. ``dubhato ca ṭhitā''tipi paṭhanti, soyevattho. ^b^rathā^eb^ti rathe. ^b^nāgā^eb^ti nāge. upayogatthe hi etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. ^b^saro^eb^ti rathanāgatūriyāni paṭicca nibbatto saro. ^b^devindā^eb^ti devaputtaṃ ālapati. ^b^vīṇā yathā pokkharapattabāhubhī^eb^ti yathā vīṇā sammadeva yojitehi doṇipattabāhudaṇḍehi taṃtaṃmucchanānurūpaṃ avaṭṭhitehi vādiyamānā suṇantaṃ janaṃ pamodeti, evaṃ taṃ rathādayo attano sarena pamodayanti. susikkhitabhāvena pokkharabhāvaṃ sundarabhāvaṃ pattehi vīṇāvādakassa hatthehi pavāditā vīṇā yathā mahājanaṃ pamodeti, evaṃ taṃ rathādayo attano sarena pamodayantīti.

[03] 1034^b^.^eb^ ^b^imāsu vīṇāsū^eb^ti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^imāsu^eb^ ujukoṭivaṅkabrahatīnandinītisarāadibhedāsu ^b^bahūsu vīṇāsu^eb^ siniddhamadhurassaratāya ^b^vaggūsu^eb^ tato eva ^b^manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ^eb^ hadayaṅgamaṃ hadayahāriniṃ ^b^pītiṃ^eb^ pītinimittaṃ ^b^pavajjamānāsu^eb^ pavādiyamānāsu ^a^V0.0236^ea^ ^b^accharā^eb^ deva^b^kaññā^eb^ pītivegukkhittatāya attano ^a^P0.0282^ea^ susikkhitatāya ca dibba^b^padumesu bhamanti^eb^ naccaṃ dassentiyo sañcaranti.

[03] 1035^b^.^eb^ ^b^imānī^eb^ti idaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ ``imāni gītāni, imāni vāditāni, imāni naccāni cā''ti. ^b^samenti ekato^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ samarasāni honti. atha vā ^b^samenti ekato^eb^ti ekato ekajjhaṃ samāni samarasāni karonti, tantissaraṃ gītassarena, gītassarañca tantissarena saṃsandantiyo naccanena yathādhigate hassādirase aparihāpentiyo samenti samānentīti attho. ^b^atthettha naccanti athettha accharā obhāsayantī^eb^ti evaṃ gītādīni samarase karontiyo atha aññā ekaccā accharā ettha etasmiṃ tava rathe naccanti, atha aññā varitthiyo uttamitthiyo naccaṃ passantiyo attano sarīrobhāsena ceva vatthābharaṇaobhāsena ca ettha ^a^M0.0262^ea^ etasmiṃ padese ubhato dvīsu passesu dasapi disā kevalaṃ obhāsayanti vijjotayantīti attho.
[03] 1036^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ti so tvaṃ evaṃbhūto. ^b^tūriyagaṇappabodhano^eb^ti dibbatūriyasamūhena katapītipabodhano. ^b^mahīyamāno^eb^ti pūjīyamāno. ^b^vajirāvudhorivā^eb^ti indo viya.

[03] 1037^b^.^eb^ ^b^uposathaṃ kaṃ vā tuvaṃ upāvasī^eb^ti aññehipi uposatho upavasīyati, tvaṃ kaṃ vā kīdisaṃ nāma uposathaṃ upavasīti pucchati. ^b^dhammacariya^eb^nti dānādipuññapaṭipattiṃ. ^b^vata^eb^nti vatasamādānaṃ. ^b^abhirocayī^eb^ti abhirocesi, ruccitvā pūresīti attho. ``abhirādhayī''tipi pāṭho, sādhesi nipphādesīti attho.
[03] 1038^b^.^eb^ ^b^ida^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ, idaṃ vā phalanti adhippāyo. ^b^abhirocase^eb^ti abhibhavitvā vijjotasi.
[03] evaṃ mahātherena puṭṭho devaputto tamatthaṃ ācikkhi. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phala''nti..
[22] disvāna taṃ khippamahuṃ sucīmano, tameva disvāna subhāsitaddhajaṃ..
[21] ``tamannapānaṃ athavāpi cīvaraṃ, suciṃ paṇītaṃ rasasā upetaṃ.
[22] pupphābhikiṇṇamhi sake nivesane, patiṭṭhapesiṃ sa asaṅgamānaso..
[21] ``tamannapānena ^a^M0.0263^ea^ ca cīvarena ca, khajjena bhojjena ca sāyanena ca.
[22] santappayitvā dvipadānamuttamaṃ, so saggaso devapure ramāmahaṃ..
[21] ``etenupāyena imaṃ niraggaḷaṃ, yaññaṃ yajitvā tividhaṃ visuddhaṃ.
[22] pahāyahaṃ mānusakaṃ samussayaṃ, indūpamo devapure ramāmahaṃ..
[21] ``āyuñca vaṇṇañca sukhaṃ balañca, paṇītarūpaṃ atikaṅkhatā muni.
[21] ``nayimasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana, buddhena seṭṭho va samo va vijjati.

[03] 1041^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^jitindriya^eb^nti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ bodhimūleyeva aggamaggena jitattā nibbisevanabhāvassa katattā jitindriyaṃ. abhiññeyyādīnaṃ abhiññeyyādibhāvato anavasesato abhisambuddhattā ^b^buddhaṃ^eb^. puripuṇṇavīriyatāya ^b^anomanikkamaṃ^eb^ caturaṅgasamannāgatassa vīriyassa catubbidhasammappadhānassa ca pāripūriyāti attho. ^b^naruttama^eb^nti narānaṃ uttamaṃ dvipaduttamaṃ. ^b^kassapa^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ gottena vadati. ^b^avāpurantaṃ amatassa dvāra^eb^nti koṇāgamanassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānamahānagarassa dvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ vivarantaṃ. ^b^devātideva^eb^nti sabbesampi devānaṃ atidevaṃ. ^b^satapuññalakkhaṇa^eb^nti anekasatapuññavasena nibbattamahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ.

[03] 1042^b^.^eb^ ^b^kuñjara^eb^nti ^a^V0.0238^ea^ kilesapaṭisattunimmaddanena kuñjarasadisaṃ, mahānāganti attho. catunnaṃ oghānaṃ saṃsāramahoghassa taritattā ^b^oghatiṇṇaṃ^eb^. ^b^suvaṇṇasiṅgīnadabimbasādisa^eb^nti ^a^M0.0264^ea^ siṅgīsuvaṇṇajambunadasuvaṇṇarūpasadisaṃ, kañcanasannibhattacanti attho. ^b^disvāna taṃ khippamahuṃ sucīmano^eb^ti taṃ kassapasammāsambuddhaṃ disvā khippaṃ tāvadeva ``sammāsambuddho bhagavā''ti pasādavasena kilesamalāpagamanena sucimano visuddhamano ahosiṃ, tañca kho ^b^tameva disvāna^eb^ taṃ disvā eva. ^b^subhāsitaddhaja^eb^nti dhammaddhajaṃ.

[03] 1043^b^.^eb^ ^b^tamannapāna^eb^nti tamhi bhagavati annañca pānañca. ^b^athavāpi cīvara^eb^nti atha cīvarampi. ^b^rasasā upeta^eb^nti rasena upetaṃ sādurasaṃ, uḷāranti attho ^a^P0.0285^ea^. ^b^pupphābhikiṇṇamhī^eb^ti ganthitehi ca aganthikehi ca pupphehi olambanavasena santharaṇavasena ca abhikiṇṇe. ^b^patiṭṭhapesi^eb^nti paṭipādesiṃ adāsiṃ. ^b^asaṅgamānaso^eb^ti katthaci alaggacitto so ahanti yojanā.
[03] 1044^b^.^eb^ ^b^saggaso^eb^ti aparāparūpapattivasena sagge sagge, tatthāpi ca devapure sudassanamahānagare. ^b^ramāmī^eb^ti kīḷāmi modāmi.

[03] 1045^b^.^eb^ ^b^etenupāyenā^eb^ti gopālabrāhmaṇakāle sasāvakasaṅghassa kassapabhagavato yathā asadisadānaṃ adāsiṃ, etena upāyena. ^b^imaṃ niraggaḷaṃ yaññaṃ yajitvā tividhaṃ visuddha^eb^nti anāvaṭadvāratāya muttacāgatāya ca niraggaḷaṃ, tīsupi kālesu tīhi dvārehi karaṇakārāpanānussaraṇavidhīhi sampannatāya tividhaṃ, tattha saṃkilesābhāvena visuddhaṃ aparimitadhanapariccāgabhāvena mahācāgatāya yaññaṃ yajitvā, mahādānaṃ datvāti attho. taṃ pana dānaṃ cirakatampi khettavatthucittānaṃ uḷāratāya antarantarā anussaraṇena attano pākaṭaṃ āsannaṃ paccakkhaṃ viya upaṭṭhitaṃ gahetvā āha ``ima''nti.

[03] 1046^b^.^eb^ evaṃ devaputto attanā katakammaṃ therassa kathetvā idāni tādisāya sampattiyā parepi patiṭṭhāpetukāmataṃ tathāgate ca uttamaṃ attano pasādabahumānaṃ pavedento ^b^``āyuñca vaṇṇañcā''^eb^tiādinā gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^abhikaṅkhatā^eb^ti icchantena. ^b^munī^eb^ti theraṃ ālapati.

[03] 1047^b^.^eb^ ^b^nayimasmiṃ loke^eb^ti devaputto attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ lokaṃ vadati. ^b^parasmi^eb^nti tato aññasmiṃ. etena sabbepi sadevake loke ^a^M0.0265^ea^ dasseti. ^b^samo ca vijjatī^eb^ti seṭṭho tāva tiṭṭhatu ^a^V0.0239^ea^, samo eva na vijjatīti attho. ^b^āhuneyyānaṃ paramāhutiṃ gato^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke yattakā āhuneyyā nāma, tesu sabbesu paramāhutiṃ paramaṃ āhuneyyabhāvaṃ ^a^P0.0286^ea^ gato. ``dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ paramaggataṃ gato''ti vā pāṭho, tattha ^b^paramaggata^eb^nti paramaṃ aggabhāvaṃ, aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvanti attho. kesanti āha ^b^``puññatthikānaṃ vipulapphalesina''^eb^nti, puññena atthikānaṃ vipulaṃ mahantaṃ puññaphalaṃ icchantānaṃ, tathāgato eva lokassa puññakkhettanti dasseti. keci pana ``āhuneyyānaṃ paramaggataṃ gato''ti paṭhanti, soyevattho.

[03] evaṃ kathentameva taṃ thero kallacittaṃ muducittaṃ vinīvaraṇacittaṃ udaggacittaṃ pasannacittañca ñatvā saccāni pakāsesi. so saccapariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. atha thero manussalokaṃ āgantvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ attanā ca devaputtena ca kathitaniyāmeneva ārocesi. satthā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattapariyāya dhammaṃ desesi. sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^V0.0240^ea^ ^b^vanaṃ cittalataṃ pabhāsatī^eb^ti agāriyavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena rājagahe ekaṃ kulaṃ ubhatopasannaṃ hoti sīlācārasampannaṃ opānabhūtaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ. te dve jayampatikā ratanattayaṃ uddissa yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cutā tāvatiṃsesu nibbattiṃsu, tesaṃ dvādasayojanikaṃ kanakavimānaṃ nibbatti. te tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanti. athāyasmā ^a^M0.0266^ea^ mahāmoggallānotiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
[22] tathūpamaṃ tuyhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati antalikkhe..
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --
[22] pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ''..
[22] annañca pānañca pasannacittā, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adamha..
[25] attano sampattiṃ byākāsi. gāthāsupi apubbaṃ natthi.
[22] tathūpamaṃ tuyhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati antalikkhe..
[22] vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. -- pucchi.
[22] annañca pānañca pasannacittā, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adamha..
[25] attano sampattiṃ byākāsi. gāthāsupi apubbaṃ natthi.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0242^ea^ ^b^maṇithūṇa^eb^nti phaladāyakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena rañño bimbisārassa akāle ambaphalāni paribhuñjituṃ icchā uppajji. so ārāmapālaṃ āha -- ``mayhaṃ kho, bhaṇe, ambaphalesu icchā uppannā, tasmā ambāni me ānetvā ^a^M0.0268^ea^ dehī''ti. ``deva, natthi ambesu ambaphalaṃ, apicāhaṃ tathā karomi, sace devo kiñci kālaṃ āgameti, yathā ambā na cirasseva phalaṃ gaṇhantī''ti. ``sādhu, bhaṇe, tathā karohī''ti. ārāmapālo ārāmaṃ gantvā ambarukkhamūlesu paṃsuṃ apanetvā tādisaṃ paṃsuṃ ākiri, tādisañca udakaṃ āsiñci, yathā na cirasseva ambarukkhā sacchinnapattā ahesuṃ. atha naṃ paṃsuṃ apanetvā phārusakakasaṭamissakaṃ pākatikaṃ paṃsuṃ ākiritvā sādhukaṃ udakaṃ adāsi. tadā ambarukkhā na cireneva korakitā pallavitā kuṭamalakajātā hutvā pupphiṃsu, atha salāṭukajātā hutvā phalāni gaṇhiṃsu. tatthekasmiṃ ambarukkhe paṭhamataraṃ cattāri phalāni manosilācuṇṇapiñjaravaṇṇāni sampannagandharasāni pariṇatāni ahesuṃ.

[03] so tāni gahetvā ``rañño dassāmī''ti gacchanto antarāmagge āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ piṇḍāya caramānaṃ disvā cintesi ``imāni ambāni aggaphalabhūtāni imassa ayyassa dassāmi ^a^P0.0289^ea^, kāmaṃ maṃ rājā hanatu vā pabbājetu vā, rañño hi dinne diṭṭhadhamme pūjāmattaṃ appamattakaṃ phalaṃ, ayyassa dinne pana diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi aparimāṇaṃ phalaṃ bhavissatī''ti. evaṃ pana cintetvā tāni phalāni therassa datvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā rañño tamatthaṃ ārocesi. taṃ sutvā rājā rājapurise āṇāpesi ``vīmaṃsatha tāva, bhaṇe, yathāyaṃ āhā''ti. thero pana tāni phalāni bhagavato upanāmesi. bhagavā tesu ekaṃ sāriputtattherassa, ekaṃ mahāmoggallānattherassa, ekaṃ mahākassapattherassa datvā ekaṃ attanā paribhuñji. purisā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.

[03] rājā taṃ sutvā ``dhīro vatāyaṃ puriso, yo attano jīvitampi pariccajitvā puññapasuto ahosi, attano parissamañca ṭhānagatameva akāsī''ti tuṭṭhacitto tassa ekaṃ gāmavaraṃ vatthālaṅkārādīni ca datvā ``yaṃ tayā bhaṇe ambaphaladānena puññaṃ pasutaṃ, tato me pattiṃ dehī''ti āha. so ``demi, deva, yathāsukhaṃ pattiṃ gaṇhāhī''ti avoca. ārāmapālo aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajji ^a^M0.0269^ea^, tassa soḷasayojanikaṃ kanakavimānaṃ nibbatti sattasatakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ. taṃ disvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pucchi --
[22] kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā..
[21] ``tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ.
[27] aṭṭhaṭṭhakā sikkhitā sādhurūpā, dibbā ca kaññā tidasacarā uḷārā.
[22] so hi pamodati saggagato tidive, anubhoti ca puññaphalaṃ vipulaṃ..
[21] ``tasmā hi phalaṃ alameva dātuṃ, niccaṃ manussena sukhatthikena.
[22] dibbāni vā patthayatā sukhāni, manussasobhaggatamicchatā vā..
[22] vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. -- sopissa byākāsi.

[03] 1061^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^aṭṭhaṭṭhakā^eb^ti ekekasmiṃ kūṭāgāre aṭṭhaṭṭhakā catusaṭṭhiparimāṇā. ^b^sādhurūpā^eb^ti rūpasampattiyā ca sīlācārasampattiyā ca sikkhāsampattiyā ca sundarasabhāvā. ^b^dibbā ca kaññā^eb^ti devaccharāyo. ^b^tidasacarā^eb^ti tidasesu sukhācārā sukhavihāriniyo. ^b^uḷārā^eb^ti uḷāravibhavā.

[03] 1064^b^.^eb^ ^b^phaladāyī^eb^ti attanā ambaphalassa dinnattā attānaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^phala^eb^nti puññaphalaṃ. ^b^vipula^eb^nti mahantaṃ labhati manussaloke patiṭṭhitoti adhippāyo. ^b^dada^eb^nti dadanto ^a^V0.0244^ea^ dānahetu. ^b^ujugatesū^eb^ti ujupaṭipannesu. ^b^saggagato^eb^ti uppajjanavasena saggaṃ gato, tatthāpi ^b^tidive^eb^ tāvatiṃsabhavane ^b^anubhoti ca puññaphalaṃ vipulaṃ^eb^ yathāhaṃ, evaṃ aññopīti attho.

[03] 1066^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā catunnaṃ phalānaṃ dānamattena īdisī sampatti ^a^P0.0291^ea^ adhigatā, tasmā. ^b^alameva^eb^ yuttameva. ^b^nicca^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ. ^b^dibbānī^eb^ti devalokapariyāpannāni. ^b^manussasobhaggata^eb^nti manussesu subhagabhāvaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^cando yathā vigatavalāhake nabhe^eb^ti upassayadāyakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena aññataro bhikkhu gāmakāvāse vassaṃ vasitvā vutthavasso pavāretvā bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge sāyaṃ aññataraṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesanto aññataraṃ upāsakaṃ disvā pucchi -- ``upāsaka, imasmiṃ gāme atthi kiñci pabbajitānaṃ vasanayoggaṭṭhāna''nti. upāsako pasannacitto gehaṃ gantvā bhariyāya saddhiṃ mantetvā therassa ^a^M0.0271^ea^ vasanayoggaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā tattha āsanaṃ paññāpetvā pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā theraṃ pavesetvā tasmiṃ pāde dhovante padīpaṃ ujjāletvā mañce paccattharaṇāni paññāpetvā adāsi. svātanāya ca nimantetvā therassa dutiyadivase bhojetvā pānakatthāya guḷapiṇḍañca datvā theraṃ gacchantaṃ anugantvā nivatti. so aparena samayena saha bhariyāya kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno dvīhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --
[21] ``cando yathā vigatavalāhake nabhe, obhāsayaṃ gacchati antalikkhe.
[22] tathūpamaṃ tuyhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati antalikkhe..
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[21] ``ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke, upassayaṃ arahato adamha.
[22] annañca pānañca pasannacittā, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adamha..
[21] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0... vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[22] tattha gāthāsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^sūriyo^eb^ ^a^M0.0272^ea^ ^b^yathā vigatavalāhake nabhe^eb^ti dutiyaupassayadāyakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena sambahulā bhikkhū gāmakāvāse vassaṃ vasitvā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya rājagahaṃ uddissa gacchantā sāyaṃ aññataraṃ gāmaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu. sesaṃ anantaravimānasadisameva.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimāna^eb^nti bhikkhādāyakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena aññataro bhikkhu addhānamaggapaṭipanno aññataraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho ekassa gharaddhāre aṭṭhāsi. tattha aññataro puriso dhotahatthapādo ``bhuñjissāmī''ti ^a^V0.0246^ea^ nisinno bhojanaṃ upanetvā pātiyā pakkhitte taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā pātiyā bhattaṃ tassa bhikkhuno patte ākiranto tena ``ekadesameva dehī''ti vuttopi sabbameva ākiri. so bhikkhu anumodanaṃ ^a^P0.0293^ea^ vatvā pakkāmi. so puriso ``chātajjhattassa bhikkhuno mayā abhuñjitvā bhattaṃ dinna''nti anussaranto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭilabhi. so aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero devacārikaṃ caranto mahatiyā deviddhiyā virocamānaṃ disvā imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --
[22] kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā..
[21] ``ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūto, disvāna bhikkhuṃ tasitaṃ kilantaṃ.
[22] ekāhaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭipādayissaṃ, samaṅgi bhattena tadā akāsiṃ..
[21] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0... vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..

[03] 1084^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ekāhaṃ bhikkha^eb^nti ekaṃ ahaṃ bhikkhāmattaṃ, ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakanti attho. ^b^paṭipādayissa^eb^nti paṭipādesiṃ adāsiṃ. ^b^samaṅgi bhattenā^eb^ti bhattena samaṅgībhūtaṃ, laddhabhikkhanti attho. evaṃ mahāthero tena devaputtena attano sucaritakamme pakāsite saparivārassa tassa dhammaṃ desetvā manussalokamāgato, taṃ pavattiṃ sammāsambuddhassa kathesi. satthā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattamahājanassa dhammaṃ desesi. sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0274^ea^ ^a^P0.0294^ea^ ^a^V0.0247^ea^ ^b^maṇithūṇaṃ vimāna^eb^nti yavapālakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena rājagahe aññataro duggatadārako yavakhettaṃ rakkhati. so ekadivasaṃ pātarāsatthāya kummāsaṃ labhitvā ``khettaṃ gantvā bhuñjissāmī''ti taṃ kummāsaṃ gahetvā yavakhettaṃ gantvā rukkhamūle nisīdi. tasmiṃ khaṇe aññataro khīṇāsavatthero maggappaṭipanno upakaṭṭhe kāle taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā yavapālakena nisinnaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkami. yavapālako velaṃ oloketvā ``kacci, bhante, āhāro laddho''ti āha. thero tuṇhī ahosi. so aladdhabhāvaṃ ñatvā ``bhante, upakaṭṭhā velā, piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjituṃ na sakkā, mayhaṃ anukampāya imaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjathā''ti vatvā therassa taṃ kummāsaṃ adāsi. thero taṃ anukampanto tassa passantasseva taṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. sopi dārako ``sudinnaṃ vata mayā īdisassa kummāsadānaṃ dadantenā''ti cittaṃ pasādetvā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane vuttanayeneva vimāne nibbatti. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --

[03] ^b^alaṅkato^eb^ ^a^P0.0295^ea^ ^b^malyadharo suvattho^eb^ti kuṇḍalīvimānaṃ. tassa kā upatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena dve aggasāvakā saparivārā kāsīsu cārikaṃ carantā sūriyatthaṅgamanavelāyaṃ aññataraṃ vihāraṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tassa vihārassa gocaragāme aññataro upāsako there upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pādadhovanaṃ pādabbhañjanatelaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ padīpiyañca upanetvā svātanāya ca nimantetvā dutiyadivase mahādānaṃ pavattesi, therā tassa anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkamiṃsu. so aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --
[22] āmuttahatthābharaṇo yasassī, dibbe vimānamhi yathāpi candimā..
[21] ``dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ, aṭṭhaṭṭhakā sikkhitā sādhurūpā.
[22] dibbā ca kaññā tidasacarā uḷārā, naccanti gāyanti pamodayanti..
[22] annañca ^a^P0.0296^ea^ pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ..

[03] 1094^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sukuṇḍalī^eb^ti sundarehi kuṇḍalehi alaṅkatakaṇṇo. ``sakuṇḍalī''tipi pāṭho, sadisaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ sakuṇḍalaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti sakuṇḍalī, yuttakuṇḍalī aññamaññañca tuyhañca anucchavikakuṇḍalīti attho. ^b^kappitakesamassū^eb^ti sammākappitakesamassu. ^b^āmuttahatthābharaṇo^eb^ti paṭimukkāṅguliyādihatthābharaṇo.
[03] 1098^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṇhakkhayūpapanne^eb^ti taṇhakkhayaṃ arahattaṃ, nibbānameva vā upagate, adhigatavanteti attho. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^alaṅkato malyadharo suvattho^eb^ti dutiyakuṇḍalīvimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena dve aggasāvakā kāsīsu janapadacārikaṃ carantātiādi sabbaṃ anantarasadisameva.
[22] āmuttahatthābharaṇo yasassī, dibbe vimānamhi yathāpi candimā..
[22] dibbā ca kaññā tidasacarā uḷārā, naccanti gāyanti pamodayanti..
[22] vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. -- pucchi.
[22] annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ..

[03] ^b^yā devarājassa sabhā sudhammā^eb^ti uttaravimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavati parinibbute dhātuvibhāge ca kate tattha tattha thūpesu patiṭṭhāpiyamānesu dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyituṃ uccinitvā gahitesu mahākassapappamukhesu mahātheresu yāva vassūpagamanā aññesu ca theresu attano attano parisāya saddhiṃ tattha tattha vasantesu āyasmā kumārakassapo pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ setabyanagaraṃ gantvā siṃsapāvane vasi. atha pāyāsi rājañño therassa tattha vasanabhāvaṃ sutvā mahatā janakāyena ^a^M0.0278^ea^ parivuto taṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nisinno attano diṭṭhigataṃ pavedesi. atha naṃ thero candimasūriyūdāharaṇādīhi paralokassa atthibhāvaṃ pakāsento anekavihitahetūpamālaṅkataṃ diṭṭhigaṇṭhiviniveṭhanaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ pāyāsisuttaṃ (dī0 ni0 2.406 ādayo) desetvā taṃ diṭṭhisampadāyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.

[03] so visuddhadiṭṭhiko hutvā samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ dānaṃ dento anuḷārajjhāsayatāya ^a^P0.0298^ea^ lūkhaṃ adāsi ghāsacchādanamattaṃ kaṇājakaṃ bilaṅgadutiyaṃ sāṇāni ca vatthāni ^a^V0.0251^ea^. evaṃ pana asakkaccadānaṃ datvā kāyassa bhedā hīnakāyaṃ upapajji cātumahārājikānaṃ sahabyataṃ. tassa pana kiccākiccesu yuttappayutto uttaro nāma māṇavo ahosi dāne byāvaṭo. so sakkaccadānaṃ datvā tāvatiṃsakāyaṃ upapanno, tassa dvādasayojanikaṃ vimānaṃ nibbatti. so kataññutaṃ vibhāvento saha vimānena kumārakassapattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vimānato oruyha pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. taṃ thero --
[21] ``yā devarājassa sabhā sudhammā, yatthacchati devasaṅgho samaggo.
[22] tathūpamaṃ tuyhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati antalikkhe..
[22] vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. -- gāthāhi paṭipucchi.
[21] ``ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūto, rañño pāyāsissa ahosiṃ māṇavo.
[27] laddhā dhanaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ akāsiṃ, piyā ca me sīlavanto ahesuṃ.
[22] annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ..
[25] so devaputto tassa imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi.

[03] 1108^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^devarājassā^eb^ti sakkassa. ^b^sabhā sudhammā^eb^ti evaṃnāmakaṃ santhāgāraṃ. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yassaṃ sabhāyaṃ. ^b^acchatī^eb^ti nisīdati. ^b^devasaṅgho^eb^ti tāvatiṃsadevakāyo. ^b^samaggo^eb^ti sahito sannipatito.

[03] 1111^b^.^eb^ ^b^pāyāsissa^eb^ ^a^P0.0299^ea^ ^b^ahosiṃ māṇavo^eb^ti pāyāsirājaññassa kiccākiccakaro daharatāya māṇavo, nāmena pana uttaro nāma ahosiṃ. ^b^saṃvibhāgaṃ akāsi^eb^nti ahameva abhuñjitvā ^a^V0.0252^ea^ yathāladdhaṃ dhanaṃ dānamukhe pariccajanavasena saṃvibhajanaṃ akāsiṃ. annañca pānañca pariccajantoti vacanaseso. atha vā dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ. kathaṃ? ^b^sakkaccaṃ^eb^. kīdisaṃ? ^b^annañca pānañcā^eb^ti yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^V0.0253^ea^ ^b^vanaṃ cittalataṃ pabhāsatī^eb^ti cittalatāvimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññataro upāsako daliddo appabhogo paresaṃ kammaṃ katvā jīvati. so saddho pasanno jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe mātāpitaro posento ``itthiyo nāma patikule ṭhitā issariyaṃ karonti, sassusasurānaṃ manāpacāriniyo dullabhā''ti mātāpitūnaṃ cittadukkhaṃ pariharanto dārapariggahaṃ akatvā sayameva ne upaṭṭhahati, sīlāni rakkhati, uposathaṃ upavasati ^a^M0.0280^ea^, yathāvibhavaṃ dānāni deti. so aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike vimāne nibbatti. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayena gantvā katakammaṃ imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --
[22] tathūpamaṃ tuyhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati antalikkhe..
[21] ``ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūto, daliddo atāṇo kapaṇo kammakaro ahosiṃ.
[27] jiṇṇe ca mātāpitaro abhāriṃ, piyā ca me sīlavanto ahesuṃ.
[22] annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ..
[21] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^M0.0281^ea^ ^b^vanaṃ nandanaṃ pabhāsatī^eb^ti nandanavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññataro upāsakotiādi sabbaṃ anantaravimānasadisaṃ. ayaṃ pana dārapariggahaṃ katvā mātāpitaro posesīti ayameva viseso.
[21] yathā vanaṃ nandanaṃ pabhāsati, uyyānaseṭṭhaṃ tidasānamuttamaṃ.
[22] tathūpamaṃ tuyhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati antalikkhe..
[21] ``ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūto, daliddo atāṇo kapaṇo kammakaro ahosiṃ.
[27] jiṇṇe ca mātāpitaro abhāriṃ, piyā ca me sīlavanto ahesuṃ.
[22] annañca ^a^P0.0301^ea^ pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ..
[21] ``tena metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti.. --
[25] gāthāhi byākāsi. tattha gāthāsupi apubbaṃ natthi.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0282^ea^ ^b^maṇithūṇaṃ vimāna^eb^nti maṇithūṇavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena sambahulā therā bhikkhū araññāyatane viharanti. tesaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya ^a^V0.0255^ea^ gamanamagge eko upāsako visamaṃ samaṃ karoti, kaṇṭake nīharati, gacchagumbe apaneti, udakakāle mātikāsu setuṃ bandhati, vivanaṭṭhānesu chāyārukkhe ropeti, jalāsayesu mattikaṃ uddharitvā te puthulagambhīre karoti, titthe sampādeti, yathāvibhavaṃ dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati. so aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero upasaṅkamitvā imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --
[22] kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā..
[21] ``tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ.
[22] dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇacchannā..
[21] ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[21] ``ahaṃ ^a^P0.0302^ea^ manussesu manussabhūto, vivane pathe saṅkamanaṃ akāsiṃ.
[21] ārāmarukkhāni ca ropayissaṃ, piyā ca me sīlavanto ahesuṃ.
[22] annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ..
[21] ``tena ^a^M0.0283^ea^ metādiso vaṇṇo...pe0...vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[03] 1131^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^vivane^eb^ti araññe. ^b^ārāmarukkhāni cā^eb^ ārāmabhūte rukkhe, ārāmaṃ katvā tattha rukkhe ropesinti attho. sesaṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^sovaṇṇamaye^eb^ ^a^V0.0256^ea^ ^b^pabbatasmi^eb^nti suvaṇṇavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā andhakavinde viharati. tena samayena aññataro upāsako saddho pasanno vibhavasampanno tassa gāmassa avidūre aññatarasmiṃ muṇḍakapabbate sabbākārasampannaṃ bhagavato vasanānucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā tattha bhagavantaṃ vasāpento sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi, sayañca niccasīle patiṭṭhito suvisuddhasīlasaṃvaro hutvā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti. tassa kammānubhāvasaṃsūcakaṃ nānāratanaraṃsijālasamujjalaṃ vicittavedikāparikkhittaṃ vividhavipulālaṅkāropasobhitaṃ suvibhattabhittitthambhasopānaṃ ārāmaramaṇīyakaṃ kañcanapabbatamuddhani vimānaṃ uppajji. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno devacārikaṃ caranto disvā imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --
[21] ``dānassa te idaṃ phalaṃ, atho sīlassa vā pana.
[22] atho añjalikammassa, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito''ti..
[22] vihāraṃ satthu kāresiṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi..
[22] tena mayhaṃ idaṃ laddhaṃ, vasaṃ vattemi nandane..

[03] 1135^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbe veḷuriyāmayā^eb^ti sabbe thambhā veḷuriyamaṇimayā. tattha pana ^b^ekamekāya aṃsiyā^eb^ti aṭṭhaṃsesu thambhesu ekamekasmiṃ aṃsabhāge. ^b^ratanā satta nimmitā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0304^ea^ sattaratanakammanimmitā, ekeko aṃso sattaratanamayoti attho.

[03] 1136^b^.^eb^ ^b^``veḷūriyasuvaṇṇassā''^eb^tiādinā nānāratanāni dasseti. tattha ^b^veḷūriyasuvaṇṇassā^eb^ti veḷuriyena ca suvaṇṇena ca nimmitā, citrāti ^a^M0.0285^ea^ vā yojanā. karaṇatthe hi ^a^V0.0258^ea^ idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^phalikā rūpiyassa cā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^masāragallamuttāhī^eb^ti kabaramaṇīhi. ^b^lohitaṅgamaṇīhi cā^eb^ti rattamaṇīhi.

[03] 1137^b^.^eb^ ^b^na tatthuddhaṃsatī rajo^eb^ti maṇimayabhūmikattā na tasmiṃ vimāne rajo uggacchati. ^b^gopānasīgaṇā^eb^ti gopānasīsamūhā. ^b^pītā^eb^ti pītavaṇṇā, suvaṇṇamayā ceva phussarāgādimaṇimayā cāti attho. ^b^kūṭaṃ dhārentī^eb^ti sattaratanamayaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ dhārenti.
[03] 1138-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^nānāratanagabbhehī^eb^ti nānāratanamayehi ovarakehi. ^b^vediyā^eb^ti vedikā. ^b^catasso^eb^ti catūsu disāsu catasso. tenāha ^b^``samantā caturo disā''^eb^ti.

[03] 1143^b^.^eb^ ^b^sehi pāṇibhī^eb^ti kāyasāraṃ puññaṃ pasavanto attano pāṇīhi taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ karonto vihāraṃ satthu kāresinti yojanā. atha vā ^b^sehi pāṇibhī^eb^ti tattha andhakavindasmiṃ gandhañca mālañca paccayañca vilepanañca pūjāvasena. yathā kathaṃ? vihārañca vippasannena cetasā satthuno adāsiṃ pūjesiṃ niyyādesiṃ cāti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
[03] 1144^b^.^eb^ ^b^tenā^eb^ti tena yathāvuttena puññakammena kāraṇabhūtena. ^b^mayha^eb^nti mayā. ^b^ida^eb^nti idaṃ puññaphalaṃ, idaṃ vā dibbaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ. tenāha ^b^``vasaṃ vattemī''^eb^ti.

[03] 1145^b^.^eb^ ^b^nandane^eb^ti nandiyā dibbasamiddhiyā uppajjanaṭṭhāne ^a^P0.0305^ea^ imasmiṃ devaloke, tatthāpi visesato nandane vane ramme, evaṃ ramaṇīye imasmiṃ nandane vane ramāmīti yojanā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] evaṃ devatāya attano puññakamme āvikate thero saparivārassa tassa devaputtassa dhammaṃ desetvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ nivedesi. bhagavā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi. sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0286^ea^ ^a^V0.0259^ea^ ^b^maṇithūṇa^eb^nti ambavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena rājagahe aññataro duggatapuriso paresaṃ bhattavetanabhato hutvā ambavanaṃ rakkhati. so ekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ gimhasamaye sūriyātapasantatte uṇhavālikānippīḷite vipphandamānamarīcijālavitthate bhūmippadese tassa ambārāmassa avidūrena maggena sedāgatena gattena gacchantaṃ disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno upasaṅkamitvā evamāha ``mahā ayaṃ, bhante, ghammapariḷāho, ativiya parissantarūpo viya dissati, sādhu, bhante, ayyo imaṃ ambārāmaṃ pavisitvā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā addhānaparissamaṃ paṭivinodetvā gacchatha anukampaṃ upādāyā''ti. thero visesato tassa cittappasādaṃ paribrūhetukāmo taṃ ārāmaṃ pavisitvā aññatarassa ambarukkhassa mūle nisīdi.

[03] puna so puriso āha ``sace, bhante, nhāyitukāmattha, ahaṃ ito kūpato udakaṃ uddharitvā tumhe nhāpessāmi, pānīyañca dassāmī''ti. theropi adhivāsesi tuṇhībhāvena. so kūpato udakaṃ uddharitvā parissāvetvā theraṃ nhāpesi, nhāpetvā ca hatthapāde dhovitvā nisinnassa pānīyaṃ upanesi. thero pānīyaṃ pivitvā paṭippassaddhadaratho tassa purisassa udakadāne ceva nhāpane ca anumodanaṃ ^a^P0.0306^ea^ vatvā pakkāmi. atha so puriso ``ghammābhitattassa vata therassa ghammapariḷāhaṃ paṭippassambhesiṃ, bahuṃ vata mayā puññaṃ pasuta''nti uḷārapītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi. so aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajji. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno upasaṅkamitvā imāhi gāthāhi katapuññaṃ pucchi.
[22] kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā..
[21] ``tatthacchasi ^a^M0.0287^ea^ pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ.
[22] dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā..
[22] sādhu taṃ bhante nhāpeyyaṃ, yaṃ mamassa sukhāvahaṃ..
[22] iti so pītiyā kāyaṃ, sabbaṃ pharati attano..

[03] 1151^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0261^ea^ ^b^gimhānaṃ pacchime māse^eb^ti āsāḷhimāse. ^b^patapante^eb^ti ativiya dippante, sabbaso uṇhaṃ vissajjenteti attho. ^b^divaṅkare^eb^ti divākare, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^asiñcatī^eb^ti siñcati, -kāro nipātamattaṃ, siñcati ambarukkhamūlesu dhuvaṃ jalasekaṃ karotīti attho. ``asiñcathā''ti ca pāṭho, siñcitthāti attho. ``asiñcaha''nti ca paṭhanti, paresaṃ bhatako poso hutvā tadā ambārāmaṃ asiñciṃ ahanti attho.

[03] 1152^b^.^eb^ ^b^tenā^eb^ti yena disābhāgena so ambārāmo, tena agamā agañchi. ^b^akilantova cetasā^eb^ti cetodukkhassa maggeneva pahīnattā cetasā akilantopi samāno kilanturūpo kāyena tena maggena agamāti yojanā.
[03] 1153-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^avocaṃ^eb^ ahaṃ tadā ^b^ambasiñcako^eb^ hutvāti yojanā. ^b^ekacīvaro^eb^ti nhāyitukāmoti adhippāyo.

[03] 1156^b^.^eb^ ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ ``ambo ca sitto, samaṇo ca nhāpito, mayā ca puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakaṃ, ekeneva payogena tividhopi attho sādhito''ti iminākārena pavattāya ^b^pītiyā so^eb^ puriso ^b^attano sabbaṃ kāyaṃ pharati,^eb^ nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ karotīti yojanā. atītatthe cetaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ, pharīti attho.
[03] 1157^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadeva ettakaṃ kamma^eb^nti taṃ ettakaṃ evaṃ pānīyadānamattakaṃ ^a^P0.0308^ea^ kammaṃ akāsiṃ, tāya tassaṃ jātiyaṃ aññaṃ nānussarāmīti adhippāyo. tesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^disvāna^eb^ ^a^M0.0289^ea^ ^b^devaṃ paṭipucchi bhikkhū^eb^ti gopālavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. tena samayena rājagahavāsī aññataro gopālako pātarāsatthāya pilotikāya puṭabaddhaṃ kummāsaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhamitvā gāvīnaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ gocarabhūmiṃ sampāpuṇi. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ``ayaṃ idāneva kālaṃ karissati, mayhañca kummāsaṃ datvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajjissatī''ti ca ñatvā tassa samīpaṃ agamāsi. so ^a^V0.0262^ea^ velaṃ oloketvā therassa kummāsaṃ dātukāmo ahosi. tena ca samayena gāviyo māsakkhettaṃ pavisanti. atha so gopālo cintesi ``kiṃ nu kho therassa kummāsaṃ dadeyyaṃ, udāhu gāviyo māsakkhettato nīhareyya''nti. athassa etadahosi ``māsasāmikā maṃ yaṃ icchanti, taṃ karontu, there pana gate kummāsadānantarāyo me siyā, handāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ayyassa kummāsaṃ dassāmī''ti taṃ therassa upanesi. paṭiggahesi thero anukampaṃ upādāya.

[03] atha naṃ gāviyo nivattetuṃ parissayaṃ anoloketvā vegena upadhāvantaṃ pādena phuṭṭho āsīviso ḍaṃsi. theropi taṃ anukampamāno taṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ārabhi. gopālakopi gāviyo nivattetvā āgato theraṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjantaṃ disvā pasannacitto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi. tāvadevassa sakalasarīraṃ visaṃ ajjhotthari. muhuttameva vege muddhapatte kālamakāsi, kālakato ca tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti. taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno disvā imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi --
[21] ``disvāna devaṃ paṭipucchi bhikkhu, ucce vimānamhi ciraṭṭhitike.
[22] āmuttahatthābharaṇaṃ ^a^P0.0309^ea^ yasassiṃ, dibbe vimānamhi yathāpi candimā..
[22] āmuttahatthābharaṇo yasassī, dibbe vimānamhi yathāpi candimā..
[21] ``dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ. aṭṭhaṭṭhakā sikkhitā sādhurūpā.
[22] dibbā ca kaññā tidasacarā uḷārā, naccanti gāyanti pamodayanti..
[21] ``ahaṃ ^a^V0.0263^ea^ manussesu manussabhūto, saṅgamma rakkhissaṃ paresaṃ dhenuyo.
[22] tato ca āgā samaṇo mamantike, gāvo ca māse agamaṃsu khādituṃ..
[21] ``dvayajja kiccaṃ ubhayañca kāriyaṃ, iccevahaṃ bhante tadā vicintayiṃ.
[22] tato ca saññaṃ paṭiladdha yoniso, `dadāmi bhante'ti khipiṃ anantakaṃ..
[21] ``so māsakhettaṃ turito avāsariṃ, purā ayaṃ bhañjati yassidaṃ dhanaṃ.
[22] tato ca kaṇho urago mahāviso, aḍaṃsi pāde turitassa me sato..
[21] ``svāhaṃ aṭṭomhi dukkhena pīḷito, bhikkhu ca taṃ sāmaṃ muñcitvānantakaṃ.
[22] ahāsi kummāsaṃ mamānukampayā, tato cuto kālakatomhi devatā..
[21] ``tadeva ^a^M0.0291^ea^ ^a^P0.0310^ea^ kammaṃ kusalaṃ kataṃ mayā, sukhañca kammaṃ anubhomi attanā.
[22] tayā hi bhante anukampito bhusaṃ, kataññutāya abhivādayāmi taṃ..
[21] ``sadevake loke samārake ca, añño muni natthi tayānukampako.
[22] tayā hi bhante anukampito bhusaṃ, kataññutāya abhivādayāmi taṃ..
[21] ``imasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana, añño munī natthi tayānukampako.
[22] tayā hi bhante anukampito bhusaṃ, kataññutāya abhivādayāmi ta''nti..

[03] athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno attanā ca devatāya ca kathitaniyāmeneva taṃ bhagavato ārocesi. satthā tamatthaṃ paccanubhāsitvā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desetuṃ ^b^``disvāna devaṃ paṭipucchi bhikkhū''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] 1159^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^deva^eb^nti gopāladevaputtaṃ. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ sandhāya satthā vadati. so hi sabbaso bhinnakilesatāya bhikkhu. vimānassa bahukālāvaṭṭhāyitāya kappaṭṭhitikatāya eva vā ^b^``ciraṭṭhitike''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, ``ciraṭṭhitika''ntipi keci paṭhanti. tañhi ``deva''nti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ. sopi hi saṭṭhisatasahassādhikā tisso vassakoṭiyo tattha avaṭṭhānato ``ciraṭṭhitike''ti vattabbataṃ labhati. ^b^yathāpi candimā^eb^ti yathā candimā devaputto kantasītalamanoharakiraṇajālasamujjale ^a^V0.0264^ea^ attano dibbe vimānamhi virocati, evaṃ virocamānanti vacanasesā.
[03] 1160^b^.^eb^ ^b^alaṅkato^eb^tiādi tassa devaputtassa therena pucchitākāradassanaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.

[03] 1164^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅgammā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0292^ea^ saṅgametvā, ^b^saṅgammā^eb^ti vā saṅgahetvā. hetvatthopi hi idha antonīto, bahū ekato hutvāti attho. ^b^āgā^eb^ti āgañchi. ^b^māse^eb^ti māsasassāni.

[03] 1165^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvayajjā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0311^ea^ dvayaṃ ajja etarahi ^b^kiccaṃ^eb^ kātabbaṃ. ^b^ubhayañca kāriya^eb^nti vuttassevatthassa pariyāyavacanaṃ. ^b^sañña^eb^nti dhammasaññaṃ. tenāha ``yoniso''ti ^b^paṭiladdhā^eb^ti paṭilabhitvā. ^b^khipi^eb^nti paniggāhāpanavasena hatthe khipiṃ. ^b^anantaka^eb^nti nantakaṃ kummāsaṃ pakkhipitvā bandhitvā ṭhapitaṃ pilotikaṃ. a-kāro cettha nipātamattaṃ.

[03] 1166^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ti so ahaṃ. ^b^turito^eb^ti turito sambhamanto. ^b^avāsari^eb^nti upagacchi, pāvisiṃ vā. ^b^purā ayaṃ bhañjati yassidaṃ dhana^eb^nti yassa khettasāmikassa idaṃ māsasassaṃ dhanaṃ, taṃ ayaṃ gogaṇo bhañjati purā tassa bhañjanato, āmaddanato puretaramevāti attho. ^b^tato^eb^ti tattha. ^b^turitassa me sato^eb^ti sambhamantassa me samānassa, sahasā gamanena magge kaṇhasappaṃ anoloketvā gatassāti adhippāyo.

[03] 1167^b^.^eb^ ^b^aṭṭomhi dukkhena pīḷito^eb^ti tena āsīvisaḍaṃsanena aṭṭo aṭṭito upadduto maraṇadukkhena bādhito bhavāmi. ^b^ahāsī^eb^ti ajjhohari, paribhuñjīti attho. ^b^tato cuto kālakatomhi devatā^eb^ti tato manussattabhāvato cuto maraṇakālappattiyā, tattha vā āyusaṅkhārassa khepanasaṅkhātassa kālassa katattā kālakato, tadanantarameva ca amhi devatā devattabhāvappattiyā devatā homīti attho.
[03] 1169^b^.^eb^ ^b^tayā^eb^ti tayā sadiso ^b^añño muni^eb^ moneyyaguṇayutto isi natthi. ^b^tayā^eb^ti vā nissakke idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^puṇṇamāse^eb^ ^a^M0.0293^ea^ ^a^V0.0265^ea^ ^b^yathā cando^eb^ti kaṇḍakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā ^a^P0.0312^ea^ sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gato. tasmiṃ khaṇe kaṇḍako devaputto sakabhavanato nikkhamitvā dibbayānaṃ abhiruhitvā mahantena parivārena mahatiyā deviddhiyā uyyānaṃ gacchanto āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno sahasā yānato oruyha theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ thero --
[22] kūṭāgārā subhā rammā, pāsādo te sumāpito..
[21] ``dibbā te vividhā rūpā, dibbā saddā atho rasā.
[22] gandhā ca te adhippetā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā..
[21] ``dānassa te idaṃ phalaṃ, atho sīlassa vā pana.
[22] atho añjalikammassa, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito''ti.. --
[22] pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ''..
[22] so maṃ mudūhi pāṇīhi, jālitambanakhehi ca..
[21] ``taṃ me giraṃ suṇantassa, hāso me vipulo ahu.
[22] mamaṃ channañca ohāya, anapekkho so apakkami..
[22] alatthaṃ garukābādhaṃ, khippaṃ me maraṇaṃ ahu..
[21] ``yañca me ahuvā hāso, saddaṃ sutvāna bodhiyā.
[21] ``sace ^a^P0.0314^ea^ hi bhante gaccheyyāsi, satthu buddhassa santike.
[22] mamāpi naṃ vacanena, sirasā vajjāsi vandanaṃ..

[25] sopi ^a^V0.0268^ea^ attanā katakammaṃ kathesi. ayañhi anantare attabhāve amhākaṃ bodhisattena sahajāto kaṇḍako assarājā ahosi. so abhinikkhamanasamaye abhiruḷho teneva rattāvasesena tīṇi rajjāni mahāpurisaṃ atikkamāpetvā anomānadītīraṃ sampāpesi. atha so mahāsattena sūriye uggate ghaṭikāramahābrahmunā upanītāni pattacīvarāni gahetvā pabbajitvā channena saddhiṃ kapilavatthuṃ uddissa vissajjito. sinehabhārikena hadayena mahāpurisassa pāde attano jivhāya lehitvā pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā yāva dassanapathā olokento dassanūpacāraṃ pana atikkante lokanāthe ``evaṃvidhaṃ nāma lokagganāyakaṃ mahāpurisaṃ ahaṃ vahiṃ, saphalaṃ vata me sarīraṃ ahosī''ti pasannamānaso hutvā puna cirakālaṃ saṅgatassa pemassa vasena viyogadukkhaṃ asahanto bhāviniyā dibbasampattiyā vasena ^a^M0.0296^ea^ dhammatāya codiyamāno kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``puṇṇamāse yathā cando...pe0... ahaṃ kapilavatthusmi''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] 1171^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^puṇṇamāse^eb^ti puṇṇamāsiyaṃ sukkapakkhe pannarasiyaṃ. ^b^tārakādhipatī^eb^ti tārakānaṃ adhipati. ^b^sasī^eb^ti sasalañchanavā. ``tārakādhipa dissatī''ti keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ tārakādhipāti avibhattikaniddeso, tārakānaṃ adhipo hutvā dissati anupariyāti cāti yojanā kātabbā.

[03] 1172^b^.^eb^ ^b^dibbaṃ devapuramhi cā^eb^ti devapurasmimpi dibbaṃ. yathā manussānaṃ ṭhānato devapuraṃ uttamaṃ, evaṃ devapurato cāpi idaṃ tava vimānaṃ uttamanti dasseti. tenāha ^b^``atirocati vaṇṇena, udayantova raṃsimā''^eb^ti, uggacchanto sūriyo viyāti attho.
[03] 1173^b^.^eb^ ^b^veḷūriyasuvaṇṇassā^eb^ti veḷuriyena suvaṇṇena ca idaṃ byamhaṃ ^a^P0.0315^ea^ nimmitanti vacanasesena yojanā. ^b^phalikā^eb^ti phalikamaṇinā.
[03] 1177-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassā^eb^ti tassā pokkharaṇiyā. ^b^vanagumbā^eb^ti uyyāne supupphagacche sandhāya vadati. ^b^devarājaṃvā^eb^ti sakkaṃ viya. ^b^upatiṭṭhantī^eb^ti upaṭṭhānaṃ karonti.
