[03] 1179^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbābharaṇasañchannā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0269^ea^ sabbehi itthālaṅkārehi paṭicchāditā, sabbaso vibhūsitasarīrāti attho. ^b^vasavattīvā^eb^ti vasavattidevarājā viya.

[03] 1180^b^.^eb^ ^b^bherisaṅkhamudiṅgāhī^eb^ti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, bherīhi ca saṅkhehi ca mudiṅgehi cāti yojanā. ^b^ratisampanno^eb^ti dibbāya ratiyā samaṅgībhūto. ^b^naccagīte suvādite^eb^ti nacce ca gīte ca sundare vādite ca, naccane ca gāyane ca sundare vādite ca hetubhūte. nimittatthe hi etaṃ bhummaṃ, pavattiteti vā vacanaseso.

[03] 1181^b^.^eb^ ^b^dibbā te vividhā rūpā^eb^ti devalokapariyāpannā nānappakārā cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā tuyhaṃ adhippetā yathādhippetā manoramā ^a^M0.0297^ea^ vijjantīti kiriyāpadaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^dibbā saddā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo.
[03] 1185^b^.^eb^ ^b^kaṇḍako sahajo aha^eb^nti ettha ^b^aha^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ``ahū''ti keci paṭṭhanti, kaṇḍako nāma assarājā mahāsattena saha ekasmiṃyeva divase jātattā sahajo ahosinti attho.

[03] 1186^b^.^eb^ ^b^aḍḍharattāya^eb^nti aḍḍharattiyaṃ, majjhimayāmasamayeti attho. ^b^bodhāya mabhinikkhamī^eb^ti ma-kāro padasandhikaro, abhisambodhiatthaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamīti attho. ^b^mudūhi pāṇīhī^eb^ti muduhatthataṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ vadati. ^b^jālitambanakhehī^eb^ti jālavantehi abhilohitanakhehi. tena jālahatthataṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ tambanakhataṃ anubyañjanañca dasseti.

[03] 1187^b^.^eb^ ^b^satthi^eb^ nāma jaṅghā, idha pana satthino āsannaṭṭhānabhūto ^a^P0.0316^ea^ ūruppadeso ``satthī''ti vutto. ^b^ākoṭayitvānā^eb^ti appoṭhetvā. ^b^``vaha sammā''ti cabravī^eb^ti ``samma kaṇḍaka, ajjekarattiṃ maṃ vaha, mayhaṃ opavuyhaṃ hohī''ti ca kathesi. vahane pana payojanaṃ tadā mahāsattena dassitaṃ vadanto ^b^``ahaṃ lokaṃ tārayissaṃ, patto sambodhimuttama''^eb^nti āha. tena ``ahaṃ uttamaṃ anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patto adhigato hutvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ saṃsāramahoghato tārayissāmi, tasmā nayidaṃ gamanaṃ yaṃkiñcīti cinteyyāsī''ti gamane payojanassa anuttarabhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03] 1188-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^hāso^eb^ti tuṭṭhi. ^b^vipulo^eb^ti mahāuḷāro. ^b^abhisīsi^eb^nti āsisiṃ icchiṃ sampaṭicchiṃ ^a^V0.0270^ea^. ^b^abhirūḷhañca maṃ ñatvā, sakyaputtaṃ mahāyasa^eb^nti patthaṭavipulayasaṃ sakyarājaputtaṃ mahāsattaṃ maṃ abhiruyha nisinnaṃ jānitvā. ^b^vahissa^eb^nti nesiṃ.

[03] 1190-91^b^.^eb^ ^b^paresa^eb^nti pararājūnaṃ. ^b^vijita^eb^nti desaṃ pararajjaṃ. ^b^ohāyā^eb^ti vissajjitvā. ^b^apakkamī^eb^ti apakkamituṃ ārabhi. ``paribbajī''ti ca paṭhanti. ^b^parilehisa^eb^nti parito lehiṃ. ^b^udikkhisa^eb^nti olokesiṃ.

[03] 1192-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^garukābādha^eb^nti ^a^M0.0298^ea^ garukaṃ bāḷhaṃ ābādhaṃ, maraṇantikaṃ dukkhanti attho. tenāha ^b^``khippaṃ me maraṇaṃ ahū''^eb^ti. so hi anekāsu jātīsu mahāsattena daḷhabhattiko hutvā āgato, tasmā viyogadukkhaṃ sahituṃ nāsakkhi, ``sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ nikkhanto''ti pana sutvā nirāmisaṃ uḷāraṃ pītisomanassañca uppajji, tena maraṇānantaraṃ tāvatiṃsesu nibbatti, uḷārā cassa dibbasampattiyo pāturahesuṃ. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``tasseva ānubhāvenā''^eb^ti, ṭhānagatassa pasādamayapuññassa balena. ^b^devo devapuramhivā^eb^ti tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko devarājā viya.

[03] 1194^b^.^eb^ ^b^yañca^eb^ ^a^P0.0317^ea^ ^b^me ahuvā hāso, saddaṃ sutvāna bodhiyā^eb^ti ``patto sambodhimuttama''nti paṭhamataraṃ bodhisaddaṃ sutvā tadā mayhaṃ hāso ahu, yaṃ hāsassa bhavanaṃ sussanaṃ, ^b^teneva kusalamūlena^eb^ teneva kusalabījena ^b^phusissa^eb^nti phusissāmi pāpuṇissāmi.

[03] 1195^b^.^eb^ evaṃ devaputto yathādhigatāya anāgatāya bhavasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṃ attano kusalakammaṃ kathento idāni attanā bhagavato santikaṃ gantukāmopi puretaraṃ therena satthu vandanaṃ pesento ^b^``sace''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^sace gaccheyyāsī^eb^ti yadi gamissasi. ``sace gacchasī''ti keci paṭhanti, so evattho. ^b^mamāpi naṃ vacanenā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ tava sabhāveneva, atha kho mamāpi vacanena bhagavantaṃ. ^b^vajjāsī^eb^ti vadeyyāsi, mamāpi ^b^sirasā vandana^eb^nti yojanā.

[03] 1196^b^.^eb^ yadipi dāni vandanañca pesemi, pesetvā eva pana na tiṭṭhāmīti dassento āha ^b^``ahampi daṭṭhuṃ gacchissaṃ, jinaṃ appaṭipuggala''^eb^nti. gamane pana daḷhataraṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ hoti, lokanāthāna tādina''^eb^nti āha.

[03] 1197^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0299^ea^ ^b^sutvā giraṃ cakkhumato^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumato sammāsambuddhassa vacanaṃ sutvā. ^b^dhammacakkhu^eb^nti sotāpattimaggaṃ. ^b^visodhayī^eb^ti adhigacchi. adhigamoyeva hi tassa visodhanaṃ.

[03] 1198^b^.^eb^ ^b^visodhetvā diṭṭhigata^eb^nti diṭṭhigataṃ samugghātetvā. ^b^vicikicchaṃ vatāni cā^eb^ti soḷasavatthukaṃ aṭṭhavatthukañca vicikicchañca ``sīlabbatehi suddhī''ti pavattanakasīlabbataparāmāse ^a^P0.0318^ea^ ca visodhayīti yojanā. tattha hi saha pariyāyehi tathā pavattā parāmāsā ``vatānī''ti vuttaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^anekavaṇṇaṃ darasokanāsana^eb^nti anekavaṇṇavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayena devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ agamāsi. atha naṃ anekavaṇṇo devaputto disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno upasaṅkamitvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. thero --
[21] ``samassamo ^a^V0.0272^ea^ natthi kuto panuttaro, yasena puññena ca iddhiyā ca.
[27] sabbe ca devā tidasagaṇā samecca, taṃ taṃ namassanti sasiṃva devā.
[22] imā ca te accharāyo samantato, naccanti gāyanti pamodayanti..
[21] ``ahaṃ bhadante ahuvāsi pubbe, sumedhanāmassa jinassa sāvako.
[22] puthujjano ananubodhohamasmi, so satta vassāni paribbajissahaṃ..
[22] ratanuccayaṃ hemajālena channaṃ, vanditvā thūpasmiṃ manaṃ pasādayiṃ..
[21] ``na māsi dānaṃ na ca matthi dātuṃ, pare ca kho tattha samādapesiṃ.
[22] pūjetha naṃ pūjanīyassa dhātuṃ, evaṃ kira saggamito gamissatha..
[22] na tassa puññassa khayampi ajjhaga''nti.. -- kathesi.

[03] ito kira tiṃsakappasahasse sumedho nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ^a^V0.0273^ea^ ekobhāsaṃ katvā katabuddhakicco parinibbuto, manussehi ca bhagavato dhātuṃ gahetvā ratanacetiye kate aññataro puriso satthu sāsane pabbajitvā satta vassāni brahmacariyaṃ ^a^M0.0301^ea^ caritvā anavaṭṭhitacittatāya kukkuccako hutvā uppabbaji. uppabbajito ca saṃvegabahulatāya dhammacchandavantatāya ca cetiyaṅgaṇe sammajjanaparibhaṇḍādīni karonto niccasīlauposathasīlāni rakkhanto dhammaṃ suṇanto aññe ca puññakiriyāya samādapento vicari. so āyupariyosāne kālakato tāvatiṃsesu nibbatti. so puññakammassa uḷārabhāvena mahesakkho ^a^P0.0320^ea^ mahānubhāvo sakkādīhi devatāhi sakkatapūjito hutvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti, ``anekavaṇṇo''ti naṃ devatā sañjāniṃsu. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``atha naṃ anekavaṇṇo devaputto...pe0... na tassa puññassa khayampi ajjhaganti kathesī''ti.

[03] 1199^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^anekavaṇṇa^eb^nti nīlapītādivasena vividhavaṇṇatāya anantaravimānādīnaṃ vividhasaṇṭhānatāya ca nānāvidhavaṇṇaṃ. ^b^darasokanāsana^eb^nti sītalabhāvena darathapariḷāhānaṃ vinodanato manuññatāya dassanīyatāya ca sokassa anokāsato darasokanāsanaṃ. ^b^anekacitta^eb^nti nānāvidhacittarūpaṃ. ^b^sunimmito bhūtapatīvā^eb^ti tāvatiṃsakāyikopi uḷāradibbabhogatāya sunimmitadevarājā viya modasi tussasi abhiramasi.

[03] 1200^b^.^eb^ ^b^samassamo^eb^ti samo eva hutvā samo, nibbariyāyena sadiso te tuyhaṃ natthi, kuto pana kena kāraṇena uttari adhiko ko nāma siyā. kena pana samatā uttaritaratā cāti āha ^b^``yasena puññena ca iddhiyā cā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^yasenā^eb^ti parivārena. ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti ānubhāvena. ^b^yasenā^eb^ti vā issariyena, ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti deviddhiyā. ^b^yasenā^eb^ti vā vibhavasampattiyā, ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti yathicchi tassa kāmaguṇassa ijjhanena. ^b^yasenā^eb^ti vā kittighosena, ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti samiddhiyā. ^b^puññenā^eb^ti tattha tattha vuttāvasiṭṭhapuññaphalena, puññakammeneva vā.

[03] ^b^``sabbe ca devā''^eb^ti sāmaññato gahitamatthaṃ ^b^``tidasagaṇā''^eb^ti iminā visesetvā vuttaṃ. ekaccassa paccekaṃ nipaccakāraṃ karontāpi pamuditā na karonti ^a^M0.0302^ea^, na evametassa ^a^P0.0321^ea^. etassa pana pamuditāpi karontiyevāti dassetuṃ ^b^``sameccā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^taṃ ta^eb^nti taṃ tvaṃ. ^b^sasiṃva devā^eb^ti yathā nāma sukkapakkhapāṭipadiyaṃ dissamānaṃ sasiṃ candaṃ manussā devā ca ādarajātā namassanti, evaṃ taṃ sabbepi tidasagaṇā namassantīti attho.

[03] 1203^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhadante^eb^ti ^a^V0.0274^ea^ theraṃ gāravabahumānena samudācarati. ^b^ahuvāsi^eb^nti ahosiṃ. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti purimajātiyaṃ. ^b^sumedhanāmassa jinassa sāvako^eb^ti sumedhoti evaṃ pākaṭanāmassa sammāsambuddassa sāsane pabbajitabhāvena sāvako. ^b^puthūjjano^eb^ti anariyo. tatthāpi saccānaṃ anubodhamattassāpi abhāvena ^b^ananubodho. so satta vassāni paribbajissaha^eb^nti so ahaṃ satta saṃvaccharāni pabbajjāguṇamattena vicariṃ, uttarimanussadhammaṃ nādhigacchinti adhippāyo.

[03] 1204^b^.^eb^ ^b^ratanuccaya^eb^nti maṇikanakādiratanehi uccitaṃ ussitaratanacetiyaṃ. ^b^hemajālena channa^eb^nti samantato upari ca kañcanajālena paṭicchāditaṃ. ^b^vanditvā^eb^ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena tattha tattha paṇāmaṃ katvā. ^b^thūpasmiṃ manaṃ pasādayi^eb^nti ``sabbaññuguṇādhiṭṭhānāya vata dhātuyā ayaṃ thūpo''ti thūpasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesiṃ.

[03] 1205^b^.^eb^ ^b^na māsi dāna^eb^nti me mayā kataṃ dānaṃ nāsi nāhosi. kasmā pana? ^b^na ca metthi dātu^eb^nti me mama pariggahabhūtaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na atthi, na kiñci deyyavatthu vijjati, ^b^pare ca kho^eb^ satte ^b^tattha^eb^ dāne ^b^samādapesiṃ^eb^. ``paresañca tattha samādapesi''nti ca paṭhanti, tattha ^b^paresa^eb^nti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ^a^P0.0322^ea^. ^b^pūjetha na^eb^ntiādi samādapanākāradassanaṃ, taṃ dhātunti yojanā. ^b^evaṃ kirā^eb^ti ^b^kira^eb^-saddo anussavattho.

[03] 1206^b^.^eb^ ^b^na tassa puññassa khayampi ajjhaga^eb^nti tassa tadā sumedhaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa katassa puññakammassa parikkhayaṃ nādhigacchiṃ, tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesaṃ paccanubhomīti dasseti. yaṃ panettha na vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^alaṅkato^eb^ ^a^M0.0303^ea^ ^b^maṭṭhakuṇḍalī^eb^ti maṭṭhakuṇḍalīvimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena sāvatthivāsī eko brāhmaṇo addho mahaddhano mahābhogo assaddho appasanno micchādiṭṭhiko kassaci kiñci na deti, adānato eva ``adinnapubbako''ti paññāyittha. so micchādiṭṭhibhāvena ca luddhabhāvena ca tathāgataṃ vā tathāgatasāvakaṃ vā daṭṭhumpi na icchati. maṭṭhakuṇḍalaṃ nāma attano puttañca sikkhāpesi ``tāta ^a^V0.0275^ea^, tayā samaṇo gotamo tassa sāvakā ca na upasaṅkamitabbā na daṭṭhabbā''ti. sopi tathā akāsi. athassa putto gilāno ahosi, brāhmaṇo dhanakkhayabhayena bhesajjaṃ na kāresi, roge pana vaḍḍhiteva vejje pakkositvā dassesi. vejjā tassa sarīraṃ oloketvā ``atekiccho''ti taṃ ñatvā apakkamiṃsu. brāhmaṇo ``putte abbhantare mate nīharaṇaṃ dukkha''nti puttaṃ bahidvārakoṭṭhake nipajjāpesi.

[03] bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento addasa ^a^P0.0323^ea^ maṭṭhakuṇḍalīmāṇavaṃ khīṇāyukaṃ tadaheva cavanadhammaṃ, nirayasaṃvattanikañcassa kammaṃ katokāsaṃ. ``sace panāhaṃ tattha gamissāmi, so mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā devaloke nibbattitvā pitaraṃ āḷāhane rodamānaṃ upagantvā saṃvejessati, evaṃ so ca tassa pitā ca mama santikaṃ āgamissati, mahājanakāyo sannipatissati tattha mayā dhamme desite mahādhammābhisamayo bhavissatī''ti evaṃ pana ñatvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho maṭṭhakuṇḍalīmāṇavassa pitu gehasamīpe ṭhatvā chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjesi. tā disvā māṇavo ``kimeta''nti ito cito ca vilokento addasa bhagavantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ dvattiṃsāya mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi asītiyā anubyañjanehi byāmappabhāya ketumālāya ca vijjotamānaṃ anupamāya buddhasiriyā acinteyyena buddhānubhāvena virocamānaṃ. disvā tassa etadahosi ``buddho nu kho bhagavā idhānuppatto, yassāyaṃ rūpasampadā attano tejasā sūriyampi abhibhavati, kantabhāvena candimaṃ, upasantabhāvena ^a^M0.0304^ea^ sabbepi samaṇabrāhmaṇe, upasamena nāma ettheva bhavitabbaṃ, ayameva ca maññe imasmiṃ loke aggapuggalo, mameva ca anukampāya idhānuppatto''ti buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭasarīro anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento pasannacitto añjaliṃ paggayha nipajji. taṃ disvā bhagavā ``alaṃ imassa ettakena saggūpapattiyā''ti pakkāmi.

[03] sopi taṃ pītisomanassaṃ avijahantova kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike vimāne nibbatti. pitā panassa sarīrasakkāraṃ karitvā dutiyadivase paccūsavelāyaṃ āḷāhanaṃ gantvā ``hā hā maṭṭhakuṇḍali, hā hā maṭṭhakuṇḍalī''ti paridevamāno āḷāhanaṃ anuparikkamanto rodati. devaputto attano ^a^P0.0324^ea^ vibhavasampattiṃ oloketvā ``kuto nu kho ahaṃ idhāgato kiñca kammaṃ katvā''ti upadhārento attano purimattabhāvaṃ ñatvā tattha ca maraṇakāle bhagavati pavattitaṃ cittappasādaṃ manoharaṃ añjalikaraṇamattaṃ disvā ``aho mahānubhāvā buddhā bhagavanto''ti sātisayaṃ tathāgate sañjātappasādabahumāno ``adinnapubbakabrāhmaṇo nu kho kiṃ karotī''ti ^a^V0.0276^ea^ upadhārento āḷāhane rodamānaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ mayhaṃ pubbe bhesajjamattampi akatvā idāni niratthakaṃ āḷāhane rodati, handa naṃ saṃvejetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpessāmī''ti devalokato āgantvā maṭṭhakuṇḍalīrūpena rodamāno ``hā hā canda, hā hā sūriyā''ti bāhā paggayha kandanto pitu samīpe aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ brāhmaṇo ``ayaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍalī āgato''ti cintetvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[22] bāhā paggayha kandasi, vanamajjhe kiṃ dukkhito tuva''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^alaṅkato^eb^ti vibhūsito. ^b^maṭṭhakuṇḍalī^eb^ti sarīrappadesassa aghaṃsanatthaṃ mālālatādayo adassetvā maṭṭhākāreneva katakuṇḍalo. atha vā ^b^maṭṭhakuṇḍalī^eb^ti visuddhakuṇḍalo, tāpetvā jātihiṅgulikāya majjitvā dhovitvā sūkaralomena majjitakuṇḍaloti attho ^a^M0.0305^ea^. ^b^māladhārī^eb^ti mālaṃ dhārento, piḷandhitamāloti attho. ^b^haricandanussado^eb^ti rattacandanena sabbaso anulittagatto. ^b^ki^eb^nti pucchāvacanaṃ. ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti dukkhappatto. ^b^kiṃdukkhito^eb^ti vā ekameva padaṃ, kena dukkhena dukkhitoti attho.
[22] tassa ^a^P0.0325^ea^ cakkayugaṃ na vindāmi, tena dukkhena jahāmi jīvita''nti..
[22] ācikkha me bhaddamāṇava, cakkayugaṃ paṭipādayāmi te''ti..

[03] taṃ sutvā māṇavo ``ayaṃ puttassa bhesajjaṃ akatvā puttapatirūpakaṃ maṃ disvā rodanto `suvaṇṇādimayaṃ rathacakkaṃ karomī'ti vadati, hotu niggaṇhissāmi na''nti cintetvā ``kīva mahantaṃ me cakkayugaṃ karissasī''ti vatvā ``yāva mahantaṃ ākaṅkhasī''ti vutte ``candimasūriyehi me attho, te me dehī''ti yācanto --
[21] ``so ^a^V0.0277^ea^ māṇavo tassa pāvadi, candasūriyā ubhayettha dissare.
[22] sovaṇṇamayo ratho mama, tena cakkayugena sobhatī''ti..
[21] ``bālo kho tvaṃ asi māṇava, yo tvaṃ patthayase apatthiyaṃ.
[22] maññāmi tuvaṃ marissasi, na hi tvaṃ lacchasi candasūriye''ti..
[03] atha ^a^M0.0306^ea^ naṃ māṇavo ``kiṃ pana paññāyamānassatthāya rodanto bālo hoti, udāhu apaññāyamānassā''ti vatvā --
[22] peto kālakato na dissati, ko nidha kandataṃ bālyataro''ti..
[03] taṃ ^a^P0.0326^ea^ sutvā brāhmaṇo ``yuttaṃ esa vadatī''ti sallakkhetvā --
[21] ``saccaṃ kho vadesi māṇava, ahameva kandataṃ bālyataro.
[22] candaṃ viya dārako rudaṃ, petaṃ kālakatābhipatthayi''nti.. --
[25] vatvā tassa kathāya nissoko hutvā māṇavassa thutiṃ karonto imā gāthā abhāsi --
[22] vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ..
[22] na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇavā''ti..

[03] 1208-10^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0278^ea^ ^b^rathapañjaro^eb^ti rathūpatthaṃ. ^b^na vindāmī^eb^ti na labhāmi. ^b^bhaddamāṇavā^eb^ti ālapanaṃ. ^b^paṭipādayāmī^eb^ti sampādetvā dadāmi, mā cakkayugābhāvena jīvitaṃ jahīti adhippāyo. ^b^ubhayettha dissare^eb^ti ubhopi ettha candasūriyā ākāse dissanti. ^b^ya^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro, ubhaye etthāti vā padavibhāgo.

[03] 1212^b^.^eb^ ^b^gamanāgamana^eb^nti divase divase ogamanuggamanavasena candasūriyānaṃ gamanaṃ āgamanañca dissati. ``gamanogamana''ntipi pāḷi, uggamanaṃ ogamanañcāti ^a^M0.0307^ea^ attho. ^b^vaṇṇadhātū^eb^ti sītibhāvavisiṭṭhā kantabhāvabhāsurā, uṇhabhāvavisiṭṭhā tikkhabhāvabhāsurā ca vaṇṇanibhā. ^b^ubhayatthā^eb^ti cande sūriye cāti dvīsupi vaṇṇadhātu dissatīti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^vīthiyā^eb^ti pavattanavīthiyaṃ ākāse, nāgavīthiyādivīthiyaṃ vā. ``ubhayetthā''tipi pāṭho, ubhaye etthāti padavisandhi. ^b^bālyataro^eb^ti bālataro atisayena bālo.

[03] 1213^b^.^eb^ imaṃ ^a^P0.0327^ea^ pana kathaṃ sutvā ``alabbhanīyavatthuṃ vatāhaṃ patthetvā kevalaṃ sokagginā ḍayhāmi, kiṃ me niratthakena anayabyasanenā''ti paṭisaṅkhāne aṭṭhāsi. atha devaputto maṭṭhakuṇḍalīrūpaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā attano dibbarūpeneva aṭṭhāsi. brāhmaṇo pana taṃ anoloketvā māṇavavohāreneva voharanto ^b^``saccaṃ kho vadesi māṇavā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^candaṃ viya dārako ruda^eb^nti candaṃ abhipatthayaṃ rudanto dārako viyāti attho. ^b^kālakatābhipatthayi^eb^nti kālakataṃ abhipatthayiṃ. ``abhipatthaya''ntipi pāṭho.
[03] 1214-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^āditta^eb^nti sokagginā ādittaṃ. ^b^nibbāpaye dara^eb^nti nibbāpayi darathaṃ sokapariḷāhaṃ. ^b^abbahī^eb^ti uddhari.
[03] atha brāhmaṇo sokaṃ vinodetvā attano upadesadāyakaṃ dibbarūpena ṭhitaṃ disvā ``ko nāma tva''nti pucchanto --
[22] ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya''nti.. --
[21] ``yañca ^a^V0.0279^ea^ kandasi yañca rodasi, puttaṃ āḷāhane sayaṃ dahitvā.
[22] svāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvā kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato''ti.. --
[25] attānaṃ ^a^M0.0308^ea^ kathesi. tattha ^b^yañca kandasi yañca rodasī^eb^ti yaṃ tava puttaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍaliṃ uddissa rodasi, assūni muñcasi.
[21] ``appaṃ ^a^P0.0328^ea^ vā bahuṃ vā nāddasāma, dānaṃ dadantassa sake agāre.
[22] uposathakammaṃ vā tādisaṃ, kena kammena gatosi devaloka''nti..
[22] buddhaṃ vigatarajaṃ vitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ, addakkhiṃ sugataṃ anomapaññaṃ..
[22] tāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvāna kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato''ti..

[03] 1220-21^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ābādhiko^eb^ti ābādhasamaṅgī. ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti teneva ābādhikabhāvena jātadukkho. ^b^gilāno^eb^ti gilāyamānoti attho. ^b^āturarūpo^eb^ti dukkhavedanābhitunnakāyo. ^b^vigataraja^eb^nti vigatarāgādirajaṃ. ^b^vitiṇṇakaṅkha^eb^nti sabbaso saṃsayānaṃ samucchinnattā tiṇṇavicikicchaṃ. ^b^anomapañña^eb^nti paripuṇṇapaññaṃ, sabbaññunti attho. ^b^akari^eb^nti akāsiṃ. ^b^tāha^eb^nti taṃ ahaṃ.
[03] evaṃ tasmiṃ kathenteyeva brāhmaṇassa sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā paripūri. so taṃ pītiṃ pavedento --

[03] tattha anabhiṇhappavattitāya accharaṃ paharituṃ yogganti ^b^acchariyaṃ,^eb^ abhūtapubbatāya ^b^abbhutaṃ^eb^. ubhayenapi vimhayāvahataṃyeva dassetvā ^b^``ahampi muditamano pasannacitto, ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajāmī''^eb^ti āha.
[03] atha naṃ devaputto saraṇagamane sīlasamādāne ca niyojento --
[21] ``ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajāhi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto.
[22] tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu..
[22] amajjapo mā ca musā bhaṇāhi, sakena dārena ca hohi tuṭṭho''ti.. --

[03] 1223^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tathevā^eb^ti yathā pasannacitto ``sammāsambuddho bhagavā''ti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajesi, tatheva ``svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho''ti pasannacitto dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṃ vajāhi. yathā vā pasannacitto ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ vajesi, tatheva ``ayaṃ ekaṃsato diṭṭheva dhamme abhisamparāyañca hitasukhāvaho''ti pasannacitto ^b^sikkhāya^eb^ adhisīlasikkhāya ^b^padāni^eb^ koṭṭhāsabhūtāni adhicittādhipaññāsikkhāya vā upāyabhūtāni pañcasīlāni avikopanato ca asaṃkilissanato ca ^b^akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu,^eb^ samādāya vattassūti attho.
[03] evaṃ ^a^P0.0330^ea^ devaputtena saraṇagamane sīlasamādāne ca niyojito brāhmaṇo tassa vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanto --
[22] karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamā''ti.. --
[22] amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho''ti.. --

[03] tato devaputto ``kataṃ mayā brāhmaṇassa kattabbayuttakaṃ, idāni sayameva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamissatī''ti tattheva antaradhāyi. brāhmaṇopi kho bhagavati sañjātapasādabahumāno devatāya ca codiyamāno ``samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamissāmī''ti vihārābhimukho gacchati. taṃ disvā mahājano ``ayaṃ brāhmaṇo ettakaṃ kālaṃ tathāgataṃ anupasaṅkamitvā ajja puttasokena upasaṅkamati, kīdisī nu kho dhammadesanā bhavissatī''ti taṃ anubandhi.

[03] brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā evamāha ``sakkā nu kho bho gotama kiñci dānaṃ adatvā sīlaṃ vā arakkhitvā kevalaṃ tumhesu pasādamattena sagge nibbattitu''nti. ``nanu, brāhmaṇa, ajja paccūsavelāyaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍalinā devaputtena attano devalokūpapattikāraṇaṃ tuyhaṃ kathika''nti bhagavā avoca. tasmiṃ khaṇe maṭṭhakuṇḍalīdevaputto saha vimānena āgantvā dissamānarūpo vimānato oruyha bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. atha bhagavā tassaṃ parisati tena devaputtena katasucaritaṃ kathetvā parisāya cittakallataṃ ñatvā sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanaṃ akāsi. desanāpariyosāne devaputto ca brāhmaṇo ca sannipatitaparisā cāti caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.

[03] ^b^suṇotha^eb^ ^a^M0.0311^ea^ ^a^P0.0331^ea^ ^a^V0.0282^ea^ ^b^yakkhassa ca vāṇijāna cā^eb^ti serīsakavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavati parinibbute āyasmā kumārakassapo pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ setabyanagaraṃ sampatto. tattha pāyāsirājaññaṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ viparītaggāhato vivecetvā sammādassane patiṭṭhāpesi. so tato paṭṭhāya puññapasuto hutvā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dānaṃ dento tattha akataparicayatāya asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā cātumahārājikabhavane suññe serīsake vimāne nibbatti.

[03] atīte kira kassapassa bhagavato kāle eko khīṇāsavatthero aññatarasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā bahigāme devasikaṃ ekasmiṃ padese bhattakiccaṃ akāsi. taṃ disvā eko gopālako ``ayyo sūriyātapena kilamatī''ti pasannacitto catūhi sirīsathambhehi sākhāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā adāsi, maṇḍapassa samīpe sirīsarukkhaṃ ropesīti ca vadanti. so kālaṃ katvā teneva puññakammena cātumahārājikesu nibbatti, tassa purimakammassa sūcakaṃ vimānadvāre sirīsavanaṃ nibbatti vaṇṇagandhasampannehi pupphehi sabbakālaṃ upasobhamānaṃ, tena taṃ vimānaṃ ``serīsaka''nti paññāyittha. so ca devaputto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde yasattherassa catūsu vimalādīsu gihisahāyesu gavampati nāma hutvā bhagavato dhammadesanāya arahatte patiṭṭhito pubbāciṇṇavasena taṃ suññavimānaṃ disvā abhiṇhaṃ ^a^P0.0332^ea^ divāvihāraṃ gacchati.

[03] so aparabhāge pāyāsidevaputtaṃ tattha disvā ``kosi tvaṃ, āvuso''ti pucchitvā tena ``ahaṃ, bhante, pāyāsirājañño idhūpapanno''ti vutte ``nanu tvaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko viparītadassano kathamidhūpapanno''ti āha. atha naṃ pāyāsidevaputto ``ayyenamhi kumārakassapattherena micchādassanato vivecito, puññakiriyānaṃ asakkaccakāritāya pana suññe vimāne nibbatto. sādhu, bhante, manussalokaṃ gatakāle mama parijanassa ārocetha ^a^M0.0312^ea^ `pāyāsirājañño asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā suññaṃ serīsakavimānaṃ upapanno, tumhe pana sakkaccaṃ puññāni katvā tatrūpapattiyā cittaṃ paṇidahathā''ti. thero tassānukampāya tathā akāsi. tepi therassa vacanaṃ sutvā tathā cittaṃ paṇidhāya puññāni katvā serīsake vimāne nibbattiṃsu. serīsakadevaputtaṃ pana ^a^V0.0283^ea^ vessavaṇamahārājā marubhūmiyaṃ chāyūdakarahite magge maggapaṭipannānaṃ manussānaṃ amanussaparipantha mocanatthaṃ maggarakkhakaṃ ṭhapesi.

[03] atha aparena samayena aṅgamagadhavāsino vāṇijā sakaṭasahassaṃ bhaṇḍassa pūretvā sindhusovīradesaṃ gacchantā marukantāre divā uṇhabhayena maggaṃ appaṭipajjitvā rattiṃ nakkhattasaññāya maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. te maggamūḷhā hutvā aññaṃ disaṃ agamaṃsu. tesaṃ antare eko upāsako ahosi saddho pasanno sīlasampanno arahattappattiyā upanissayasampanno mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhānatthaṃ vaṇijjāya gato. taṃ anuggaṇhanto serīsakadevaputto saha vimānena attānaṃ dassesi. dassetvā ca pana ``kasmā tumhe imaṃ chāyūdakarahitaṃ vālukākantāraṃ paṭipannā''ti pucchi. te cassa tattha attano āgatappakāraṃ kathesuṃ, tadatthadīpanā devaputtassa vāṇijānañca vacanapaṭivacanagāthā honti. ādito pana dve gāthā tāsaṃ sambandhadassanatthaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā --
[21] ``suṇotha ^a^P0.0333^ea^ yakkhassa ca vāṇijāna ca, samāgamo yattha tadā ahosi.
[22] yathā kathaṃ itaritarena cāpi, subhāsitaṃ tañca suṇātha sabbe..
[21] ``yo so ahu rājā pāyāsi nāma, bhummānaṃ sahabyagato yasassī.
[22] so modamānova sake vimāne, amānuso mānuse ajjhabhāsī''ti..

[03] 1228-9^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^suṇothā^eb^ti savanāṇattikavacanaṃ. yaṃ mayaṃ idāni bhaṇāma, taṃ suṇothāti. ^b^yakkhassā^eb^ti devassa. devo hi manussānaṃ ekaccānaṃ ^a^M0.0313^ea^ devānañca pūjanīyabhāvato ``yakkho''ti vuccati. apica sakkopi cattāro mahārājānopi vessavaṇapārisajjāpi purisopi ``yakkho''ti vuccati. tathā hi ``atibāḷhaṃ kho ayaṃ yakkho pamatto viharati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ yakkhaṃ saṃvejeyya''ntiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.393) sakko ``yakkho''ti vutto. ``cattāro yakkhā khaggahatthā''tiādīsu mahārājāno. ``santi hi, bhante, uḷārā yakkhā bhagavato appasannā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 3.276) vessavaṇapārisajjā. ``ettāvatā yakkhassa suddhī''tiādīsu (su0 ni0 482) puriso. idha pana vessavaṇapārisajjo adhippeto. ^b^vāṇijāna cā^eb^ti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ anunāsikalopaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^samāgamo^eb^ti samodhānaṃ. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ vaṇṇupathe. ^b^tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ maggamūḷhā hutvā gamanakāle. ^b^itaritarena cāpī^eb^ti itarītarañcāpi, idaṃ yathāti iminā yojetabbaṃ. ayañhettha attho ^a^V0.0284^ea^ -- serīsakadevaputtassa vāṇijānañca tadā yattha samāgamo ahosi, taṃ suṇotha, yathā vāpi tehi ^a^P0.0334^ea^ aññamaññaṃ subhāsitaṃ sulapitaṃ kathaṃ pavattitaṃ, tañca sabbe ohitacittā suṇāthāti. ^b^bhummāna^eb^nti bhummadevānaṃ.
[22] suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, vaṅkaṃbhayā naṭṭhamanā manussā..
[21] ``nayidha phalā mūlamayā ca santi, upādānaṃ natthi kutodha bhakkho.
[22] aññatra paṃsūhi ca vālukāhi ca, tattāhi uṇhāhi ca dāruṇāhi ca..
[21] ``atha ^a^M0.0314^ea^ tumhe kena vaṇṇena, kimāsamānā imaṃ padesañhi.
[22] anupaviṭṭhā sahasā samecca, lobhā bhayā atha vā sampamūḷhā''ti..

[03] 1230^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^vaṅke^eb^ti saṃsayaṭṭhāne. yattha paviṭṭhānaṃ ``jīvissāma nu kho, marissāma nu kho''ti jīvite saṃsayo hoti, tādise ^b^araññe. amanussaṭṭhāne^eb^ti amanussānaṃ pisācādīnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne, manussānaṃ vā agocaraṭṭhāne. ^b^kantāre^eb^ti nirudake iriṇe, kaṃ tārenti nayanti etthāti hi kantāro, udakaṃ gahetvā taritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. tenāha ^b^``appodake''^eb^ti. appa-saddo hettha abhāvattho ``appiccho appanigghoso''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 8.23; cūḷava0 456) viya. ^b^vaṇṇupathassa majjhe^eb^ti vālukākantāramajjheti attho. ^b^vaṅkaṃbhayā^eb^ti vaṅkehi bhītā. vaṅkehi bhayaṃ etesanti ^a^P0.0335^ea^ ``vaṅkabhayā''ti vattabbe gāthāsukhatthaṃ sānunāsikaṃ katvā ``vaṅkaṃbhayā''ti vuttaṃ. idañca vālukākantārapavesanato pubbe tesaṃ uppannabhayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^naṭṭhamanā^eb^ti maggasativippavāsena naṭṭhamānasā, maggamūḷhāti attho. ^b^manussā^eb^ti tesaṃ ālapanaṃ.

[03] 1231^b^.^eb^ ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ marukantāre. ^b^phalā^eb^ti ambajambutālanāḷikerādiphalāni na santīti yojanā. ^b^mūlamayā cā^eb^ti mūlāniyeva mūlamayā, vallikandādīni sandhāya vadati. ^b^upādānaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0285^ea^ ^b^natthī^eb^ti kiñcāpi kiñci bhakkhaṃ natthi, upādānaṃ vā indhanaṃ, aggissa indhanamattampi natthi, kuto kena kāraṇena idha marukantāre bhakkho siyāti attho. yaṃ pana atthi tattha, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``aññatra paṃsūhī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 1232^b^.^eb^ ^b^ujjaṅgala^eb^nti jaṅgalaṃ vuccati lūkhadhūsaro anudako bhūmippadeso, taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ jaṅgalatopi ukkaṃsena jaṅgalanti āha ``ujjaṅgala''nti. tenāha ^b^``tattamivaṃ kapāla''^eb^nti, tattaṃ ayokapālasadisanti attho. gāthāsukhatthañcettha sānunāsikaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, tattamivaicceva daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^anāyasa^eb^nti natthi ettha āyo sukhanti anāyaṃ, tato eva jīvitaṃ sīyati ^a^M0.0315^ea^ vināsetīti anāyasaṃ. atha vā na āyasanti anāyasaṃ. ^b^paralokenā^eb^ti narakena tulyaṃ. narakañhi sattānaṃ ekantānatthatāya parabhūto paṭisattubhūto lokoti visesato ``paraloko''ti vuccati, samantato ayomayattā āyasañca, idaṃ pana tadabhāvato anāyasaṃ, mahato dukkhassa uppattiṭṭhānatāya paralokasadisanti dasseti, ``anassaya''nti ca keci paṭhanti, sukhassa appatiṭṭhānabhūtanti attho. ^b^luddānamāvāsamidaṃ purāṇa^eb^nti idaṃ ṭhānaṃ cirakālato paṭṭhāya luddānaṃ dāruṇānaṃ pisācādīnaṃ āvāsabhūtaṃ. ^b^abhisattarūpo^eb^ti ``evaṃ lūkho ^a^P0.0336^ea^ ghorākāro hotū''ti porāṇehi isīhi sapitasadiso, dinnasapo viyāti attho.

[03] 1233^b^.^eb^ ^b^kena vaṇṇenā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena. ^b^kimāsamānā^eb^ti kiṃ paccāsīsantā. ^b^hī^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ``padesampī''ti ca paṭhanti, imampi nāma padesanti attho. ^b^sahasā sameccā^eb^ti sahasā ādīnavānisaṃse avicāretvā samavāyena ^b^anupaviṭṭhā^eb^ sappaviṭṭhā. ^b^lobhā bhayā atha vā^eb^ kenaci anatthakāmena palobhitā lobhato kenaci amanussādinā paripātitā bhayā vā. atha vā ^b^sampamūḷhā^eb^ti maggavippanaṭṭhā imaṃ padesaṃ anupaviṭṭhāti yojanā.
[21] ``magadhesu aṅgesu ca satthavāhā, āropayitvā paṇiyaṃ puthuttaṃ.
[22] te yāmase sindhusovīrabhūmiṃ, dhanatthikā uddayaṃ patthayānā..
[22] etena vegena āyāma sabbe, rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā vikāle..
[22] suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, disaṃ na jānāma pamūḷhacittā..
[22] tatuttariṃ jīvitamāsamānā, disvā patītā sumanā udaggā''ti..

[03] 1234^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0337^ea^ ^b^magadhesu aṅgesu ca satthavāhā^eb^ti magadharaṭṭhe ca aṅgaraṭṭhe ca jātā saṃvaḍḍhā taṃnivāsino satthe satthassa ca vāhanakā satthakā ceva satthasāmikā ca. ^b^paṇiya^eb^nti bhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^te^eb^ti te mayaṃ. ^b^yāmase^eb^ti gacchāma. ^b^sindhusovīrabhūmi^eb^nti sindhudesaṃ sovīradesañca. ^b^uddaya^eb^nti ānisaṃsaṃ atirekalābhaṃ.

[03] 1235^b^.^eb^ ^b^anadhivāsayantā^eb^ti adhivāsetuṃ asakkontā. ^b^yoggānukampa^eb^nti goṇādīnaṃ sattānaṃ anuggahaṃ. ^b^etena vegenā^eb^ti iminā javena, yena tava dassanato pubbe āyāma āgatamha. ^b^rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā^eb^ti rattiyaṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā. ^b^vikāle^eb^ti akāle avelāyaṃ.

[03] 1236^b^.^eb^ ^b^duppayātā^eb^ti duṭṭhu payātā apathe gatā, tato eva ^b^aparaddhamaggā. andhākulā^eb^ti andhā viya ākulā, maggajānanasamatthassa paññācakkhuno abhāvena andhā, tato eva ākulā, ^b^vippanaṭṭhā^eb^ ca maggasammūḷhatāya. ^b^disa^eb^nti gantabbadisaṃ, yassaṃ disāyaṃ sindhusovīradeso, taṃ disaṃ. ^b^pamūḷhacittā^eb^ti disāsaṃsayasumūḷhacittā.

[03] 1237^b^.^eb^ ^b^tavañcā^eb^ti tuvañca. ^b^yakkhā^eb^ti ālapanaṃ. ^b^tatuttariṃ jīvitamāsamānā^eb^ti yo ``ito paraṃ amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthī''ti jīvitasaṃsayo uppanno, idāni tato uttarimpi jīvitaṃ āsīsantā. ^b^disvā^eb^ti dassanahetu. ^b^patītā^eb^ti pahaṭṭhā. ^b^sumanā^eb^ti somanassappattā. ^b^udaggā^eb^ti udaggāya pītiyā udaggacittā.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0317^ea^ vāṇijehi attano pavattiyā pakāsitāya puna devaputto dvīhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[21] ``pāraṃ samuddassa imañca vaṇṇuṃ, vettācaraṃ saṅkupathañca maggaṃ.
[22] nadiyo ^a^P0.0338^ea^ pana pabbatānañca duggā, puthuddisā gacchatha bhogahetu..
[22] yaṃ vo sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ, accherakaṃ taṃ vo suṇoma tātā''ti..

[03] tassattho -- ^b^pāraṃ samuddassā^eb^ti samuddassa paratīraṃ, ^b^imañca^eb^ īdisaṃ, ^b^vaṇṇuṃ^eb^ vaṇṇupathaṃ vettalatā bandhitvā ācaritabbato ^b^vettācaraṃ maggaṃ,^eb^ saṅkuke khāṇuke koṭṭetvā gantabbato ^b^saṅkupathaṃ^eb^ maggaṃ, ^b^nadiyo pana^eb^ candabhāgādikā, ^b^pabbatānañca^eb^ visamappadesāti evaṃ ^b^duggā puthuddisā^eb^ bhoganimittaṃ ^b^gacchatha,^eb^ evaṃ gacchantā ca ^b^pakkhandiyāna^eb^ pakkhanditvā anupavisitvā, ^b^paresaṃ^eb^ rājūnaṃ ^b^vijitaṃ^eb^ tattha ^b^verajjake^eb^ videsavāsike ^b^manusse pekkhamānā^eb^ gacchatha, evaṃbhūtehi ^b^vo^eb^ tumhehi ^b^yaṃ sutaṃ vā atha vā diṭṭhaṃ^eb^ vā ^b^accherakaṃ^eb^ acchariyaṃ, ^b^taṃ vo^eb^ santike ^b^tātā^eb^ vāṇijā ^b^suṇomā^eb^ti attano vimānassa acchariyabhāvaṃ tehi kathāpetukāmo pucchati.
[21] ``itopi accherataraṃ kumāra, na no sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ.
[22] atītamānusakameva sabbaṃ, disvā na tappāma anomavaṇṇaṃ..
[22] dumā cime niccaphalūpapannā, atīva gandhā surabhiṃ pavāyanti..
[22] daḷho ca vaggu ca susaṅgato ca, atīva nijjhānakhamo manuñño..
[22] acintiyo sabbaguṇūpapanno, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷinyā..

[03] 1240-2^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0319^ea^ ^b^kumārā^eb^ti paṭhamavaye ṭhitattā devaputtaṃ ālapati. ^b^sabba^eb^nti devaputtaṃ tassa vimānapaṭibaddhañca sandhāya vadati. ^b^pokkharañño^eb^ti pokkharaṇiyo. ^b^satamussitāse^eb^ti sataratanubbedhā. ^b^silāpavāḷassā^eb^ti silāya pavāḷassa ca, silāmayā pavāḷamayāti attho. ^b^āyataṃsā^eb^ti dīghaṃsā. atha vā āyatā hutvā aṭṭhasoḷasadvattiṃsādiaṃsavanto.

[03] 1242^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesūparī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0340^ea^ tesaṃ thambhānaṃ upari. ^b^sādhumida^eb^nti sundaraṃ idaṃ tava vimānaṃ. ^b^ratanantara^eb^nti ratanantaravantaṃ, bhittithambhasopānādīsu nānāvidhehi aññehi ratanehi yuttaṃ. ^b^kañcanavedimissa^eb^nti suvaṇṇamayāya vedikāya sahitaṃ parikkhittaṃ. ^b^tapanīyapaṭṭehi ca sādhuchanna^eb^nti tapanīyamayehi anekaratanamayehi ca chadanehi tattha tattha suṭṭhu chāditaṃ.

[03] 1244^b^.^eb^ ^b^jambonaduttattamida^eb^nti idaṃ tava vimānaṃ yebhuyyena uttattajambunadabhāsuraṃ. ^b^sumaṭṭho pāsādasopānaphalūpapanno^eb^ti tassa ca so so padeso sumaṭṭho suṭṭhu majjito, tehi tehi anantarapāsādehi sopānavisesehi ramaṇīyehi phalakehi ca yutto. ^b^daḷho^eb^ti thiro. ^b^vaggū^eb^ti abhirūpo samuggato. ^b^susaṅgato^eb^ti suṭṭhu saṅgatāvayavo aññamaññānurūpapāsādāvayavo. ^b^atīva nijjhānakhamo^eb^ti pabhassarabhāvepi ativiya olokanakkhamo. ^b^manuñño^eb^ti manoramo.

[03] 1245^b^.^eb^ ^b^ratanantarasmi^eb^nti ratanamaye, ratanabhūte vā sārabhūte vimānassa abbhantare. ^b^bahuannapāna^eb^nti pesalaṃ pahūtaṃ annañca pānañca vijjati, upalabbhatīti adhippāyo. ^b^murajāalambaratūriyaghuṭṭho^eb^ti mudiṅgānaṃ ālambarānaṃ avasiṭṭhatūriyānañca saddehi niccaghosito. ^b^abhivanditosī^eb^ti namassito, thomito vā asi. tenāha ^b^``thūtivandanāyā''^eb^ti.
[03] 1246^b^.^eb^ ^b^acintiyo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0289^ea^ acinteyyānubhāvo. ^b^naḷinyā^eb^ti evaṃnāmake kīḷanaṭṭhāne yathā vessavaṇo mahārājā, evaṃ tvaṃ modasīti yojanā.

[03] 1247^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0320^ea^ asi bhavasi. ^b^devindo^eb^ti sakko devarājā. ^b^manussabhūto^eb^ti manussesu bhūto manussajātiko. ^b^yakkho^eb^ti ^a^P0.0341^ea^ devādibhāvaṃ pucchitvāpi yakkhabhāvaṃ āsaṅkantā vadanti.
[21] ``serīsako nāma ahamhi yakkho, kantāriyo vaṇṇupathamhi gutto.
[22] imaṃ padesaṃ abhipālayāmi, vacanakaro vessavaṇassa rañño''ti.. --
[25] āha. tattha ^b^ahamhī yakkho^eb^ti ahaṃ yakkho amhi. ^b^kantāriyo^eb^ti ārakkhaṇatthaṃ kantāre niyutto. ^b^gutto^eb^ti gopako. tenāha ^b^``abhipālayāmī''^eb^ti.
[03] idāni vāṇijā tassa kammādīni pucchantā āhaṃsu --
[21] ``adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ.
[22] pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ manuñña''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^adhiccaladdha^eb^nti adhiccasamuppattikaṃ, yadicchakaṃ laddhanti attho. ^b^pariṇāmajaṃ te^eb^ti niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇataṃ, kālapariṇataṃ vā. ^b^sayaṃkata^eb^nti tayā sayameva kataṃ, deviddhiyā tayā sayameva nibbattitanti attho. ^b^udāhu devehi dinna^eb^nti tayā ārādhitehi devehi pasādavasena nissaṭṭhaṃ.
[03] idāni devaputto caturopi pakāre paṭikkhipitvā puññameva apadisanto --
[21] ``nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ na hi devehi dinnaṃ.
[22] sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ manuñña''nti.. --
[03] taṃ ^a^M0.0321^ea^ ^a^V0.0290^ea^ sutvā vāṇijā puna ``nādhiccaladdha''nti gāthāyaṃ puññādhikameva te caturo pakāre āropetvā puññassa ca sarūpaṃ pucchiṃsu --
[21] ``kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[22] pucchanti ^a^P0.0342^ea^ taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ vimāna''nti..
[03] puna devaputto te paṭikkhipitvā attānaṃ yathūpacitaṃ puññañca dassento --
[21] ``mamaṃ pāyāsīti ahu samaññā, rajjaṃ yadā kārayiṃ kosalānaṃ.
[22] natthikadiṭṭhi kadariyo pāpadhammo, ucchedavādī ca tadā ahosiṃ..
[21] ``samaṇo ca kho āsi kumārakassapo, bahussuto cittakathī uḷāro.
[22] so me tadā dhammakathaṃ abhāsi, diṭṭhivisūkāni vinodayī me..
[27] pāṇātipātā virato ahosiṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayissaṃ.
[22] amajjapo no ca musā abhāṇiṃ, sakena dārena ca ahosiṃ tuṭṭho..
[21] ``taṃ ^a^M0.0322^ea^ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[22] teheva kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimāna''nti.. --
[03] atha vāṇijā devaputtaṃ vimānañcassa paccakkhato disvā kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā attano kammaphale saddhaṃ pavedentā --
[21] ``saccaṃ kirāhaṃsu narā sapaññā, anaññathā vacanaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ.
[22] yahiṃ ^a^P0.0343^ea^ yahiṃ gacchati puññakammo, tahiṃ tahiṃ modati kāmakāmī..
[21] ``yahiṃ ^a^V0.0291^ea^ yahiṃ sokapariddavo ca, vadho ca bandho ca parikkileso.
[22] tahiṃ tahiṃ gacchati pāpakammo, na muccati duggatiyā kadācī''ti.. --
[25] gāthādvayaṃ avocuṃ. tattha ^b^sokapariddavo^eb^ti soko ca paridevo ca. ^b^parikkileso^eb^ti vuttā anatthuppatti.
[03] evaṃ tesu kathentesuyeva vimānadvāre sirīsarukkhato paripākena muttabandhanā paripakkā sipāṭikā pati, tena devaputto saparijano domanassappatto ahosi. taṃ disvā vāṇijā --
[22] janassimassa tuyhañca kumāra, appaccayo kena nu kho ahosī''ti.. --

[25] gāthamāhaṃsu. tattha ^b^sammūḷharūpovā^eb^ti sokavasena sabbaso mūḷhasabhāvo viya. ^b^jano^eb^ti devajano. ^b^asmiṃ muhutte^eb^ti imasmiṃ muhuttamatte ^a^M0.0323^ea^. ^b^kalalīkato^eb^ti kalalaṃ viya kato, kalalanissitaudakībhūto viya āviloti adhippāyo. ^b^janassimassa tuyhañcā^eb^ti imassa tava parijanassa tuyhañca. ^b^appaccayo^eb^ti domanassaṃ.
[21] ``ime ca sirīsavanā tātā, dibbā gandhā surabhī sampavanti.
[22] te sampavāyanti imaṃ vimānaṃ, divā ca ratto ca tamaṃ nihantvā..
[22] mānussakaṃ ^a^P0.0344^ea^ vassasataṃ atītaṃ, yadagge kāyamhi idhūpapanno..

[03] 1256^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0292^ea^ ^b^sirīsavanā^eb^ti sirīsavipinato. ^b^tātā^eb^ti vāṇije ālapati. ime tumhākaṃ mayhañca paccakkhabhūtā ^b^dibbā gandhā surabhī^eb^ ativiya sugandhāyeva samantato ^b^pavanti^eb^ pavāyanti. te dibbā gandhā evaṃ vāyantā ^b^imaṃ vimānaṃ sampavāyanti^eb^ sammadeva gandhaṃ gāhāpenti, na kevalaṃ sampavāyanameva, atha kho attano pabhāya tamampi nihanti. tenāha ^b^``divā ca ratto ca tamaṃ nihantvā''^eb^ti.

[03] 1260-61^b^.^eb^ ^b^imesa^eb^nti sirīsānaṃ. ^b^sipāṭikā^eb^ti phalakuṭṭhilikā. ^b^phalatī^eb^ti paccitvā vaṇṭato muccati, puṭabhedaṃ vā patvā sissati. ^b^mānussakaṃ vassasataṃ atīta^eb^nti yasmā vassasatassa accayena imassa sirīsassa sipāṭikā phalati, ayañca phalitā, tasmā mayhaṃ mānussakaṃ vassasataṃ atītaṃ. ^b^yadagge^eb^ yato paṭṭhāya, ^b^kāyamhi idha^eb^ imasmiṃ devanikāye ^b^upapanno^eb^ ^a^M0.0324^ea^ nibbatto. mayhañca devagaṇanāya pañca vassasatāni āyu, tasmā khīyati me āyūti sokavasena sampamūḷhoti dasseti. tenāha ^b^``disvānahaṃ vassasatāni pañca...pe0... teneva sokena pamucchitosmī''^eb^ti.
[21] ``kathaṃ nu soceyya tathāvidho so, laddhā vimānaṃ atulaṃ cirāya.
[22] ye cāpi kho ittaramupapannā, te nūna soceyyuṃ parittapuññā''ti.. --

[25] āhaṃsu. tattha ^a^P0.0345^ea^ yādisehi appāyukehi maraṇaṃ paṭicca socitabbaṃ siyā, tādiso pana evaṃ dibbānubhāvasampanno navutivassasatasahassāyuko kathaṃ nu soceyya, na socitabbamevāti adhippāyo.
[03] devaputto tattakeneva samassāsetvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchanto tesañca upadesaṃ dento --
[21] ``anucchaviṃ ovadiyañca metaṃ, yaṃ maṃ tumhe peyyavācaṃ vadetha.
[22] tumhe ca kho tātā mayānuguttā, yehicchakaṃ tena paletha sotthi''nti.. --

[25] gāthamāha. tattha ^b^anucchavi^eb^nti anucchavikaṃ, tumhākameva taṃ yuttarūpaṃ. ^b^ovadiyañca meta^eb^nti me mayhaṃ tumhehi ovadiyaṃ ovādavasena vattabbametaṃ. ^b^yaṃ^eb^ yasmā, ^b^maṃ^eb^ mayhaṃ, ^b^tumhe^eb^ ``kathaṃ nu soceyya''ntiādinā ^a^V0.0293^ea^ ^b^peyyavācaṃ^eb^ piyavacanaṃ ^b^vadetha.^eb^ yaṃ vā peyyavācāya vadanaṃ kathanaṃ, taṃ tumhākameva anucchavikanti yojanā. atha vā yaṃ yasmā tumhe peyyavācaṃ vadetha, tasmā anucchavikaṃ ovadiyañca ovaditabbaṃ ovādānurūpaṃ kātabbañca me mayā kataṃ, kiṃ pana tanti āha ^b^``tumhe ca kho tātā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^mayānuguttā^eb^ti imasmiṃ amanussapariggahe marukantāre yāva kantārātikkamā mayā anuguttā rakkhitā, ^b^yenicchakaṃ^eb^ yathārucitena, ^b^sotthiṃ^eb^ khemena, ^b^paletha^eb^ gacchathāti attho.
[25] gāthamāhaṃsu. tattha ^a^P0.0346^ea^ ^b^yathāpayogā^eb^ti idāni katapaṭiññānurūpapayogā. ^b^paripuṇṇacāgā^eb^ti samattacāgā, uḷārassa mahassa pariyattapariccāgā. ^b^maha^eb^nti ussavapūjaṃ.
[03] puna devaputto mahakaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto kattabbesu ca te niyojento --
[21] ``mā ceva serīsamahaṃ akattha, sabbañca vo bhavissati yaṃ vadetha.

[25] gāthamāha. tattha ^b^yaṃ vadethā^eb^ti yaṃ tumhe khemena sindhusovīradesapattiṃ tattha ca vipulaṃ uddayaṃ lābhaṃ paccāsīsantā ``gantvā maya''ntiādīni vadatha. ^b^sabbaṃ^eb^ taṃ ^b^vo^eb^ tumhākaṃ tatheva bhavissati, tattha nikkaṅkhā hotha, tumhe pana ito paṭṭhāya ^b^pāpāni kammāni^eb^ pāṇātipātādīni ^b^vivajjayātha^eb^ parivajjetha. ^b^dhammānuyoga^eb^nti dānādikusaladhammassa anuyuñjanaṃ. ^b^adhiṭṭhahāthā^eb^ti anusikkhatha idaṃ serīsakamahanti dasseti.
[03] yaṃ pana upāsakaṃ anuggaṇhanto tesaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaṃ kātukāmo ahosi, tassa guṇaṃ kittetvā taṃ tesaṃ uddisanto imā gāthāyo āha --
[22] saddho ca cāgī ca supesalo ca, vicakkhaṇo santusito mutīmā..
[21] ``sañjānamāno ^a^M0.0326^ea^ na musā bhaṇeyya, parūpaghātāya na cetayeyya.
[22] vebhūtikaṃ pesuṇaṃ no kareyya, saṇhañca vācaṃ sakhilaṃ bhaṇeyya..
[22] so ^a^P0.0347^ea^ mātaraṃ pitarañcāpi jantu, dhammena poseti ariyavutti..
[21] ``maññe so mātāpitūnaṃ kāraṇā, bhogāni pariyesati na attahetu.
[22] mātāpitūnañca yo accayena, nekkhammapoṇo carissati brahmacariyaṃ..
[21] ``ujū avaṅko asaṭho amāyo, na lesakappena ca vohareyya.
[22] so tādiso sukatakammakārī, dhamme ṭhito kinti labhetha dukkhaṃ..
[21] ``taṃkāraṇā pātukatomhi attanā, tasmā dhammaṃ passatha vāṇijāse.
[27] aññatra teniha bhasmī bhavetha, andhākulā vippanaṭṭhā araññe.
[22] taṃ khippamānena lahuṃ parena, sukho have sappurisena saṅgamo''ti..

[03] 1266^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^saṅghe^eb^ti sattasamūhe. ^b^vicakkhaṇo^eb^ti tattha tattha kattabbatāya kusalo. ^b^santusito^eb^ti santuṭṭho. ^b^mutīmā^eb^ti kammassakatañāṇādinā idhalokaparalokahitānaṃ munanato mutimā.
[03] 1267^b^.^eb^ ^b^sañjānamāno na musā bhaṇeyyā^eb^ti sampajānamusā na bhāseyya. ^b^vebhūtika^eb^nti sahitānaṃ vinābhāvakaraṇato ``vebhūtika''nti laddhanāmaṃ pisuṇaṃ, ^b^no kareyya^eb^ na vadeyya.

[03] 1268^b^.^eb^ ^b^sappatisso^eb^ti ^a^M0.0327^ea^ patissayo garuṭṭhāniyesu nivātavuttikattā soraccaṃ, saha patissenāti sappatisso. ^b^adhisīle^eb^ti upāsakena rakkhitabbādhisīlasikkhāya. ^b^ariyavuttī^eb^ti parisuddhavutti.

[03] 1270^b^.^eb^ ^b^lesakappenā^eb^ti kappiyalesena. ^b^na ca vohareyyā^eb^ti māyāsāṭheyyavasena vacanaṃ na nicchāreyya. ^b^dhamme ṭhito kinti labhetha dukkha^eb^nti evaṃ vuttanayena dhamme ṭhito dhammacārī samacārī kinti kena pakārena dukkhaṃ labhetha pāpuṇeyya.

[03] 1271^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃkāraṇā^eb^ti tannimittaṃ tassa upāsakassa hetu. ^b^pātukatomhi attanā^eb^ti sayameva tumhākaṃ ahaṃ pāturahosiṃ. ``attāna''ntipi pāṭho, mama attānaṃ tumhākaṃ pātvākāsinti attho. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ahaṃ dhammaṃ apacāyamāno taṃ rakkhanto tumhepi rakkhāmi, tasmā ^b^dhammaṃ passatha^eb^ dhammameva caritabbaṃ katvā oloketha. ^b^aññatra teniha bhasmī bhavethā^eb^ti tena upāsakena vinā ce āgatā, imasmiṃ marukantāre anāthā appaṭisaraṇā bhasmabhāvaṃ gaccheyyātha. ^b^khippamānenā^eb^ti evaṃ khippantena vambhantena pīḷantena. ^b^lahu^eb^nti sukaraṃ. ^b^parenā^eb^ti adhikaṃ, aññena vā. tasmā ^b^sukho have sappurisena saṅgamo^eb^ti. so hi khantisoracce niviṭṭho kenaci kiñci vuttopi na paṭippharatīti adhippāyo.
[03] evaṃ sāmaññato kittitaṃ sarūpato ñātukāmā vāṇijā --
[27] kiṃ nāmadheyyaṃ kiṃ pana tassa gottaṃ.
[26] mayampi naṃ daṭṭhukāmamha yakkha, yassānukampāya idhāgatosi.
[22] lābhā hi tassa yassa tuvaṃ pihesī''ti.. --

[25] gāthamāhaṃsu. tattha ^b^kiṃ nāma so^eb^ti nāmato so jantu satto ko nāma. ^b^kiñca karoti kamma^eb^nti kasivaṇijjādīsu kīdisaṃ kammaṃ karoti. ^b^kiṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0328^ea^ ^b^nāmadheyya^eb^nti mātāpitūhi kataṃ ^a^P0.0349^ea^ pana ``tisso phusso''tiādīsu tassa kiṃ nāmadheyyaṃ, ``bhaggavo bhāradvājo''tiādīsu kiṃ vā tassa gottaṃ. ^b^yassa tuvaṃ pihesī^eb^ti yaṃ tuvaṃ piyāyasi.
[22] mā kho naṃ hīḷittha supesalo so''ti.. --

[25] āha. tattha ^b^kappako^eb^ti nhāpito. ^b^sambhavanāmadheyyo^eb^ti sambhavoti evaṃnāmo. ^b^kocchaphalūpajīvī^eb^ti kocchañca phalañca upanissāya jīvanako. tattha kocchaṃ nāma āḷakādisaṇṭhāpanatthaṃ kesādīnaṃ ullikhanasādhanaṃ. ^b^pesiyo^eb^ pesanakārako veyyāvaccakaro.
[21] ``jānāmase yaṃ tvaṃ pavadesi yakkha, na kho naṃ jānāma sa edisoti.
[22] mayampi naṃ pūjayissāma yakkha, sutvāna tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ uḷāra''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^jānāmase^eb^ti yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi, taṃ mayaṃ sarūpato jānāma. ^b^ediso^eb^ti guṇato pana yathā tayā kittitaṃ, evaṃ edisoti taṃ na kho jānāma, yathā taṃ aviddasunoti adhippāyo.
[03] idāni devaputto te attano vimānaṃ āropetvā anusāsanatthaṃ --
[21] ``ye keci imasmiṃ satthe manussā, daharā mahantā athavāpi majjhimā.
[22] sabbeva ^a^P0.0350^ea^ te ālambantu vimānaṃ, passantu puññānaṃ phalaṃ kadariyā''ti.. --
[25] gāthamāha ^a^M0.0329^ea^. tattha ^b^mahantā^eb^ti vuḍḍhā. ^b^ālambantū^eb^ti ārohantu. ^b^kadariyā^eb^ti maccharino adānasīlā.
[03] idāni pariyosāne cha gāthā dhammasaṅgāhakehi vuttā --
[21] ``te ^a^V0.0297^ea^ tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, taṃ kappakaṃ tattha purakkhatvā.
[22] sabbeva te ālambiṃsu vimānaṃ, masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassa..
[21] ``te tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayiṃsu.
[27] pāṇātipātā viratā ahesuṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayiṃsu.
[22] amajjapā no ca musā bhaṇiṃsu, sakena dārena ca ahesuṃ tuṭṭhā..
[21] ``te tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayitvā.
[22] pakkāmi sattho anumodamāno, yakkhiddhiyā anumato punappunaṃ..
[21] ``gantvāna te saṅgharaṃ sotthivanto, puttehi dārehi samaṅgibhūtā.
[27] ānandī vittā sumanā patītā, akaṃsu serīsamahaṃ uḷāraṃ.
[22] ekassa atthāya upāsakassa, sabbeva sattā sukhitā ahesu''nti..

[03] 1276^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ahaṃ pure^eb^ti ahaṃ purimaṃ ahaṃ purimanti ahamahaṃkarāti attho. ^b^``te tattha sabbevā''^eb^ti vatvā puna ^b^``sabbeva te''^eb^ti vacanaṃ ``sabbeva te yathā vimānassa āruhane ussukkajātā ahesuṃ, tathā sabbeva taṃ āruhiṃsu, na kassaci āruhane antarāyo ahosī''ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassā^eb^ti ``masakkasāra''nti ca tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ vuccati, sabbaṃ vā devabhavanaṃ, idha pana sakkabhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ. tenāha ``masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassā''ti.

[03] 1277-8^b^.^eb^ atha te vāṇijā vimānaṃ passitvā pasannacittā tassa devaputtassa ovāde ṭhatvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya tassa ānubhāvena sotthinā icchitaṃ desaṃ agamaṃsu. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``te tattha sabbevā''^eb^tiādi. tattha anumato pakkāmi sattho yakkhiddhiyā punappunaṃ anumodamānoti yojanā. kena pana anumatoti? yakkhenāti pākaṭoyamattho.

[03] 1279^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathāpayogā^eb^ti yathāajjhāsayaṃ katapayogā. ^b^paripuṇṇalābhā^eb^ti samiddhalābhā. ^b^akkhata^eb^nti ^a^V0.0298^ea^ anupaddutaṃ pāṭaliputtaṃ. ^b^akkhata^eb^nti vā anābādhaṃ anuppīḷaṃ, anantarāyenāti attho.

[03] 1280^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅghara^eb^nti sakaṃ gehaṃ. ^b^sotthivanto^eb^ti sotthibhāvena yuttā khemino. ^b^ānandī^eb^tiādīhi catūhi padehi somanassitabhāvameva vadati. ^b^serīsakaṃ te pariveṇaṃ māpayiṃsū^eb^ti kataññutāya ṭhatvā paṭissavamocanatthañca devaputtassa nāmena serīsakaṃ nāma paricchedavasena veṇiyato pekkhitabbato pariveṇaṃ pāsādakūṭāgārarattiṭṭhānādisampannaṃ ^a^P0.0352^ea^ pākāraparikkhittaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakayuttaṃ āvāsaṃ akaṃsu.

[03] 1281^b^.^eb^ ^b^etādisā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0331^ea^ edisī, evaṃ anatthapaṭibāhinī atthasādhikā ca. ^b^mahatthikā^eb^ti mahāpayojanā mahānisaṃsā. ^b^dhammaguṇāna^eb^nti aviparītaguṇānaṃ. ^b^ekassa^eb^ sattassa hitatthaṃ ^b^sabbeva sattā^eb^ sabbe eva te satthapariyāpannā sattā, ^b^sukhitā^eb^ sukhappattā khemappattā ^b^ahesuṃ^eb^.

[03] sambhavo pana upāsako pāyāsissa devaputtassa tesañca vāṇijānaṃ vacanapaṭivacanavasena pavattaṃ gāthābandhaṃ sutaniyāmeneva uggahetvā therānaṃ ārocesi. pāyāsidevaputto āyasmato sambhavattherassa kathesīti apare. taṃ yasattherappamukhā mahātherā dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesuṃ. sambhavo pana upāsako mātāpitūnaṃ accayena pabbajitvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.

[03] ^b^uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimāna^eb^nti sunikkhittavimānaṃ. tassa kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. tena samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ upagato. tasmiñca khaṇe aññataro devaputto attano vimānadvāre ṭhito āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.

[03] so kira atīte kassapasammāsambuddhe parinibbute tassa sarīradhātuyo pakkhipitvā yojanike kanakathūpe ca kate catasso parisā kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gandhapupphadhūpādīhi cetiye ^a^V0.0299^ea^ pūjaṃ karonti, tattha aññataro upāsako aññesu pupphapūjaṃ katvā gatesu tehi pūjitaṭṭhāne dunnikkhittāni pupphāni disvā tattheva tāni sammadeva ṭhapento sannivesavasena dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ ^a^P0.0353^ea^ vibhattivisesayuttaṃ pupphapūjaṃ akāsi. katvā ca pana etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanto satthu guṇe anussaritvā pasannacitto taṃ puññaṃ hadaye ṭhapesi.

[03] so ^a^M0.0332^ea^ aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tasseva kammassa ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti, mahānubhāvo mahā cassa parivāro ahosi. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``tasmiñca khaṇe aññataro devaputto...pe0... aṭṭhāsī''ti. atha naṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yathāladdhasampattikittanamukhena katasucaritakammaṃ imāhi gāthāhi pucchi --
[22] kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā..
[21] ``tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ.
[22] dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā..
[21] ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[21] ``pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ.
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[03] sopi tassa attano katakammaṃ imāhi gāthāhi kathesi. taṃ dassentā saṅgītikārā āhaṃsu --
[22] pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ''..
[22] mahiddhiko camhi mahānubhāvo, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūto..
[21] ``tena ^a^M0.0333^ea^ ^a^P0.0354^ea^ metādiso vaṇṇo, tena me idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca me bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[21] ``akkhāmi te bhikkhu mahānubhāva, manussabhūto yamahaṃ akāsiṃ.
[22] tenamhi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..

[03] 1287^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^dunnikkhittaṃ māla^eb^nti cetiye pūjākaraṇaṭṭhāne nirantaraṭṭhapanādinā racanāvisesena aṭṭhapetvā yathānikkhittatāya na suṭṭhu nikkhittaṃ, vātena vā paharitvā dunnikkhittaṃ pupphaṃ. ^b^sunikkhipitvā^eb^ti suṭṭhu nikkhipitvā racanāvisesena dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ katvā nikkhipiya. ^b^patiṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti vibhattivisesādivasena pupphaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā. taṃ vā pupphaṃ nikkhipanto satthu cetiyaṃ uddissa mama santāne kusaladhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti evaṃ ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] evaṃ devaputtena attano sucaritakamme pakāsite thero tassa dhammaṃ desetvā āgantvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ nivedesi. bhagavā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattamahājanassa dhammaṃ desesi. desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
[21] yā ^a^P0.0355^ea^ tattha paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ.
[21] iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā.
[22] tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino..
